highlands.description: Uneven valleys and tall limestone cliffs with many lakes and rivers. Default home of the Mountain Folk.

spring.description:
Spring in the Highlands is a time of renewal, usually full of windy days and a good time to start sowing. Late snow may rarely occur.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are average
  • Humidity is alright

summer.description:
Summer in the Highlands is a warm and wet season, often with days of rain and maybe even storms. Strong winds and a cloudless sky will probably prevail, however.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are good
  • Humidity is mostly scarce

autumn.description:
Autumn in the Highlands marks the end of the farming season, with several rainy or cloudy days and perhaps even an early snowfall.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are average
  • Humidity is high

winter.description:
Winter in the Highlands can be harsh and severe, lasting slightly longer than the other seasons and with an almost daily snowfall. Get your warm clothes ready!
  • Daytime sunlight levels are meager
  • Humidity is very high

spring.description:
Spring in the Forest is a season of rebirth, lasting three months. Rains melt the snows, revealing new growth hidden underneath, and trees come back to life covered with colorful blossoms.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are good
  • Humidity is plentiful

summer.description:
Summer in the Forest is the mildest season, lasting three months. It is a time to relax and bask in the sun, without worrying about storms or snow.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are very good
  • Humidity is high

autumn.description:
Autumn in the Forest is the harvest season, lasting three months. The trees turn to gold, and the grass prepares to retreat into its winter blanket, as the skies darken with storm clouds.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are average
  • Humidity is very high

winter.description:
Winter in the Forest is a cold season, lasting three months. Trees lose their leaves, and snow covers the landscape. The cold, biting winds are best countered by cozy gatherings around the hearth.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are poor
  • Humidity is high

spring.description:
Spring in the Desert is the wet season, lasting two months. It is a rare time for the water reserves to be replenished, leading the local flora to all bloom at once.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are very good
  • Slightly dry season

summer.description:
Summer in the Desert is the storm season, lasting four months. Sandstorms ravage the landscape on almost a daily basis, and a town without ample shelter, be it walls, mountains, or underground dwellings, may have trouble surviving the onslaught.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are excessive
  • Unbearably dry season

autumn.description:
Autumn in the Desert is the quiet season, lasting four months. The weather is hot, but milder than in the summer, with neither sandstorms nor precipitation. It is traditionally a time to rest after surviving the sandstorms of summer.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are good
  • Quite dry season

winter.description:
Winter in the Desert is a cool season, lasting two months. Breezes blow over the dunes, bringing with them milder weather than in the autumn, and even the occasional snow cloud.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are average
  • Extremely dry season

spring.description:
Spring in the Arctic is a season of change, only lasting a bit more than one month. While the highlands retain some cold year-round, the lowlands around the lakes start to thaw out and young grass begins to sprout.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are average
  • Humidity is alright

summer.description:
Summer in the Arctic is a season of rest, lasting around three months. The weather is mild, and the lowlands are green with grass. It is a reprieve from the cold, and a time to regather strength for the long winter to come.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are good
  • Humidity is mostly scarce

autumn.description:
Autumn in the Arctic is a season of freeze, only lasting a bit more than one month. Although blizzards are rare, snow can be a daily occurrence. It is the last chance to build shelter before the unforgiving winter arrives.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are poor
  • Humidity is high

winter.description:
Winter in the Arctic is a season of hardship, lasting six months. Weather is severe, with biting winds and unforgiving blizzards making farming exceedingly difficult. Even venturing outside without a winter outfit can end tragically.
  • Daytime sunlight levels are inadequate
  • Very dry season

snow_early_positive.tooltip: I've waited the whole year for this, the snow season is finally upon us!

snow_early_negative.tooltip: Can't believe we're getting snow this early, darkness and cold approach!

snow_late_positive.tooltip: I'm glad we can enjoy one more day of snow before the snow season ends!

snow_late_negative.tooltip: Winter should be over already, can't believe we're getting such late snowfall...

cloudy_chilly_positive.tooltip: Fluffy clouds and a nice, chilly air! This is a nice day.

cloudy_chilly_negative.tooltip: As if having the sun covered by those clouds wasn't enough, it's also really chilly today!

cloudy_cold_positive.tooltip: Cloudy and cold days are the best! I love winter!

cloudy_cold_negative.tooltip: It's dark, gloomy clouds above us, a biting cold... What could be worse?

foggy_chilly_positive.tooltip: Oh! This foggy is so mysterious! And this chilly sensation on the back of the neck... Love it!

foggy_chilly_negative.tooltip: It's too cold and this fog is too thick! There is something wrong going on, I'll tell you!

rain_chilly_positive.tooltip: This freezing rain feels somewhat refreshing, I wonder if we'll get snow soon?

rain_chilly_negative.tooltip: I can't stand this boring tickling of thin, freezing rain. Ugh!

sunny_chilly_positive.tooltip: Ah! What a wonderful feeling, there is nothing like the bright sun on a nice and chilly day.

sunny_chilly_negative.tooltip: Oh, it's nice to finally see the sun again... but could we at least get some warmth too?

sunny_hot_positive.tooltip: The sun is so strong today! It can be a little punishing but makes me feel so alive!

sunny_hot_negative.tooltip: Why does it have to be so warm today? I can't take this heat anymore...

sunny_sweltering_positive.tooltip: I know, I know... It is extremely hot. But that means we get to stay more under the shade, right?

sunny_sweltering_negative.tooltip: This is definitely not healthy... Must stay away from the sun... Must stay refreshed...

windy_chilly_positive.tooltip: Nothing feels as refreshing as the gentle and cold arctic wind sweeping across your face!

windy_chilly_negative.tooltip: It feels like a thousand of little cold blades on my face... Ugh!

whiteout_debuff.tooltip: Oh no, I am not in shelter! It's happening now! I'm afraid! HELP ME!

blizzard_negative.tooltip: It's cold, it's stormy and I'm being covered in snow. I like snowlings... but I don't want to be one!

hailstorm_positive.tooltip: Oh, woah! I love hail! Now where's my juice? I gotta catch some free ice cubes...

sandy_drifts_positive.tooltip: Ahh, nothing beats the beauty of the desert when the sands are dancing under the moon...

sandy_drifts_negative.tooltip: It's coarse, it's rough and it gets everywhere.

snow_drifts_positive.tooltip: Look, look at the snow drifts! So beautiful... I wish I could see that every day!

snow_drifts_negative.tooltip: Well, yeah. When you're walking outside and a whirl of snow just punches you in the face you know this day ain't getting much better...

sunny_autumn_positive.tooltip: The golden and red leaves... The shorter days... The brown grass... It is the best time of the year again!

sunny_autumn_negative.tooltip: Oh no... This day looks so much like, well, autumn. It has autumn written everywhere. And you know what autumn means... It means winter.

sunny_stagnant_positive.tooltip: It could be worse, right? No clouds at all, just the big and shiny sun above us!

sunny_stagnant_negative.display_name: There's no end to this day...
sunny_stagnant_negative.tooltip: There's nothing, nothing going on. The sky is so clear the sun is heating us like an oven... Is the world an oven?

whiteout_positive.tooltip: I mean... Look outside. It's not like we can work today... So let's just find shelter and enjoy some tea?

whiteout_negative.tooltip: What if the light is everywhere?! Can't even tell the ground from the sky! Whiteouts are so dangerous and scary!

windy_springtime_positive.tooltip: Woooo! It's spring again! Look at this beautiful day! The flowers, the butterflies, the soft breeze!

windy_springtime_negative.tooltip: Oh, great. Winter ends and now it's sneezing and allergy season. GO AWAY, POLLEN!

distant_storm_positive.tooltip: Oh! This weather gives me the chills! It's so ominous and gloomy... and yet, I'm glad we're safe!

distant_storm_negative.tooltip: It might not be here yet but it will get to us, sooner or later... Ugh.

everlasting_summer.tooltip: I feel touched by an everlasting summer, a place where we'd all find harmony and peace...

under_siege_positive.tooltip: Now is the hour! A moment of courage and of glory! This day, WE FIGHT!

under_siege_negative.tooltip: Oh, no... They're back! We're doomed, DOOMED!

event_meteor_shower_positive.tooltip: There's one... Oh! There's another one! I love shooting stars!

event_meteor_shower_negative.tooltip: Everyone loves shooting stars... I don't know why. Make a wish? For what? It never happens!

ate_intolerable.tooltip: I recently had [str(foodname)]... I'm not feeling well...

dairy_intolerant_ate_dairy.tooltip: Unfortunately [str(foodname)] really doesn't go well with my stomach... Ouch...

nuts_intolerant_ate_nuts.tooltip: Ugh... That [str(foodname)] looked nice but I guess it isn't for me...

fish_intolerant_ate_fish.tooltip: I'm never having [str(foodname)] again. Never! Ouch...

ate_lovely.tooltip: I had [str(foodname)]! I want more! I'm so happy about it!

dairy_lover_ate_dairy.tooltip: Yes! I'm so glad I could eat [str(foodname)] today! It's definitely one of the things I love the most!

meat_lover_ate_meat.tooltip: Hmmm... That [str(foodname)] was delicious. I love meat, all kinds of meat - but that one was just amazing!

vegetable_lover_ate_vegetable.tooltip: I can't believe how good [str(foodname)] was. How can such delicious things come from the ground?

fungi_lover_ate_fungi.tooltip: Yum! I love eating fungi, and I must admit [str(foodname)] was particularly good!

merry_time_frostfeast.tooltip: Ahh! What a joyous time of the year! Nothing like decorating your home, gathering around delicious food and enjoying it with your loved ones...

elevated_character.tooltip: There's something really special about the taste of wine and the taste of cheese when experienced together... I feel... Greater.

garlic_breath.tooltip: Oh no... I better avoid people. My breath smells very... Strong!

leafy_intolerant_ate_leafy.tooltip: Eww! I had to eat [str(foodname)]! Who even likes that thing? It's like eating green paper!

leafy_lover_ate_leafy.tooltip: Oh yes! I've enjoyed some [str(foodname)] today! So healthy, fresh and light!

fish_lover_ate_fish.tooltip: Nom, nom, nom! Had some delicious [str(foodname)]! Gotta love 'em slippery fellows!

teddy.tooltip: I was visited by the adorable ghost of a very mischievous kitten called Teddy!

mila.tooltip: The kind spirit of Mila got bigger, more ferocious and defended the town!

merry_time.tooltip: Friends, drinks and a good time! What else could anyone wish for?

morning_after.tooltip: Ugh... Bleh! Everything aches and my head is so heavy. Should not exaggerate so much...

dairy_intolerant_had_dairy.tooltip: I suppose I didn't have any better option other than the [str(drinkname)] that is now making me feel really sick...

alcohol_intolerant_had_alcohol.tooltip: I can't stand alcoholic drinks and taking in that [str(drinkname)] was an awful feeling that I hope to never experience again!

alcohol_lover_had_alcohol.tooltip: Woohoo, make way for this happy hearthling that just enjoyed an amazing [str(drinkname)]! Is there more?

juice_lover_had_juice.tooltip: Yes, I loved that [str(drinkname)]! Juices are the best thing ever, aren't they?

tea_lover_had_tea.tooltip: Hmm... Balance. I feel like this [str(drinkname)] has brought me to a perfect, tranquil state. Nothing can go wrong after this...

dairy_lover_had_dairy.tooltip: I could hug the animal that provided me with that delicious [str(drinkname)]! Hearty and healthy!

had_item_quality_fine.tooltip: There was something particularly special about this [str(drinkname)]. Whoever made it should be congratulated!

had_item_quality_excellent.tooltip: Hmmm, this [str(drinkname)] was incredible! Or should I say... Excellent? I hope there is more for later!

had_item_quality_masterwork.tooltip: I should stop everything and go congratulate whoever made this [str(drinkname)] I had today. It was simply brilliant, the work of a master!

intolerable.tooltip: I've had something intolerable, [str(drinkname)]... I really shouldn't do that anymore, it's unbearable.

unpalatable.tooltip: After finishing this [str(drinkname)] I just can't really think anything other than how bad it was.

raw.tooltip: After a sip or two of the [str(drinkname)] I already knew it was okay. But not... much.

prepared.tooltip: The effort put into the [str(drinkname)] I just enjoyed is noticeable and can't be denied!

bland.tooltip: I had that [str(drinkname)] and it wasn't particularly tasty... I've had better things before!

tasty.tooltip: Shortly after drinking [str(drinkname)] I already feel like I could drink much more! It was delicious!

lovely.tooltip: Ah, what a wonderful day! Enjoying that lovely [str(drinkname)] has made everything better already.

average.tooltip: [str(drinkname)] was not the best but it wasn't bad either! Honestly, it was quite alright!

relaxing_time.tooltip: A light drink feels very relaxing after a hard day's work!

jolly_time.tooltip: Enjoying a lot of good company and delicious beverages! This is so good!

coffee_lover_had_coffee.tooltip: YES! I just enjoyed a [str(drinkname)] and it was FANTASTIC! I NEED MORE!

sated.tooltip: Hmm, I've really enjoyed some beverages recently. I'll be good for a while...

thirsty.tooltip: I haven't had a drink in some time... Could use the refreshment soon.

very_thirsty.tooltip: Uh, I'm so dry... I need to drink something!

good_dream.tooltip: Hmm... Is that a pot of gold? Oh my, I must be dreaming...

bad_dream.tooltip: No... No... Run away, the giant poyo is here! FLY, YOU FOOLS!

bee_swarmed.tooltip: Ow! Ouch! Oof! I'm covered in blisters... Those bees really got me!

undead_infection.tooltip: Oh no, oh no, oh no... Am I turning green? Am I okay?!

minor_infection.tooltip: This fever is not normal, I'm shaking, feeling bad and I know there's something wrong...

infection.tooltip: Some of my wounds are not really healing... They're getting worse and I'm not feeling good.

major_infection.tooltip: The fever is unbearable, the discomfort is horrible... I can see a light... Should I go to the light?

shade.tooltip: I'm in the shade and could really use some light...

dim_light.tooltip: The light level here is just fine... If you squint the eyes a little!

celebration.tooltip: The Frostfather is here and we've helped in making this Frostfeast special! Hooray!

tended_planter.tooltip: Aww! It's so nice to see the plants and flowers of our town are happy and well cared for!

pain_scratched.tooltip: Just a little pain, tis but a scratch!

pain_minor.tooltip: I'm a little worse for wear.

wound_medium.tooltip: This could probably use some treatment soon... I don't want to wait.

wound_high.tooltip: Ouch. I don't think that's going away by itself... Looks bad!

wound_extreme.tooltip: Ugh. I really need help with this one... It's really bad! I feel horrible!

talk_with_much_lower_renown.tooltip: [str(target_name)] is very happy with our conversation! It is great to be able to share some extra experience with them!

talk_with_lower_renown.tooltip: It's rewarding to see how far [str(target_name)] can get! Feels good to encourage them further!

talk_with_some_lower_renown.tooltip: [str(target_name)] shows a lot of promise. I'm confident that at least something good rubbed off on them after our chat today!

talk_with_equal_renown.tooltip: [str(target_name)] is always a good company! We enjoy sharing tales of our exploits and learning from each other!

talk_with_some_higher_renown.tooltip: Always good to hear advice from someone a bit more experienced like [str(target_name)]!

talk_with_higher_renown.tooltip: What a nice talk with [str(target_name)]! It's refreshing to know we have such talent among us!

talk_with_much_higher_renown.tooltip: I feel like I'm on the shoulder of giants when [str(target_name)] gives me some advice! What an accomplished individual!

levels.description: Gained by levelling up on any job.
levels.6_description: They have six job levels! They have walked the path of a master!
levels.12_description: They now have eleven job levels! More than a master, a grand master!
levels.18_description: They have sixteen job levels! What? That's amazing!
levels.30_description: They've reached thirty-one job levels, only few and dedicated souls can achieve that...
levels.60_description: They've reached the impressive mark of sixty-one job levels! That's more experience than many hearthlings combined... Such wisdom!
levels.90_description: They have ninety-one job levels - this is unbelievable! No hearthling could ever dream of such a feat... Their soul must've been touched by Cid himself!

slayer.100_description: They defeated 100 foes! Was that really necessary?
slayer.250_description: They defeated 250 foes! They can't be stopped!
slayer.600_description: They defeated 600 foes! That has to be a war crime or something...

slayer_item.100_description: It defeated 200 foes! Probably needs some polishing.
slayer_item.250_description: It defeated 450 foes! This should be enough.

goblin_killer.10_description: They killed 10 goblins! There they went, killing again!
goblin_killer.25_description: They killed 25 goblins! They're really good at it!
goblin_killer.50_description: They killed 50 goblins! That's a lot!
goblin_killer.75_description: They killed 75 goblins! Where are they finding all these goblins?!
goblin_killer.100_description: They killed 100 goblins! Perhaps they should be in therapy, reexamining their priorities.

goblin_killer_item.25_description: It killed 100 goblins! It's really good at it!
goblin_killer_item.50_description: It killed 220 goblins! That's a lot!
goblin_killer_item.75_description: It killed 500 goblins! It's unstoppable, at least by goblins!
goblin_killer_item.100_description: It killed 1000 goblins! Has its blood lust finally been sated?

orc_killer.description: Gained by killing followers of the Red Kiln.
orc_killer.5_description: They killed 5 followers of the Red Kiln!
orc_killer.10_description: They killed 10 followers of the Red Kiln! What a challenger!
orc_killer.25_description: They killed 25 followers of the Red Kiln! That requires some skills!
orc_killer.50_description: They killed 50 followers of the Red Kiln! Will they ever stop?
orc_killer.75_description: They killed 75 followers of the Red Kiln! Surely the orcs are convinced by now?
orc_killer.100_description: They killed 100 followers of the Red Kiln! They are worthy of this land!

orc_killer_item.description: Gained by killing followers of the Red Kiln.
orc_killer_item.5_description: It killed 25 followers of the Red Kiln!
orc_killer_item.10_description: It killed 90 followers of the Red Kiln! A fine weapon!
orc_killer_item.25_description: It killed 180 followers of the Red Kiln! That's something!
orc_killer_item.50_description: It killed 400 followers of the Red Kiln! It strikes fear in their hearts!
orc_killer_item.100_description: It killed 760 followers of the Red Kiln! This land is finally safe.

undead_killer.6_description: They killed 6 undead! Is 'killed' even the proper word?
undead_killer.25_description: They killed 25 undead! It feels safer already.
undead_killer.50_description: They killed 50 undead! The long night is over.

undead_killer_item.6_description: It killed 80 undead! What a blessing!
undead_killer_item.15_description: It killed 150 undead! Should be safe to go out tonight.
undead_killer_item.25_description: It killed 350 undead! It definitely did its part!
undead_killer_item.50_description: It killed 700 undead! A beacon of hope!

forest_killer.description: Gained by killing minions of the Wilds.
forest_killer.5_description: They killed 5 minions of the Wilds!
forest_killer.10_description: They killed 10 minions of the Wilds! Entlings, beware!
forest_killer.25_description: They killed 25 minions of the Wilds! Where's the howling now?
forest_killer.50_description: They killed 50 minions of the Wilds! It feels calmer out there...
forest_killer.75_description: They killed 75 minions of the Wilds! Deforestation is a crime!
forest_killer.100_description: They killed 100 minions of the Wilds! Shouldn't nature be your friend?

forest_killer_item.description: Gained by killing minions of the Wilds.
forest_killer_item.5_description: It killed 30 minions of the Wilds!
forest_killer_item.10_description: It killed 100 minions of the Wilds! Firewood, anyone?
forest_killer_item.25_description: It killed 220 minions of the Wilds! A ranger would be proud!
forest_killer_item.50_description: It killed 500 minions of the Wilds! What did nature do to it?
forest_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 minions of the Wilds! It's time to stop, perhaps?
forest_killer_item.100_description: It killed 1000 minions of the Wilds! Nature will never forget this!

titan_killer.5_description: They killed 5 corrupted beings! Such bravery!
titan_killer.10_description: They killed 10 corrupted beings! They stood against darkness!
titan_killer.15_description: They killed 15 corrupted beings! Made a difference during the last battle.
titan_killer.25_description: They killed 25 corrupted beings! They tipped the odds of light against darkness!

titan_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 corrupted beings! Worthy of a song!
titan_killer_item.15_description: It killed 15 corrupted beings! A weapon of legend!
titan_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 corrupted beings! This world shall remember its name.

ogre_killer.30_description: They killed 30 ogres! Size really doesn't matter.

ogre_killer_item.12_description: It killed 16 ogres! Maybe it was designed for that?
ogre_killer_item.30_description: It killed 32 ogres! What an epic weapon!

mountain_killer.description: Gained by killing the ogre boss.
mountain_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome ogre!

mountain_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the ogre boss.
mountain_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome ogre!

varanus_killer.description: Gained by killing varani and such.
varanus_killer.10_description: They killed 10 lizards! Careful with their teeth!
varanus_killer.25_description: They killed 25 lizards! But no dragons yet...
varanus_killer.50_description: They killed 50 lizards! The species is probably endangered!

varanus_killer_item.description: Gained by killing varani and such.
varanus_killer_item.25_description: It killed 150 lizards! Probably needs cleaning!
varanus_killer_item.50_description: It killed 400 lizards! Probably some amphibians too.

zilla_killer.description: Gained by killing the lizard boss.
zilla_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome lizard!

zilla_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the lizard boss.
zilla_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome lizard!

leader_killer.3_description: They killed 3 enemy leaders! Cut the serpent's head!
leader_killer.5_description: They killed 5 enemy leaders! Enemies won't settle here...
leader_killer.10_description: They killed 10 enemy leaders! Chaos in their ranks!

leader_killer_item.5_description: It killed 12 enemy leaders! They'll think twice now...
leader_killer_item.10_description: It killed 25 enemy leaders! It loves anarchy!

ogo_killer.description: Gained by killing the goblin boss.
ogo_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome goblin!

ogo_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the goblin boss.
ogo_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome goblin!

warchief_killer.description: Gained by defeating the orc boss.
warchief_killer.1_description: They've bested the most fearsome orc in combat!

warchief_killer_item.description: Gained by defeating the orc boss.
warchief_killer_item.1_description: It was used to best the most fearsome orc in combat!

hunter.30_description: They hunted 30 wild animals! Poor animals...
hunter.75_description: They hunted 75 wild animals! That's food for months!
hunter.150_description: They hunted 150 wild animals! Is it an obsession?
hunter.300_description: They hunted 300 wild animals! Someone really loves barbecue!
hunter.600_description: They hunted 600 wild animals! Be careful to not cause an extinction!

hunter_item.75_description: It hunted 75 wild animals! A true hunting weapon!
hunter_item.150_description: It hunted 150 wild animals! No forest is safe...
hunter_item.300_description: It hunted 300 wild animals! That's a lot of jerky.
hunter_item.600_description: It hunted 600 wild animals! Vegetarians must hate it!

defender.description: Gained by getting kill assists (being involved in combat directly with or near killed enemies).
defender.25_description: They defended the town from 25 enemies!
defender.50_description: They defended the town from 50 enemies!
defender.100_description: They defended the town from 100 enemies! Is it finally safe?
defender.500_display_name: the Long Floating Hand of the Law
defender.500_description: They defended the town from 500 enemies! What an incredibly adversarial town!
defender.1000_description: They defended the town from 1000 enemies! Perhaps a more diplomatic approach is warranted.

prolific_crafter.description: Gained by crafting a lot of items.
prolific_crafter.500_description: They crafted 500 items! Maybe they could use an assistant.
prolific_crafter.1000_description: They crafted 1000 items! They'd better have a nice pension lined up.

excellent_crafter.description: Gained by crafting items of excellent quality.

master_crafter.description: Gained by crafting items of masterwork quality.
master_crafter.1_description: They crafted a masterwork quality item! Amazing!
master_crafter.10_description: They crafted 10 masterwork quality items! Incredible!
master_crafter.25_description: They crafted 25 masterwork quality items! Who knew that was even possible?

starving.description: Gained by spending a lot of time being very hungry.
starving.2_description: They've starved for 2 days and are still standing!
starving.3_description: They've starved for 10 days! Perhaps food gathering should be slightly more prioritized.

incapacitated.description: Gained by becoming incapacitated multiple times.
incapacitated.1_description: They have walked the edge of life and death! Exciting!
incapacitated.2_description: They've been knocked down and gotten up just to be knocked back down again...
incapacitated.4_description: They've been incapacitated 4 times! Is it even possible to kill them?
incapacitated.8_description: They've been incapacitated 8 times! Will they ever learn to avoid life-threatening situations?
incapacitated.12_description: They've been incapacitated 12 times! For how long can they trick death like this?
incapacitated.20_description: They've been incapacitated 20 times! It is unbelievable how lucky (or foolish) they are.

swimming.description: Gained by spending a lot of time swimming.
swimming.1_description: They've spent a whole day swimming!
swimming.2_description: They've spent three whole days swimming! They must love water.
swimming.3_description: They've spent a whole month swimming! Such energy!
swimming.4_description: They've spent three months swimming! What?!
swimming.5_description: They've spent half a year swimming! I bet the other half was sleeping...

sweet_energy.description: Gained by eating a lot of sweet foods!
sweet_energy.1_description: They have eaten sweet foods 10 times! Still healthy enough, probably.
sweet_energy.2_description: They have eaten sweet foods 25 times! Who can resist some candy?
sweet_energy.3_description: They have eaten sweet foods 50 times! They really like it!
sweet_energy.4_description: They have eaten sweet foods 100 times! That's a lot, watch out for your sugar levels!
sweet_energy.5_description: They have eaten sweet foods 200 times! That's probably not healthy...
sweet_energy.6_description: They have eaten sweet foods 500 times! Did they even manage to sleep lately?

drunk.description: Gained by spending a lot of time quite woozy because of alcoholic drinks.
drunk.1_description: They've been more there than here for six days! That's a lot!
drunk.2_description: They've spent twelve entire days feeling quite, quite light-headed!
drunk.3_description: They've been drinking for twenty entire days. Are they even working?
drunk.4_description: They've been merry for forty-five days. That's a lot of time to think...
drunk.5_description: They've spent an entire year drinking. Honestly, we should just give them an award!

morning_after.description: Gained by exaggerating a bit too much when drinking...
morning_after.1_description: They did it! No one is perfect, everyone does it eventually... They've had too many drinks and will enjoy a nice morning after...
morning_after.2_description: They have passed the point and had a lot of drinks... Six times already! Perhaps they want some help?
morning_after.3_description: They have had a bad morning after like eighteen times... They probably enjoy it somehow!
morning_after.4_description: They have been there and back again sixty times! Live and die by the bottle, they say...

bee_swarmed.description: Gained by being swarmed by bees.
bee_swarmed.1_description: They have been swarmed by bees once. Ouch, that probably hurts...
bee_swarmed.2_description: They have been swarmed by bees 5 times now! That's a lot, they're definitely not allergic to it.
bee_swarmed.3_description: They have been swarmed by bees 15 times. Do they look like a flower or something? Bees really love them!
bee_swarmed.4_description: They have been swarmed by bees 30 times! This is crazy, maybe bees just really want to follow them. Or maybe you should make them a beekeeper's hat...

caffeinated.1_description: They say the best things in life are acquired tastes. Maybe? Either way, this first cup of coffee was certainly a bit too bitter... Or was it?
caffeinated.2_description: Not bad! Seven cups of coffee means they've had coffee at least every day in a month. I bet it tastes much better now!
caffeinated.3_description: Twenty-one cups of coffee will place them at the great mark of one cup per day for a whole season. Maybe a bit addicting?
caffeinated.4_description: After eighty-four cups of coffee one can safely say they developed a good taste for it. Especially if it was all in a single night of work...

garlic_breath.description: Gained by eating raw garlic and going around with bad breath!
garlic_breath.4_description: Their breath can kill! Like a dragon! Or perhaps just figuratively... Either way, they have earned some reputation for having a garlic breath for fifteen times!
garlic_breath.3_description: They really, really enjoy eating things that give them a bad breath, it seems... They've done it eight times!
garlic_breath.2_description: For the third time they've been with a garlic breath... They could at least go brush their teeth afterwards!
garlic_breath.1_description: Ouch! They've eaten raw garlic and now have a bad breath... It happens to everyone, don't feel so bad!

none.description: There's no ore in detection range below this point.

some.description: There's some ore below this point, but it might be pretty far down.

lots.description: There's a lot of ore below this point, or it's very close to the surface.

tons.description: You're sitting on a gold mine! (But possibly other ores than gold.)

none.description: Either there's no wilderness here, or it's eclipsed by buildings. Very few trappable animals will be found here.

little.description: This area is very tame. Try planting trees to *spruce* it up a bit. Not very many trappable animals will be found here.

some.description: There's some wilderness here, but it won't attract many animals. A few more or larger plants could help. A normal amount of trappable animals will be found here.

lots.description: This area is rather wild, and plenty of animals should be attracted to it. Many trappable animals will be found here.

tons.description: It's a veritable Garden of Eden! Trappable animals everywhere!

critters.name: Small Animals
critters.description: Small animals like rabbits or squirrels produce meat and sometimes bones, pelt or feathers

bugs.name: Bugs
bugs.description: Beetles, Bitsy Ants and other bugs will produce bug meat and chitin, a resource used in some recipes

medium.name: Common Game
medium.description: Larger than small critters, like foxes, deer and the occasional boar. They provide plenty of meat, pelts, bones and sometimes special meat chunks

big_game.name: Big Game
big_game.description: The largest animals like bears, stags and boars will provide lots of meat, rare pelts, bones and special meat chunks

exotic.name: Exotic Game
exotic.description: Unusual and uncommon creatures like large flightless birds or stray lizards can provide several unique resources like feathers or varanus skins

rabid_bear.description: There is something unnatural and wrong with this animal...

large_bear.description: This is a very large bear.

wolf_trainer.description: Whips beasts into a dangerous frenzy

sapper.description: Voluntary sapper. Wants to destroy things!

varanus.description: Taken as an egg to be a war machine

miniboss.description: Seeker of revenge, forever loyal to Ogo!

epic_undead_bow.description: Brings poisoned arrows from the grave...

undead.description: To forever serve the dragon cult...

allow_hunting.description: This hearthling will ignore any wild game they see. Click to allow them to hunt!

avoid_hunting.description: This hearthling will hunt any wild game they see. Click to forbid it!

change_pet_owner.description: Assign this pet to a new owner.

dump_quest_storage.description: Disable this quest storage and dump all the contained items on the ground.

harvest_highland_vine.description: Toggle harvest requests for all segments of this vine.

show_quest_storage_bulletin.description: Show the bulletin for the quest associated with this storage.

show_shop.description: Show this merchant's shop to trade with them.

prepare_mega_pumpkin_soup.description: With any lower grade fuel the Cook can turn this huge vegetable into a wonderful soup!

stomp_mega_cotton_pet_bed.description: Send a Worker to hammer this fluffy mega cotton until it becomes a suitable pet bed.

prepare_mega_watermelon_juice.description: By carving up a hole and stirring inside the Cook can turn this huge fruit into a lot of wonderful juice!

add_thatch_to_bed.description: Make this bed a little more comfortable by adding some thatching to it!

cheese_vat_drain.description: Order the Shepherd to remove the leftover whey and treat the curds, forming fresh cheese!

carve_furniture.description: Order the Carpenter to transform this big piece of old wood into something new and fashionable!

sculpt_block.description: Order a Worker to chisel this boulder into a nice and useful block to be carried home and worked by a Mason!

sculpt_statue.description: Order the Mason to put their best skills to use and create something beautiful out of this block of stone!

stunt_growth.description:
Order a Worker, Farmer, or Herbalist to stunt this tree.
A stunted tree will never grow past its current size.

Very useful for gardening and landscaping!

release_fish.description: Let the little creature be free! Just make sure it's in the water...

open_door.description: Open this door and leave it, everyone will be able to go through!

close_door.description: Close this door, preventing animals or creatures from going through.

build_well_roof.description: Use a crafted Water Well Roof of the same kind to add a fancy roof to make your citizens happier and your water always fresh!

build_well_clay.description: Order this simple well to be upgraded into a clay water well. Doing so requires Clay Water Well Parts, a refined item that can be crafted by the Potter.

build_well_stone.description: Order this simple well to be upgraded into a stone water well. Doing so requires Stone Water Well Parts, a refined item that can be crafted by the Mason.

build_well_wood.description: Order this simple well to be upgraded into a wooden water well. Doing so requires Wooden Water Well Parts, a refined item that can be crafted by the Carpenter.

build_well_roof_clay.description: Use a crafted Clay Water Well Roof to add a fancy roof to make your citizens happier and your water always fresh! The roof needs to be installed by a worker or the potter.

build_well_roof_stone.description: Use a crafted Stone Water Well Roof to add a fancy roof to make your citizens happier and your water always fresh! The roof needs to be installed by a worker or the mason.

build_well_roof_wood.description: Use a crafted Wooden Water Well Roof to add a fancy roof to make your citizens happier and your water always fresh! The roof needs to be installed by a worker or the carpenter.

fermenting_carboy_fill_unfermented_mead.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with unfermented mead! This Carboy will continue producing Mead unless a new command is given.

fermenting_carboy_fill_unfermented_mead_.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with unfermented fruity mead! This Carboy will continue producing Fruity Mead unless a new command is given.

fermenting_vat_fill_wort_ale.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vat with ale wort to start brewing! It will continue producing Ale unless a new command is given.

fermenting_vat_fill_wort_beer.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vat with beer wort to start brewing! It will continue producing Beer unless a new command is given.

open_present.description: Order someone to come and open this beautiful present. Merry Frostfeast!

swap_model_variant.description:
The decorations must be perfect!

Click to roll a new, random appearance for this object!
If placed on a wall, the object must be moved to the ground level first.

fermenting_carboy_fill_vinegar.display_name: Produce Vinegar from Unfermented Mead Vinegar
fermenting_carboy_fill_vinegar.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with unfermented mead vinegar. The ingredient will then turn into two jugs of vinegar! This Carboy will continue producing Vinegar unless a new command is given.

fermenting_vat_fill_vinegar.display_name: Produce Vinegar from Unfermented Brew Vinegar
fermenting_vat_fill_vinegar.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vat with unfermented brew vinegar. The ingredient will then turn into one jug of vinegar! It will continue producing Vinegar unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_vinegar.display_name: Produce Vinegar from Unfermented Wine Vinegar
wine_cask_fill_vinegar.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting cask with unfermented wine vinegar. The ingredient will then turn into three jugs of vinegar! The Cask will continue producing Vinegar unless a new command is given.

cheese_vat_fill_cream.description: Order the Shepherd to pour a bowl of cream in this cheese vat to let it ferment into sour cream after a day or two.

wine_cask_fill_must_berry.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with berry must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Berry Wine unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_must_apple.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with apple must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Cider unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_must_cherry.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with cherry must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Cherry Wine unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_must_date.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with date must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Date Wine unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_must_pear.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with pear must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Perry unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_must_plum.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with plum must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Plum Wine unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_must_prickly_pear.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vessel with prickly pear must! This Wine Cask will continue producing Prickly Pear Wine unless a new command is given.

wine_cask_fill_vinegar_2.display_name: Produce Vinegar from Unfermented Juice Vinegar
wine_cask_fill_vinegar_2.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting cask with unfermented juice vinegar. The ingredient will then turn into one jug of vinegar! The Cask will continue producing Vinegar unless a new command is given.

upgrade_comfy_bed.description: Order a worker to replace this bed with a Comfy Bed created by the Carpenter. A craft order will be given if no Comfy Bed is found in the town's inventory. The bed owner will remain the same.

upgrade_stone_comfy_bed.description: Order a worker to replace this bed with a Stone Comfy Bed created by the Mason. A craft order will be given if no Stone Comfy Bed is found in the town's inventory. The bed owner will remain the same.

upgrade_clay_comfy_bed.description: Order a worker to replace this bed with a Clay Comfy Bed created by the Potter. A craft order will be given if no Clay Comfy Bed is found in the town's inventory. The bed owner will remain the same.

upgrade_marble_comfy_bed.description: Order a worker to replace this bed with a Marble Comfy Bed created by the Mason. A craft order will be given if no Marble Comfy Bed is found in the town's inventory. The bed owner will remain the same.

upgrade_ornate_comfy_bed.description: Order a worker to replace this bed with an Ornate Comfy Bed created by the Carpenter. A craft order will be given if no Ornate Comfy Bed is found in the town's inventory. The bed owner will remain the same.

upgrade_porcelain_comfy_bed.description: Order a worker to replace this bed with a Porcelain Comfy Bed created by the Potter. A craft order will be given if no Porcelain Comfy Bed is found in the town's inventory. The bed owner will remain the same.

cheese_vat_fill_cottage.description: Order the Shepherd to pour a curdling mixture in this cheese vat to start the production of cheese! When using this option, the vat will automatically request to be harvested once the product reaches the Cottage Cheese stage.

cheese_vat_fill_fresh.description: Order the Shepherd to pour a curdling mixture in this cheese vat to start the production of cheese! When using this option, the vat will automatically request to be harvested once the product reaches the Fresh Cheese stage.

cheese_vat_fill_mild.description: Order the Shepherd to pour a curdling mixture in this cheese vat to start the production of cheese! When using this option, the vat will automatically request to be harvested once the product reaches the Mild Cheese stage.

cheese_vat_fill_aged.description: Order the Shepherd to pour a curdling mixture in this cheese vat to start the production of cheese! When using this option, the vat will automatically request to be harvested only when the product reaches the last stage, Aged Cheese.

drying_bed_fill_coffee.description: Order the Brewer to rest a crate of sorted coffee cherries on this drying bed! After a week or so, the Brewer will be able to hull the dried cherries and collect Green Coffee Beans!

drying_bed_fill_green_tea.description: Order the Brewer to rest a crate of steamed tea leaves on this drying bed! When using this option, the bed will automatically request to be harvested once the product reaches the Green Tea Leaves stage.

drying_bed_fill_black_tea.description: Order the Brewer to rest a crate of steamed tea leaves on this drying bed! When using this option, the bed will automatically request to be harvested once the product reaches the Black Tea Leaves stage.

fermenting_vat_fill_wort_beer_opaque.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vat with opaque beer wort to start brewing! It will continue producing Opaque Beer unless a new command is given.

fermenting_vat_fill_wort_beer_white.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vat with white beer wort to start brewing! It will continue producing White Beer unless a new command is given.

fermenting_vat_fill_wort_ale_pale.description: Order the Brewer to fill this fermenting vat with pale ale wort to start brewing! It will continue producing Pale Ale unless a new command is given.

exploration_garden_refill.description: The Herbalist is going to refill this garden with fertilizer so it can be used to find new crops again! This command is active by default.

goblin_camp.description: Order a hearthling to come and restore the terrain. It is recommended that the entire camp is cleared and all buildings or fortifications are removed before issuing this command!

goblin_camp_destroy.description: Order someone to finish off this camp once and for all!

empty_container.description: Order this container to be emptied so a different production can be selected. The unprocessed material will be retrieved and can be used again!

set_up_display.x2_description: Order a Worker, Weaver or the professional that crafted this furniture piece to add any type of Bolt of Cloth and turn it into a shop display for two items!
set_up_display.x1_description: Order a Worker, Weaver or the professional that crafted this furniture piece to add any type of Bolt of Cloth and turn it into a shop display for one item!
set_up_display.x3_description: Order a Worker, Weaver or the professional that crafted this furniture piece to add any type of Bolt of Cloth and turn it into a shop display for three items!
set_up_display.x4_description: Order a Worker, Weaver or the professional that crafted this furniture piece to add any type of Bolt of Cloth and turn it into a shop display for four items!

prepare_pottage.description:
Order someone to add any lower grade fuel and some Broth to begin preparing tasty pottage!

The pottage can be improved by adding different ingredients after it's started: vegetables, meat, grains... Each level will provide a better food serving!

When all the servings of a certain level run out, the pottage will go back to the previous level instead of getting empty! It will only go empty again if the first (or last) levels are completely consumed!

embark_wagon_harvest.description: Order this object to be dismantled. Some of the materials will be recovered!

slaughter.description: Harvest this wild animal for some of its resources.
slaughter.disabled_description: This wild animal is unfit for slaughtering.

teleport_quest_storage.description: If the quest storage was spawned on a bad or inconvenient location, use this command to choose a new place for it to be teleported to.

toggle_water_gate_off.description: Click to disable, blocking the flow of water.

toggle_water_gate_on.description: Click to enable, allowing the flow of water.

toggle_training_off.description: This hearthling is currently allowed to train. Click to forbid it!

toggle_training_on.description: This hearthling is currently not allowed to train. Click to allow it!

toggle_planter_harvest_on.description: This planter will currently not be harvested when possible. Click to enable harvesting!

toggle_planter_harvest_off.description: This planter will currently be harvested when possible. Click to disable harvesting!

enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of this renewable resource whenever it becomes ready again.

disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of this renewable resource.

one_handed_footman.description:
This Footman currently prefers using a mainhand weapon and a medium shield. Click to change!
  • A balanced role ideal for a single soldier or small groups
  • Certain mainhand weapons will inflict negative conditions on their enemies, like hamstrung or flanked

two_handed_footman.description:
This Footman currently prefers using a two-handed weapon. Click to change!
  • This role is more fragile however has the highest damage output for a Footman
  • Two-handed weapons can cause open wounds, damaging foes over time

dual_wield_footman.description:
This Footman currently prefers using a mainhand weapon with an off-hand weapon. Click to change!
  • Off-hand weapons have lower damage but can put enemies out of balance, lowering their inflicted damage
  • This versatile role is very good for support

one_handed_knight.description:
This Knight currently prefers using a mainhand weapon and a heavy shield. Click to change!
  • A very defensive role, efficient in holding the attention of the enemies
  • If using an impact weapon, the Knight can also lower the armor of their foes

two_handed_knight.description:
This Knight currently prefers using a two-handed weapon. Click to change!
  • Knight polearms are excellent for crowd control, inflicting fear upon multiple enemies
  • They can't use shields when using polearms, greatly reducing their tanking capabilities

bow_archer.description:
This Archer currently prefers using a bow. Click to change!
  • Bows are fast and excellent against crowds

crossbow_archer.description:
This Archer currently prefers using a crossbow. Click to change!
  • Crossbows have high damage and armor penetration but are much slower
  • They can't use the Double Shot ability when using crossbows

support_cleric.description:
This Cleric currently prefers using a scepter and a light shield. Click to change!
  • They will engage enemies on melee combat
  • They will focus on support spells that weaken and hinder their foes
  • They can't use any direct healing spells, only their healing aura

healing_cleric.description:
This Cleric currently prefers using a healing tome. Click to change!
  • They will try to keep some distance and use weak ranged attacks
  • They will focus on powerful healing spells and strengthening their allies

manage_parties.description: Manage patrol banners and guard zones (not yet implemented) for this party.

remove_patrol_banner.description: Completely erase the selected patrol banner from this route.

move_patrol_banner.description: Place the selected patrol banner somewhere else, modifying the route.

slow_bolts.description: Currently using spiky bolts, which slows enemy movement speed. Click to swap between bolt types.

default_bolts.description: Using normal bolts. Click to swap to a different bolt type

capture_fish.description: Order the Trapper to capture this fish instead of harvesting it. A captured fish will remain contained in a small crate that can be placed somewhere else for release.

capture_bees.description: Order the Herbalist to capture the bees from this nest. Captive bees will remain contained in a small crate until they are used for crafting a Bee Skep.

bee_skep.description: Order the Herbalist to use a box of Captive Bees to start a colony inside this skep. Captive Bees can be obtained from wild Bee Nests that will sometimes drop from trees when you cut them.

place_fish_trap.description: Order the placement of fish traps. A Fish Trap can only be placed on water edges and will work more efficiently when distant from other Fish Traps and with lots of water available around or underneath it.
place_fish_trap.tip_title: Click to place a fish trap at that location
place_fish_trap.tip_description: Traps will automatically rotate to face the water, but you can also switch between valid rotations with [str(left_binding)] and [str(right_binding)] keys

adjust_gearbox_axles.description: Extend/collapse axles from this item; it can't be moved or undeployed while any are extended
adjust_gearbox_axles.tip_title: Click to extend or collapse an axle; right-click to finish
adjust_gearbox_axles.tip_description: Move the mouse or use keyboard keys [[str(left_binding)]] and [[str(right_binding)]] to rotate between positions and [[str(shorter_binding)]] and [[str(longer_binding)]] to change length

reset_gearbox_axles.description: Collapse all axles extending from this item; it can't be moved or undeployed while any are extended

place_water_pipe.description: Extend a water pipe from this item; it can't be moved or undeployed while extended
place_water_pipe.tip_description: Move the mouse or use keyboard keys [[str(left_binding)]] and [[str(right_binding)]] to rotate between positions and [[str(shorter_binding)]] and [[str(longer_binding)]] to change length

remove_water_pipe.description: Remove the water pipe extending from this item; it can't be moved or undeployed while extended

enable_flow.description: Enable the flow of water into and/or out of this item

disable_flow.description: Disable the flow of water into and/or out of this item

collect_bees.description: Order the Herbalist to start a new bee colony from this skep by developing some eggs into a new queen. This action requires one unit of Royal Jelly and the existing skep will not be able to produce for a few days.

toggle_fish_trap_capture.description: This trap is currently set to have its prey harvested. Click here to change!

toggle_fish_trap_harvest.description: This trap is currently set to capture the animal in a small box so it can be moved elsewhere. Click here to change!

use_recipe.description: Use this to learn a new crafting recipe. This will destroy the item.
use_recipe.bulletin_title_single: The [str(i18n_data.job_name)] has unlocked a new recipe!

always_on.description:
This light source will never go out.
Useful for illuminating dark interiors, mine shafts, caves...

never.description: This light source will remain unlit until a new policy is chosen.

when_cold.description:
This light source will only be lit on days with cold weather.
Useful for creating additional heat points that you might only want lit for the winter, like street braziers.

when_cold_or_dark.description:
This light source will be lit on days with cold weather and/or whenever it is dark.
The default behavior for all the light sources that are also sources of warmth.

(It is considered dark when it is night or during certain weather types)

when_dark.description:
This light source will only be lit when it is dark.
The default behavior for all the light sources that re not sources of warmth.

(It is considered dark when it is night or during certain weather types)

quest_storage_toggle_on.description: Click to Enable this Quest Storage container, allowing it to receive the pertinent items for its related quest!

quest_storage_toggle_off.description: Click to Disable this Quest Storage container, preventing it from receiving the pertinent items for its related quest!

broad_arrows.description: Currently using broad arrows, which inflicts "Major Open Wounds" upon hitting their target, dealing a lot of additional damage over time. Click to swap between arrow types.

hamstrung.description: Moving slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

out_of_balance.description: Inflicting less damage due to being out of balance.

lightweight_gear.description: This hearthling is wearing lighter and more agile equipment!

fracture.description: Armor reduced due to shattering damage.

open_wounds.description: Bleeding 6 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

shaken.description: Courage is reduced, more likely to despair and run away.

major_fracture.description: Armor greatly reduced due to shattering damage.

minor_fracture.description: Armor slightly reduced due to shattering damage.

major_hamstrung.description: Moving much slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

minor_hamstrung.description: Moving slightly slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

minor_open_wounds.description: Bleeding 3 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

major_open_wounds.description: Bleeding 10 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

minor_out_of_balance.description: Inflicting a bit less damage due to being out of balance.

major_out_of_balance.description: Inflicting a lot less damage due to being out of balance.

major_shaken.description: Courage is greatly reduced, very likely to despair and run away.

minor_shaken.description: Courage is mildly reduced, might despair and run away.

ice_trap.description: Can't move! Stunned by an ice trap!

not_in_water.description: This creature is not really adapted to being on land... It has consequences!

holiday_cheer.description: Woo! This hearthling is enjoying the holidays with slighly increased compassion and speed!

thorns.description: This hearthling will inflict damage to enemies that attack them.

upset_belly.description: Very uncomfortable. Speed, Diligence and Willpower are reduced.

lovely_meal.description: Eating well is motivating! Diligence and Willpower fairly increased.

armor_light.description:
This hearthling is lightly armored and has no speed penalty but reduced courage and menace.
  • No speed penalty
  • Courage and Menace are slightly reduced
  • Minimally improved odds of resisting certain inflictable conditions

armor_medium.description:
This hearthling wears medium armor.
  • Slight speed penalty
  • Courage is slightly increased
  • Slightly improved odds of resisting certain inflictable conditions

armor_heavy.description:
This hearthling is heavily armored.
  • Fair speed penalty
  • Courage and Menace are increased
  • Fairly improved odds of resisting certain inflictable conditions

shield_heavy.description: Defense and courage are increased but speed is slightly reduced.

chilly_debuff.description: It's a bit cold out here... Might not work as diligently!

cold_debuff.description: It's really cold today! I should get a roof above my head.

animal_cold_debuff.description:
Baby, it's cold outside.
  • This animal will take damage over time if unsheltered
  • This animal will reproduce somewhat slower
  • This animal won't produce as much

freezing_debuff.description:
I'm freezing out here! I need warmth and I need it fast!
  • This hearthling will take damage over time down to 20% of their health if outside
  • This hearthling might be exposed to Frostbites if not wearing clothing that provides cold protection
  • Damage taken is both reduced and slowed down by clothing that provides chilly and cold protection

animal_freezing_debuff.description:
That animal should definitely be sheltered...
  • This animal will take damage over time if unsheltered
  • This animal will reproduce a lot slower
  • This animal won't produce as much

hot_debuff.description: Too sweaty to work. Could use some refreshment!

animal_hot_debuff.description:
The heat is punishing, even for the animals!
  • This animal will reproduce slower
  • This animal won't produce as much

sweltering_debuff.description:
I'm sweltering... Should stay indoors or have something refreshing to drink...
  • This hearthling has an increasing chance of getting a sunstroke the longer they stay exposed to the heat
  • Wearing some sort of head protection like hats, helmets or hoods will prevent heatstrokes

animal_sweltering_debuff.description:
This heat is unbearable for animals!
  • This animal will reproduce much slower
  • This animal won't produce as much

soaked_debuff.description: I'm really wet, my clothes are dripping!

animal_soaked_debuff.description: Not even animals enjoy being this wet.

sunstroke_debuff.description:
So warm... Getting dizzy... I Need refreshment... NOW!
  • This hearthling will take damage over time until they are knocked unconscious
  • Being sheltered will allow this effect to slowly fade away
  • Entering the water or drinking something refreshing will remove this effect

freezing_water_debuff.description:
Oof! This water is so cold, I shouldn't be here!
  • This hearthling will take damage over time down to 10% of their health while in the water

refreshing_water_buff.description: The water is nice and very refreshing!

chilly_resist_buff.description:
This hearthling is protected against chilly weather.
  • Damage from Freezing weather is very slightly reduced

cold_resist_buff.description:
This hearthling is protected against cold weather.
  • Damage from Freezing weather is reduced, and they're immune to Frostbites

freezing_resist_buff.description:
This hearthling is protected against freezing weather.
  • Provides immunity to Frostbites

hot_resist_buff.description: Light materials, good airflow or just a handy hat... Should be enough. This hearthling is protected from hot weather.

sweltering_resist_buff.description: Efficient protection against the sun and blazing winds will keep this hearthling safe from the heat of extremely hot weather.

refreshed_buff.description: This was refreshing! Should stay fresh for a while.

warmed_buff.description: I can feel the warmth and it is so cozy! Should feel good for a while.

warmth_source_buff.description: Home is where the hearth is...

chilly_debuff_npc.description: Speed and Damage are slightly reduced.

cold_debuff_npc.description: Speed, Willpower and Damage are somewhat reduced.

freezing_debuff_npc.description: Speed, Willpower and Damage are severely reduced.

hailstorm_debuff.description: Ouch! I'm getting hit by tiny ice pebbles! It's rather annoying...

whiteout_debuff.description:
I can't see anything! I can't even tell if my eyes are burning from the cold or the brightness!
  • This hearthling is blinded and lost in the middle of the whiteout and will slow down and feel hunger much faster
  • When this debuff is stacked enough, panic may take over and they'll just wander around until it's over or something worse happens...
  • Seek shelter immediately! Try disabling jobs or calling the alarm to force all hearthlings inside
whiteout_debuff.npc_description: Can't see much, can't do much!

compassionate_shepherd_buff.description: Taken care of by a compassionate shepherd. This animal will heal over time, produce more resources, and breed faster.

warm_belly.description:
All warm and fuzzy inside, it was delicious! Willpower is increased.
  • This hearthling is protected from chilly and cold weather for some time
  • Damage from freezing weather is slightly reduced

refreshed_belly.description:
This was refreshing, I feel renewed! Diligence is increased.
  • This hearthling is protected from hot weather for some time

sweet_energy.description:
Woo, sugar rush! Diligence is increased, Speed is slightly increased. The need for sleep is slightly decreased.
  • Crafting is slightly faster

mellow.description:
It's good and it's not that strong! Courage is slightly increased. Willpower and Stamina are slightly decreased.
  • This hearthling will want to engage in conversations a bit more than usual

light_headed.description:
Having a merry time! Maybe a bit too much... Oh, well. Courage is increased. Diligence, Willpower, Speed and Stamina are slightly decreased.
  • Crafting takes longer and has less chances of producing high quality items
  • This hearthling is less menacing to enemies
  • This hearthling will want to engage in conversations and sleep a lot more than usual

quite_woozy.description:
Is the world spinning or is it just me? Courage is greatly increased. Diligence, Willpower, Speed and Stamina are decreased.
  • Crafting takes longer and has less chances of producing high quality items
  • This hearthling is much less menacing to enemies
  • This hearthling will want to engage in a lot more conversations
  • This hearthling will have the 'The Morning after...' effect applied when this effect expires

morning_after.description:
Ouch... Next time I shouldn't exaggerate so much! Diligence, Willpower and Stamina are greatly reduced.
  • Crafting takes longer
  • This hearthling will not be willing to start conversations

merry_time.description: The hearthling's mood is greatly increased for some time.

fruity_flavors.description:
Enjoyed a delicious fruit beverage! Willpower and Compassion are increased.
  • Crafting is slightly faster

harmony_minor.description:
Hmm... I feel a gentle peace inside. Diligence and Curiosity are slightly increased.
  • Crafting is a little slower but with slightly increased quality
  • Experience gain is slightly increased

harmony.description:
Perfectly balanced, as all things should be. Diligence and Curiosity are increased.
  • Crafting is somewhat slower but with quite increased quality
  • Experience gain is increased

harmony_major.description:
Interior tranquility is the key to understanding oneself. Diligence and Curiosity are quite increased.
  • Crafting is quite slower but with incredibly increased quality
  • Experience gain is greatly increased

thirsty.description: I could probably use something to drink...

very_thirsty.description: My mouth is dry! I really need something to drink!

lovely_drink.description: Nothing more revigorating than having your favorite drink! Stamina and Compassion fairly increased.

toxin_resist.description: This hearthling is protected against weak poisons, weak toxins (negative effects) and minor infections.

minor_poison.description:
A weak, non-lethal poison. Will last some hours. Muscle and Willpower are fairly reduced.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Poison (Low)
  • üíä This poison can be treated with Leeches or Weak Antidote; it is removed if the hearthling is incapacitated
  • üí¢ Losing 5% of their health points every 30 minutes
  • ‚ùó This poison will only damage them down to 75% of their total health

poison.description:
A non-lethal but dangerous poison. Might last a day or so. Muscle and Willpower are reduced.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Poison (Medium)
  • üíä This poison needs to be treated with at least an Antidote to be completely removed with a single treatment; it is removed if the hearthling is incapacitated
  • üí¢ Losing 5% of their health points every 20 minutes
  • ‚ùó This poison will damage them down to only 30% of their total health

major_poison.description:
A tough, lethal poison. Can last a couple of days. Muscle and Willpower are greatly reduced.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Poison (High)
  • üíä This poison needs to be treated with at least a Strong Antidote to be completely removed with a single treatment; incapacitation will not remove this poison and it can cause the hearthling to be incapacitated over and over again until they're cured
  • üí¢ Losing 5% of their health points every 15 minutes
  • ‚ùó This poison can damage them until they are knocked unconscious and require constant assistance or treatment

toxin_sleeping.description: This is a weak toxin. This negative effect sticks for longer the more it is applied and will rapidly reduce its target's consciousness, putting them to sleep.

toxin_panic.description: This is a weak toxin. This negative effect reduces courage, induces panic, and can be stacked.

toxin_starvation.description: This is a moderate toxin. The longer this negative effect affects someone, the more hungry they will be! Watch out for starvation!

toxin_weakness.description: This is a moderate toxin. The more this negative effect stacks, the lower the muscle and damage output of the intoxicated hearthling will be.

toxin_healing_received.description: This is a strong toxin. The higher this negative effect is stacked, the less effective healing spells and abilities will be when used on this hearthling.

toxin_paralysis.description: This is a strong toxin. The intoxicated hearthling will remain paralyzed in place while affected by this negative effect.

minor_infection.description:
Feels dizzy and faint... I think one of my wounds is slightly infected. Stamina and Willpower are slightly lowered.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Infection (Medium)
  • üíä This infection can be treated with Leeches or a Simple Fever Cordial
  • ‚ùó High Fever may pass on its own but can also turn into an infection if stacked enough

infection.description:
Eww! Things are looking really bad. I need help or this will get worse! Stamina, Muscle and Willpower are quite lowered.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Infection (High)
  • üíä This infection needs to be treated with at least a Fever Cordial to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùó An infection may pass on its own but can become very dangerous if stacked high enough

major_infection.description:
The infection is out of control and this hearthling's life is urgently threatened. Body and Willpower are completely lowered.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Infection (Extreme)
  • üíä This infection needs to be treated with at least a Fever Cordial to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùó This hearthling will take a lot of damage over time until the infection is removed

undead_infection.description:
A nasty wound caused by an undead is festering in unnatural fashion...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Undead Infection (Medium)
  • üíä This infection needs to be treated with at least an Undead Cordial to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùó An undead infection will pass on its own but can be dangerous while it lasts
  • üí¢ Prevents natural health recovery via Willpower

spring_flavors.description:
Ahh! Nothing like cool and fresh water straight from the source! Diligence and Compassion are increased.
  • Crafting has a slightly increased quality chance
  • Experience gain is slightly increased

bee_attack_resist.description: Stings won't bee a problem for this hearthling.

hearth_tonic_buff.description: Courage, Menace and Muscle are increased. A radiant aura of light encompasses the hearthling, slowly healing them over time.

hearth_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
The Hearth magic is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural... And they are not without a cost.
  • Spirit is reduced
  • Healing received is reduced

harmony_transcendental.description:
It's a magical level of enlightment. Diligence and Curiosity are very increased.
  • Crafting is much slower but with incredibly increased quality
  • Experience gain is vastly increased

divine_flavors.description:
Deliciously inspired by the power of the Hearth! Muscle and Stamina are increased.
  • This hearthling will heal 10% of their total health every 30 minutes

shepherd_crook_corn.description: Compassion and inspiration are increased. Crafting is faster.

merry_time.description:
Feeling delighted with a really amazing feast! Willpower and Compassion are greatly increased.
  • Experience gain is increased
  • This hearthling has a much higher chance of crafting things with increased quality

scratch.description:
Owie! It hurts a little but it's just a nick...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Cut (Low)
  • üíöüîª Effective maximum health is very slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any ointment or any bandage
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take some time

small_cut.description:
It hurts a lot! It will be fine... Right?
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Cut (Medium)
  • üíõüîª Effective maximum health is slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any bandage, Coarse Bandage or better
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take a very long time
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause High Fever

deep_slash.description:
Uh, that doesn't look good...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Cut (High)
  • üíúüîª Effective maximum health is somewhat lowered
  • üíä This wound can be treated with any bandage but requires at least a Light Bandage to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause Infection
  • üí´ Treating this wound has a small chance of permanently adding the condition Scary Scar

ugly_rend.description:
Ouch! Ow! So painful, I can't even look at it!
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Cut (Extreme)
  • üñ§üîª Effective maximum health is quite lowered
  • üíä This wound can be treated with any bandage but requires at least a Heavy Bandage to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause Infection
  • üí´ Treating this wound has a small chance of permanently adding the condition Scary Scar

bruise.description:
It's all purple, bumpy and aching... Could be worse, I guess.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Impact (Low)
  • üíöüîª Effective maximum health is very slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any ointment or any compress
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take some time

severe_concussion.description:
Oh, woah. What a knock, I'm a bit dizzy...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Impact (Medium)
  • üíõüîª Effective maximum health is slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any compress, Simple Compress or better
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take a very long time

crushing_blow.description:
Gah! This hurts and looks... Very swollen.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Impact (High)
  • üíúüîª Effective maximum health is somewhat lowered
  • üíä This wound can be treated with any compress but requires at least an Herbal Compress to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause High Fever

broken_bone.description:
Ugh! I think I broke something...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Impact (Extreme)
  • üñ§üîª Effective maximum health is quite lowered
  • üíä This wound can be treated with any compress but requires at least a Tough Compress to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause High Fever

minor_sting.description:
Ouch! Pointy, but luckily a superficial wound...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Piercing (Low)
  • üíöüîª Effective maximum health is very slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any ointment or any salve
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take some time

prick.description:
Like a little hole! It hurts...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Piercing (Medium)
  • üíõüîª Effective maximum health is slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any salve, Rough Salve or better
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take a very long time
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause High Fever

mean_stab.description:
Uh-oh... This looks deep. I need help!
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Piercing (High)
  • üíúüîª Effective maximum health is somewhat lowered
  • üíä This wound can be treated with any salve but requires at least a Common Salve to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause Infection

nasty_gash.description:
Ugh... I hope that didn't go through me.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Piercing (Extreme)
  • üñ§üîª Effective maximum health is quite lowered
  • üíä This wound can be treated with any salve but requires at least a Neat Salve to be completely removed with a single treatment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause Infection
  • üí´ Treating this wound has a small chance of permanently adding the condition Scary Scar

frostbite.description:
Ew! Doesn't look good, I shouldn't stay out in the cold for too long...
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Cold (Medium)
  • üíõüîª Effective maximum health is slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any salve, Rough Salve or better
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üí´ Treating this wound has a small chance of permanently adding the condition Frostbitten

light_burn.description:
That was way too hot!
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Fire (Low)
  • üíöüîª Effective maximum health is very slightly lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any ointment or any bandage
  • ‚è≥ This wound will also heal on its own, but it will take some time

bad_burn.description:
That was way too hot!
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Fire (High)
  • üíúüîª Effective maximum health is somewhat lowered
  • üíä This wound will be removed by treatment with any ointment or any bandage but might require multiple applications before being removed
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üí´ Treating this wound has a small chance of permanently adding the condition Scary Scar

corrupted_laceration.description:
This wound looks... unnatural. Scary!
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Corrupted (Extreme)
  • üñ§üîª Effective maximum health is quite lowered
  • üíä This wound can only be treated with a Hearthbud Ointment
  • ‚ùå This wound will never heal on its own
  • üå°Ô∏è If left untreated, this wound may cause Infection
  • üí´ Treating this wound has a small chance of permanently adding the condition Torn Soul

scary_scar.description: This hearthling proudly displays their scars. Menace is slightly & permanently increased.

battle_scarred.description: When you have more scars than you can count, wear them like a trophy! Menace and Courage are permanently increased.

frostbitten.description: Facing a blizzard head-on is an unforgettable experience that has left me somewhat... Incomplete. Well, lesson learned! Muscle and Speed are slightly & permanently reduced.

torn_soul.description: I'm still here... But I have never been the same since I was wounded by evil creatures. Spirit is permanently reduced.

cold_tonic_buff.description: An aura of cold involves this hearthling, protecting them from hot weather.

cold_tonic_side_effect_buff.description:
This hearthling's body is tired of magically deflecting so much heat to keep them cool.
  • Body is reduced

courage_tonic_buff.description: Courage is slightly increased for a while.

courage_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
The illusory courage has left some doubts in this hearthling's heart.
  • Diligence and Menace are reduced

courage_tonic_2_buff.description: Courage and Armor are increased for a while.

courage_tonic_2_worn_off_buff.description:
The illusory courage and toughness has left lots of doubts in this hearthling's heart.
  • Diligence, Stamina and Menace are reduced

creativity_tonic_buff.description: Crafting Speed is slightly increased for a while.

creativity_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
The exhausting pace has caused this hearthling to feel a bit less diligent for a while.
  • Diligence is reduced

creativity_tonic_2_buff.description: Crafting Speed and Inspiration are increased for a while.

creativity_tonic_2_worn_off_buff.description:
The creative boom is fruitful but very exhaustive on the soul.
  • Spirit and Diligence are reduced

curiosity_tonic_buff.description: Curiosity and Experience Gain are slightly increased for a while.

curiosity_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
This hearthlings' intellect is exhausted after forced enlightment.
  • Mind and Speed are reduced
