energy_tonic_buff.description: Speed and Diligence are slightly increased for a while. Sleepiness is reduced.

energy_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
The energy boost from the tonic has its own price on the body after a while...
  • Speed is reduced

energy_tonic_2_buff.description: Speed and Diligence are increased for a while. Sleepiness is reduced. This hearthling will focus more on working and engage in less conversations with others.

energy_tonic_2_worn_off_buff.description:
Working and running around with an unnatural pace forced this hearthling to their limit.
  • Body is reduced
  • Sleepiness is increased

nightsight_tonic_buff.description: The eyes of this hearthling are magically enhanced, allowing them to see in the dark without penalties for a while.

nightsight_tonic_side_effect_buff.description: Sudden changes to how light and darkness are perceived has confused this hearthling's body clock. They'll feel more sleepy than usual.

stamina_tonic_buff.description: Stamina is slightly increased for a while, boosting their health.

stamina_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
After the toughening effect passes, this tonic leaves a feeling of emptiness inside...
  • Diligence and Courage are reduced

stamina_tonic_2_buff.description: Stamina is increased for a while, greatly boosting their health. Healing received is also increased.

stamina_tonic_2_worn_off_buff.description:
There's a certain numbness creeping over this hearthling as their body returns to normal.
  • Diligence, Speed and Spirit are reduced

strength_tonic_buff.description: Muscle is slightly increased for a while, boosting their combat damage.

strength_tonic_worn_off_buff.description:
This hearthlings muscles are sore and tired!
  • Muscle and Menace are reduced

strength_tonic_2_buff.description: Muscle is increased for a while, greatly boosting their combat damage. Passive resistance to some inflictable conditions is also increased.

strength_tonic_2_worn_off_buff.description:
This hearthling feels weaker and more tired than normal after the enhancements of a strong strength tonic.
  • Body and Menace are reduced
  • Sleepiness is increased

warmth_tonic_buff.description: An aura of heat involves this hearthling, protecting them from cold weather.

warmth_tonic_side_effect_buff.description:
Too much heat being contained within this hearthling's body causes their head to feel heavier and hot.
  • Mind is reduced

water_resist_tonic_buff.description: This hearthling is surrounded by a thin magical layer that will prevent them from getting soaked.

water_resist_tonic_side_effect_buff.description: The added impermeability has caused this hearthling to feel thirstier slightly more often.

water_resist_tonic_2_buff.description: This hearthling is protected by a much stronger magical layer that will entirely avoid water, allowing them to even run underwater!

water_resist_tonic_2_side_effect_buff.description: Excessive impermeability has caused this hearthling to feel thirstier a lot more quickly.

minor_flanked.description: Menace and healing received are somewhat lowered.

major_flanked.description: Menace and healing received are greatly lowered.

flanked.description: Menace and healing received are quite lowered.

rebuked.description: Courage is slightly reduced, healing received is quite lowered.

minor_rebuked.description: Courage is insignificantly reduced, healing received is somewhat lowered.

major_rebuked.description: Courage is somewhat reduced, healing received is greatly lowered.

undead_smite.description:
A powerful charge of holy power upon an unholy foe, dealing catastrophic damage!
  • Has a small, random chance of happening
  • Can only affect the Undead

undead_turn.description:
A burst of sacred energy that will somewhat damage and also stun the enemy for a moment.
  • Has a small, random chance of happening
  • Can only affect the Undead

recently_magically_treated_buff.description:
This hearthling has recently received magical medical attention and will need to rest before further treatment.
  • No new infections will develop while this effect is active
  • Existing infections will remain and require specific treatment

recently_treated_buff.description:
This hearthling has recently received medical attention and will need to rest before further treatment.
  • No new infections will develop while this effect is active
  • Existing infections will remain and require specific treatment

anti_toxin_small.description: The effects of a cleansing potion are protecting this hearthling from weak toxins for a while.

anti_toxin_large.description: The effects of a cleansing potion are protecting this hearthling from weak and moderate toxins for a while.

anti_toxin_strong.description: The effects of a cleansing potion are protecting this hearthling from all toxins for a while.

antidote_small.description: The effects of a combat antidote are protecting this hearthling from weak poisons for a while.

antidote_large.description: The effects of a combat antidote are protecting this hearthling from weak and medium poisons for a while.

antidote_strong.description: The effects of a combat antidote are protecting this hearthling from all poisons for a while.

healing_hearth.description: Healing 8% health every 5 minutes for one hour

healing_small.description: Healing 2% health every 5 minutes for one hour

healing_large.description: Healing 5% health every 5 minutes for one hour

last_stand.description:
This hearthling is under the incredibly and taxing power of a Potion of Last Stand. Their combat prowess is incredibly boosted but they will be knocked out and require rescue at the end of this effect.
  • Courage is absurdly increased and they can't panic anymore
  • Speed is increased
  • Muscle and Stamina are greatly increased
  • Resistance to negative effects increased
  • Damage dealt is greatly increased
  • Armor is greatly increased
  • This hearthling will not receive any healing effects anymore
  • This hearthling will be incapacitated when this effect expires

earthy_flavors.description:
It tastes like brown... does it make sense? Willpower is increased.
  • Crafting has increased chances for better quality
  • Healing received is doubled

relaxing_time.description: The hearthling's mood is increased for a good time.

jolly_time.description: The hearthling's mood is extremely increased for a shorter time.

recuperating_buff.description: Still incapacitated, but slowly recovering over time. Proper healing beds will speed up the recovery time.

bed_ridden_buff.description: Slowly recovering from injuries. Can receive medical care from healers. While resting in bed, a hearthling will get thirsty, hungry, sleepy and lonely in much lower rates than normal.

dark_debuff.description:
This hearthling can't really see much past the reach of their own hands.
  • Diligence and Crafting Speed are severely reduced
  • Movement speed is greatly limited

shade_debuff.description:
This hearthlings can barely see their immediate surroundings.
  • Diligence and Crafting Speed are reduced
  • Movement speed is somewhat limited

dim_light_debuff.description:
This hearthling can see mostly alright under this low light level.
  • Diligence and Crafting Speed are very slightly reduced

bright_buff.description:
This area radiates with brightness, keeping this hearthling alert and with a good visibility!
  • Diligence, Willpower and Crafting Speed are slightly increased

regeneration_minor.description: Recovering 2% of the maximum health every 20 minutes for 4 hours

regeneration.description: Recovering 5% of the maximum health every 20 minutes for 4 hours

regeneration_major.description: Recovering 9% of the maximum health every 20 minutes for 4 hours

serenity_minor.description:
A good wine can help you focus and feel good. Curiosity, Courage and Compassion are slightly increased.
  • Crafting speed is increased by 12%
  • Crafting has a very slightly increased quality chance
  • This buff can be enhanced by consuming cheese, turning into a new buff, "Elevated Character"

cheese_flavors.description:
Cheese is amazing, cheese is life. Willpower, Stamina and Muscle are increased.
  • Healing received is increased by 50%
  • This buff can be enhanced by consuming wine, turning into a new buff, "Elevated Character"

serenity.description:
Wine is really good and special, bringing me to a point of joy and balance. Curiosity, Courage and Compassion are increased.
  • Crafting speed is increased by 20%
  • Crafting has a slightly increased quality chance
  • This buff can be enhanced by consuming cheese, turning into a new buff, "Elevated Character"

elevated_character.description:
The sublime experience and indescribable flavors of having both cheese and wine has elevated me beyond my own limits! Mind, Spirit and Body are all increased by one.
  • Crafting speed is increased by 35%
  • Healing received is increased by 80%

everlasting_summer_buff.description: This monument emanates an aura of warmth, healing and intense joy.

everlasting_summer_touched_buff.description:
Being radiated with feelings of a dream world where it's always summer...
  • This hearthling is protected from cold and wetness
  • This hearthling is recovering 6 health points every 10 minutes
  • This hearthling received a happy, positive thought

satisfied_belly.description:
Hmm... This was very filling! Willpower is increased.
  • This hearthling will grow hungry more slowly while this effect lasts

coffee_energy.description:
Ah! Nothing like a good cup of coffee! Or two... Speed is quite increased, Inspiration is slightly increased. The need for sleep is greatly decreased.
  • The hearthling might feel a bit more thirst
  • Being Mildly Caffeinated will remove any negative status from alcohol consumption

coffee_energy_minor.description: This coffee cherry thing... It's good. IT'S GOOD. Speed is slightly increased, Inspiration is very slightly increased. The need for sleep is slightly decreased.

coffee_energy_major.description:
Woo! BRING. IT. ON! Speed is greatly increased, Inspiration is quite increased. The need for sleep is almost completely removed.
  • The hearthling might feel a bit more thirst
  • Being Caffeinated will remove any negative status from alcohol consumption

coffee_energy_worn_off.description: Uhm... I don't feel so focused anymore. And I'm getting tired quick... I suppose I need more coffee? Diligence is reduced. The need for sleep increases faster.

baked_goodness.description:
There's something encouraging and inspiring about a meal that requires so much time and dedication...
  • Spirit is increased by 1

garlic_breath.description:
Maybe eating a whole garlic wasn't a good idea... Courage is reduced.
  • This hearthling will not be willing to start conversations as much

tended_planter.description: This planter has been tended to and will occasionally give happy thoughts to everyone around it!

dragon_blood_buff.description:
Regenerating 2% of their health every 30 minutes.
  • Immune to fire effects
  • Can not be flanked, out of balance, hamstrung or shaken
  • Completely resistant to all poisons and toxins

dragon_effect_buff.description: Completely dazed and intimidated by the unfathomable presence of a dragon! Courage and damage inflicted are greatly reduced.

scratched_buff.description:
A little hurt, nothing to worry.
  • Speed is very slightly reduced
  • Diligence is very slightly reduced

severely_injured_buff.description:
I'm badly hurt! Can barely walk!
  • Speed is quite reduced
  • Diligence is greatly reduced

injured_buff.description:
Ow ow ow! I'm hurt!
  • Speed is slightly reduced
  • Diligence is somewhat reduced

armor_acid_buff.description:
Their armor is being destroyed by highly corrosive acid!
    Reduces armor by 60%

shield_medium.description: Courage is slightly increased but speed is slightly reduced.

cover_none_buff.description:
This bed is good enough for curling up on a chilly night... And that's it.
  • Protected from chilly weather but not from cold or freezing weather

cover_warm_buff.description:
So warm and comfy! Feels really nice and fuzzy here.
  • Protected from chilly, cold and freezing weather

cover_buff.description:
Comfortable and enough for most cold nights! Could use an extra blanket, though...
  • Protected from chilly and cold weather but not from freezing weather

herbalist_bed_buff.description:
Feels warmer and safer than being out there... A good place to recover!
  • Protected from chilly and cold weather but not from freezing weather
  • Recovering 5% of their health every 2 hours
  • If incapacitated, this hearthling will recover faster than in any other bed

beetroot_2_buff.description: This hearthling is cured (and protected from) any poison, toxin or infection. The strong, thick beetroot juices also provide some healing over time.

starstruck.description:
Being damaged by 1% of their total health every 8 minutes for 32 minutes, plus another 1% damage per pulse for every negative effect they're currently inflicted with.

The crushing power of gravity!

military_expedition.description: These hearthlings might sleep out in the cold and lack some food variety during the first days, true... But it is doubtful that any pesky wolves or goblins will ruin their days later on!
military_expedition.tooltip: A military focused loadout for those that prefer to ensure their safety before everything else.

noble_entourage.description: Not everyone might eat venison, nor are there beds for all... So what? They're not meant for anyone, just for some very special and important hearthling‚Äîor so they say‚Äîthat has everyone else following them into the wild.
noble_entourage.tooltip: A small collection of high value items and professions for an oddly specialized beginning.

merchant_caravan.description: A collection of valuable trade tools, basic defense and some essential resources that should give the settlement a leg up in the wilderness.

dairy_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] has a particular sensitivity to dairy products. These just don't get along with their belly.

fish_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] has a particular sensitivity to fish or seafood. These just don't get along with their belly.

nuts_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] has a particular sensitivity to nuts and hard seeds. These just don't get along with their belly.

dairy_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves dairy products. They always appreciate eating them more than anything else, if possible.

vegetable_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves vegetables. They always appreciate eating them more than anything else, if possible.

meat_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves meat. They always appreciate eating it more than anything else, if possible.

fungi_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves mushrooms of all kinds. They always appreciate eating them more than anything else, if possible.

carnivore_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] just LOVES animals! Especially with hot sauce. However, they really dislike eating vegetables.

herbivore_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] is a friend to all animals! Plants, less so. They really dislike eating meat.

chionophile_trait.description: No one really knows that word. What everyone knows, however, is how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves cold and snowy days!

heliophile_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves praising the sun! Its light and rays are some of their favorite things and make them really happy.

alcohol_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] has a strong dislike for alcoholic beverages. These just don't get along with their belly.

alcohol_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves all types of alcoholic beverages. They always appreciate drinking these more than anything else, if possible.

juice_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves juices. They always appreciate drinking them more than anything else, if possible.

tea_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves all sorts of tea and infusions. They always appreciate drinking them more than anything else, if possible.

light_sleeper_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] is famous for waking up alongside the poyos - or earlier. They will sleep less than most hearthlings but also get tired sooner.

sleepyhead_trait.description: Waking up [name(i18n_data.entity)] can be a challenge. They love sleeping so much that they'll probably sleep a bit more than they should...

coffee_love_trait.description: One can easily tell how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves coffee just by looking how grumpy they are without it (and how happy they are when they get it). They always appreciate drinking it more than anything else, if possible.

modest_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] is very unpretentious when it comes to their feats. It's about the town, not them! They'll receive less renown than usual when earning titles.

braggart_trait.description: It's known that [name(i18n_data.entity)] is a bit of a show off. But some tales are better when slightly taller, anyway! They'll receive more renown than usual when earning titles.

leafy_intolerance_trait.description: There's a lot of things that [name(i18n_data.entity)] can endure - but salad isn't one of them. They just can't stand it and it will ruin their day if they have to eat some.

leafy_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves salad. They always appreciate eating it more than anything else, if possible.

fish_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves fish. They always appreciate eating it more than anything else, if possible.

patterns.red_slate_peaked_roof: A stone roof made of Light Volcano, Volcano, and Rustic Red.
patterns.blue_slate_peaked_roof: A stone roof made of Bahama Blue, Regal Blue, and Dark Regal Blue.
patterns.castle_roof: A stone castle roof made of Tuna, Shuttle Grey, and Mid Grey.
patterns.slate_peaked_roof: A stone roof made of Slate Dark, Slate Shade, Slate, and Slate Light.
patterns.thatch_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Pesto, Lemon Ginger, Yukon Gold, and Antique Brass.
patterns.thatch_light_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Sandal, Muesli, and Shadow.
patterns.wheat_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Wheat Highlight, Wheat, Wheat Shade, and Wheat Dark.
patterns.millet_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Millet Highlight, Millet, Millet Shade, and Millet Dark.
patterns.barley_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Barley Highlight, Barley, Barley Shade, and Barley Dark.
patterns.rye_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Rye Highlight, Rye, Rye Shade, and Rye Dark.
patterns.dry_turf_peaked_roof: A thatch roof made of Pale Grass, Dry Turf, Dark Turf, and Stomped Path.
patterns.wood_dark_squares: A pattern of Cioccolato, Bistre, and Morocco Brown.
patterns.wood_dark_boards: A pattern of Punga, Cocoa Brown, Clinker, and Tobacco Brown.
patterns.wood_light_boards: A pattern of Ash, Napa, and Heathered Grey.
patterns.thatch_messy: A pattern of Pesto, Lemon Ginger, Yukon Gold, and Antique Brass.
patterns.clay_grey_pattern: A pattern of Light Ash, Cloudy, and Light Mountain Mist.
patterns.clay_gold_pattern: A pattern of Raffia, Winter Hazel, and Ecru.
patterns.clay_red_pattern: A pattern of Copper Canyon, Korma, and New Amber.
patterns.clay_sage_pattern: A pattern of Sage Light, Sage, and Sage Dark.
patterns.clay_oasis_pattern: A pattern of Oasis Light, Oasis, and Oasis Dark.
patterns.big_block_wall: A pattern of Granite Green, Pale Oyster, and Hillary.
patterns.block_wall: A pattern of Mountain Roots, Mountainside Dark, Mountainside Medium, Mountainside Light, and Mountaintop.
patterns.clay_brick_wall: A pattern of Copper Canyon, Korma, and New Amber.
patterns.small_block_wall: A pattern of Slate Dark, Slate Shade, Slate, and Slate Light.
patterns.cobblestone_brown_wall: A pattern of Cork, Dark Congo Brown, Congo Brown, and Light Congo Brown.
patterns.thin_timber_wall: A pattern of Bistre, Cioccolato, and Morocco Brown.
patterns.palisade_wall: A pattern of Tobacco Brown, Clinker, Punga, and Cocoa Brown.
patterns.plastered_oak_wall: A pattern of Oak leaf Dark, Oak leaf, and Oak leaf Light.
patterns.plastered_peach_wall: A pattern of Peach Dark, Peach, and Peach Light.

level_1_data.training_perk_description: A footman can use Training Dummies to train their combat techniques and earn experience up to Job Level 3

level_3_data.training_complete_description: The footman has finished their combat training and can now seek new opportunities like trying to become a Knight!

footman_stone_axe_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Footman.

footman_stone_axe.description: A large and robust stone weapon to crush your foes!

footman_clay_spear_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Footman.

footman_clay_spear.description: Efficient for poking your enemies, but poke them carefully!

shield_hare_buff.description:
This hearthling is protected with Knut's blessing.
  • Courage is increased by 10%
  • Recovers 2% of their health every hour

level_1_data.training_perk_description: An archer can use Archery Targets to train their precision and earn experience up to Job Level 3

level_2_data.xbow_proficiency_description: The archer is able to use a crossbow to shoot strong bolts at enemies

archer_description.description: A rearguard combatant capable of using ranged weaponry like bows, crossbows and a variety of hindering types of arrows or bolts to attack their foes.

level_1_data.hunting_perk_description: A Northern Alliance archer is naturally adept at animal tracking, and can hunt animals for food and other resources.

level_1_data.training_perk_description: A Cleric can use Sheep tamed by a Shepherd to practice their magical gestures and earn experience up to Job Level 3

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Cleric's presence improves the muscle of those around them when preferring a healing tome - but hinders and weakens enemies when using a scepter and shield.
level_2_data.perk_001_description: The Cleric can utilize their divine magic to heal wounded hearthlings outside of battle. They are able to do so every eight hours, treating a wound of low severity and recovering a small amount of health.

cleric_description.description: A combat healer that channels holy magic to not only mend wounds but also boost their allies through auras and effects.

level_4_data.perk_000_description:
The healing aura power and radius are increased.

The Cleric is now able to practice magical healing every six hours, treating two wounds of medium severity and recovering some health.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Cleric's presence greatly improves the muscle of those around them when preferring a healing tome - but hinders and weakens enemies even more when using a scepter and shield.

level_6_data.perk_000_description:
The Cleric has mastered the art of healing. Compassion is greatly increased.

They are now able to practice magical healing every four hours, treating three wounds of high severity and recovering quite some health.

ornate_cleric_armor_buff.description: Increases Willpower by 5% and Healing Efficiency by 10%

healing_over_time_buff.description:
A Cleric's spell is healing me over time!
  • Recovers 6% of their health every 10 minutes

divine_intervention_buff.description: Completely invulnerable for a short time, protecting this hearthling from all harm and preventing them from panicking.

minor_debuff_aura_buff.description: Slightly reduces the attack strength and the speed of enemies around the Cleric

minor_debuff_aura_effect_buff.description: Attack strength and speed reduced slightly from the presence of a cleric

major_debuff_aura_buff.description: Reduces the attack strength and speed of enemies around the Cleric

major_debuff_aura_effect_buff.description: Attack strength and speed reduced from the presence of a cleric

phoenix_cleric_armor_buff.description:
Increases Willpower by 6% and Healing Efficiency by 12%
  • If the wearer's health goes under 20% they will become protected by a divine blessing for one full hour, being impossible to knock out during that time. However, their health can still be reduced to a minimum of 1 point, so be ready to take them to safety or for a rescue!
  • This effect can only be activated once every 24 hours

divine_extension_buff.description:
A holy protection that prevents this hearthling from panicking and from being knocked out, keeping them with at least 1 HP left.
  • This blessing is an extension of one's due time and if they keep getting attacked they'll be in trouble when the effect ends, so make sure to get them to safety or be ready for a rescue!

level_1_data.training_perk_description: A knight can use Training Dummies to train their defensive taunting skills and earn experience up to Job Level 3
level_1_data.perk_000_description: Increases Stamina, Courage, and draws attention from monsters. Greater fortitude allows the Knight to feel more comfortable in armor, also slightly increasing their Speed.

knight_description.description: A defensive fighter focused on protecting allies from harm and rounding up enemies, striking fear in their hearts!

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Stamina and Courage bonuses are increased greatly. The Speed bonus is doubled.

knight_horn.description: To strike fear, rally your fellow hearthlings or protect the little ones.

health_1_buff.description: The knight becomes more menacing to enemies, drawing their attention in combat. They also get a health, speed and stamina bonus to keep up.

brewer_tumbler_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Brewer.
brewer_tumbler_recipe.flavor: You can survive out of food, but only out of drinks you can live -'On the Art of Brewing' by Franz Baden

cleric_tome_2_recipe.description: Improves the healing done by a Cleric.
cleric_tome_2_recipe.flavor: This tome also unlocks a quick-to-cast spell that slowly heals the target over time

cleric_tome_3_recipe.description: Greatly improves the healing done by a Cleric.
cleric_tome_3_recipe.flavor: This tome unlocks the same powers as the 'Fine Tome of Healing' but also a slow-to-cast, very intense healing spell

herbalist_bee_skep_recipe.description: Supplies your town with beekeeping products but won't produce during the winter.
herbalist_bee_skep_recipe.flavor: Empty at first, you can obtain captive bees by harvesting wild bee nests found when cutting trees!

herbalist_planter_pot_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use this pot to cultivate a single renewable herb.

herbalist_planter_small_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use this container to cultivate two renewable herbs.

herbalist_planter_large_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use this nice planter to cultivate four renewable herbs.

herbalist_planter_water_recipe.description: The Herbalist can create a special planter to cultivate aquatic resources and get leeches, useful for treating infections.

herbalist_planter_pot_sapling_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use this large pot to cultivate tree saplings.
herbalist_planter_pot_sapling_recipe.flavor: Saplings require a seed of the desired tree to be planted

herbalist_planter_pot_amberstone_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use this pot to cultivate a single renewable herb.

herbalist_planter_small_amberstone_recip.description: The Herbalist can use this container to cultivate two renewable herbs.

herbalist_planter_fungi_wall_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use this wall-mounted box to cultivate two renewable fungi.
herbalist_planter_fungi_wall_recipe.flavor: Changing the cultivated fungus requires the respective colony

herbalist_planter_fungi_recipe.description: The Herbalist can use these standing boxes to cultivate four renewable fungi.
herbalist_planter_fungi_recipe.flavor: Changing the cultivated fungus requires the respective colony

professional_beekeeping_hat_recipe.description: Provides protection when working with bees.
professional_beekeeping_hat_recipe.flavor: Can be used by any crafter

simple_beekeeping_hat_recipe.description: Provides protection when hauling and passing by bee skeps or nests.
simple_beekeeping_hat_recipe.flavor: A simpler and lighter variant for all the field workers out there!

corn_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate corn!
corn_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

wheat_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate wheat!
wheat_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

barley_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate barley!
barley_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

millet_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate millet!
millet_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

rye_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate rye!
rye_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

paddy_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate rice!
paddy_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

golden_gourd_seeds_recipe.description: Domesticate Golden Gourds and learn how to grow them.
golden_gourd_seeds_recipe.flavor: Interact with the finished crate to unlock the crop. This will also consume this item

golden_gourd_seeds_2_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate golden gourds!
golden_gourd_seeds_2_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

watermelon_seeds_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate watermelons!
watermelon_seeds_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

sweet_potato_seeds_recipe.description: Domesticate Sweet Potatoes and learn how to grow them.
sweet_potato_seeds_recipe.flavor: Interact with the finished crate to unlock the crop. This will also consume this item

sweet_potato_seeds_2_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate sweet taters!
sweet_potato_seeds_2_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

garlic_seeds_recipe.description: Domesticate Garlic and learn how to grow them like the friendly people of Honeywood!
garlic_seeds_recipe.flavor: Interact with the finished crate to unlock the crop. This will also consume this item

garlic_seeds_2_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate garlic!
garlic_seeds_2_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your farmers by default

fertilizer_recipe.description: Usable by skilled farmers for slightly improving the quality of their produce.
fertilizer_recipe.flavor: Each sack can be used to fertilize 10 crops

fertilizer_upgrade_recipe.description: Usable by skilled farmers for improving the quality of their produce.
fertilizer_upgrade_recipe.flavor: Each sack can be used to fertilize 12 crops

fertilizer_upgrade_2_recipe.description: Usable by skilled farmers for greatly improving the quality of their produce.
fertilizer_upgrade_2_recipe.flavor: Each sack can be used to fertilize 16 crops

fertilizer_megacrop_recipe.description: This intricate fertilizer doesn't provide the best qualities but will greatly increase the odds of megacrops!
fertilizer_megacrop_recipe.flavor: Each sack can be used to fertilize 20 crops

plant_glass.description: A little thing to make a home feel more cozy.
plant_glass.flavor: Literally handpicked flowers are going to be placed in this vase. Some blossoms might be more striking than others *wink, wink*.

herbalist_exploration_garden_recipe.description: Used by the Herbalist for discovering new types of plants to be cultivated in herbalist planters by trying out wild seeds.
herbalist_exploration_garden_recipe.flavor: To boldly go where no Herbalist has gone before

herbalist_exploration_garden_water_recip.description: Used by the Herbalist for discovering new types of water crops to be cultivated in herbalist water planters.
herbalist_exploration_garden_water_recip.flavor: Unlike the regular garden, this one doesn't require fertilizer

herbalist_cauldron_recipe.description: Used by the Herbalist for brewing & concocting simple potions.

herbalist_metal_cauldron_recipe.description: Used by the Herbalist for brewing more advanced potions. Replaces the stone cauldron.
herbalist_metal_cauldron_recipe.flavor: The wing of a bat, the eye of a newt... Wait, what?

hearth_healing_tonic_recipe.description: Used by the herbalist to recover a lot of health.
hearth_healing_tonic_recipe.flavor: The power of the Hearth has interesting healing properties

hearth_fertilizer_recipe.description: A skilled farmer will use it to increase the quality of their crops and improve the odds of getting megacrops.
hearth_fertilizer_recipe.flavor: Each sack can be used to fertilize 33 crops

hearth_tonic_recipe.description: A powerful philter that will boost courage, muscle, menace and slowly heal your entire town over time.
hearth_tonic_recipe.flavor: May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out! -Sasha of Clan Amberstone

small_healing_tonic_recipe.description: Used by the herbalist to recover a tiny amount of health.

healing_tonic_recipe.description: Used by the herbalist to recover a medium amount of health.

cold_tonic_recipe.description: This tonic will protect your entire town from hot weather but with side effects.
cold_tonic_recipe.flavor: Known as 'Frost Embrace' in the famous Illustrated Alchemical Catalogue by Zokumos of Panaples

nightsight_tonic_recipe.description: All of your citizens will get enhanced sight, allowing them to see in the dark but with side effects.
nightsight_tonic_recipe.flavor: Called 'Cat's Eye Tincture' by Picollo Flanel in his celebrated Alchemist's Handbook

warmth_tonic_recipe.description: This tonic will protect your entire town from cold weather but with side effects.
warmth_tonic_recipe.flavor: Known as 'Dragon's Touch' in the famous Illustrated Alchemical Catalogue by Zokumos of Panaples

water_resist_tonic_recipe.description: Protection from getting soaked will be granted to all of the hearthlings but with side effects.

water_resist_tonic_2_recipe.description: Protects the whole town from getting soaked, allows running underwater but with side effects.
water_resist_tonic_2_recipe.flavor: Known as 'Mermaid's Kiss' in the famous Illustrated Alchemical Catalogue by Zokumos of Panaples

strength_tonic_recipe.description: Increases Muscle of all the hearthlings for a while, also boosting their damage.

strength_tonic_2_recipe.description: Increases Muscle and the passive resistance to some inflictable conditions of all the hearthlings for a while.
strength_tonic_2_recipe.flavor: Referred as 'Giant's Breath' by the alchemical textbooks of Lady Marie Gem

stamina_tonic_recipe.description: Increases the Stamina of all your hearthlings for a while.

stamina_tonic_2_recipe.description: Increases the Stamina and the Healing Received of all your hearthlings for a while.
stamina_tonic_2_recipe.flavor: Referred as 'Vigorous Vial' by the alchemical textbooks of Lady Marie Gem

energy_tonic_recipe.description: This tonic makes your citizens less sleepy and move faster for a while.

energy_tonic_2_recipe.description: This tonic makes your citizens even less sleepy, even more faster and generally avoid conversations for a while.
energy_tonic_2_recipe.flavor: Referred as 'Draft of Quicksilver' by the alchemical textbooks of Lady Marie Gem

curiosity_tonic_recipe.description: This tonic will increase everyone's Curiosity and Experience Gain.
curiosity_tonic_recipe.flavor: Called the 'Philospher's Draught' by Picollo Flanel in his celebrated Alchemist's Handbook

creativity_tonic_2_recipe.description: All of your hearthlings will enjoy faster crafting speed and increased chances for higher quality crafting.
creativity_tonic_2_recipe.flavor: Called 'Sip of Clearmind' by Picollo Flanel in his celebrated Alchemist's Handbook

creativity_tonic_recipe.description: All of your hearthlings will enjoy slightly faster crafting speed.

courage_tonic_recipe.description: Increases the Courage of all citizens for a while.

courage_tonic_2_recipe.description: Increases the Courage and the Armor value of all citizens for a while.
courage_tonic_2_recipe.flavor: Referred as 'Bearskin Philter' by the alchemical textbooks of Lady Marie Gem

fever_cordial_simple_recipe.description: A smelly extract for efficiently treating infections up to medium severity. Will not apply the 'Recently Treated' effect, allowing further treatment without delay.
fever_cordial_simple_recipe.flavor: Better than 'Leeches', but these are found freely on water plants!

fever_cordial_recipe.description: This foul-smelling extract can be used for treating infections of any severity. Will not apply the 'Recently Treated' effect, allowing further treatment without delay.
fever_cordial_recipe.flavor: Old Nanny used to say that rubbing moldy bread on infected wounds can be helpful...

undead_cordial_recipe.description: A repulsive extract able to remove the infections applied by the undead. Will not apply the 'Recently Treated' effect, allowing further treatment without delay.
undead_cordial_recipe.flavor: A circle of salt around the patient might help as well...

weak_antidote_recipe.description: This simple mixture can be used against poisons and will efficiently treat any poison of low severity.
weak_antidote_recipe.flavor: Antidotes will not apply the 'Recently Treated' effect when used, allowing further treatment without delay

antidote_recipe.description: This mixture can be used against poisons and will efficiently treat any poison of low or medium severity.
antidote_recipe.flavor: Antidotes will not apply the 'Recently Treated' effect when used, allowing further treatment without delay

strong_antidote_recipe.description: This delicate concoction can be used against poisons and will efficiently treat any poison up to high severity.
strong_antidote_recipe.flavor: Antidotes will not apply the 'Recently Treated' effect when used, allowing further treatment without delay

rough_salve_recipe.description: A simple and rustic paste that can be applied on any piercing wound. Efficiently treats wounds up to medium severity.
rough_salve_recipe.flavor: Salves can also be used for cold wounds

common_salve_recipe.description: A refined, buttery medication that can be applied on any piercing wound. Efficiently treats wounds up to high severity.
common_salve_recipe.flavor: Salves can also be used for cold wounds

neat_salve_recipe.description: Smooth and fragrant, this salve can be applied on any piercing wound. Efficiently treats wounds up to extreme severity.
neat_salve_recipe.flavor: Salves can also be used for cold wounds

coarse_bandage_recipe.description: Some cloth and healing herbs for cleaning any cut. Efficiently treats wounds up to medium severity.
coarse_bandage_recipe.flavor: Bandages can also be used for fire wounds

light_bandage_recipe.description: Better woven cloth and herbs for cleaning any cut. Efficiently treats wounds up to high severity.
light_bandage_recipe.flavor: Bandages can also be used for fire wounds

heavy_bandage_recipe.description: A piece of thicker cloth with vinegar and herbs is perfect for cleaning any cut. Efficiently treats wounds up to extreme severity.
heavy_bandage_recipe.flavor: Bandages can also be used for fire wounds

simple_compress_recipe.description: A rough gauze meant for pressuring any impact wound. Efficiently treats wounds up to medium severity.

herbal_compress_recipe.description: A fine cloth soaked in herbal extracts for healing any impact wound. Efficiently treats wounds up to high severity.

tough_compress_recipe.description: A hard strap with curative herbs for healing any impact wound. Efficiently treats wounds up to extreme severity.
tough_compress_recipe.flavor: People will want to sign up your leather compress...

simple_ointment_recipe.description: A dense paste that can be used for healing many types of basic wounds of low severity.
simple_ointment_recipe.flavor: Ointments can be used for impact, cut, piercing, cold, and fire wounds

fine_ointment_recipe.description: This complex cream can be used for healing many types of wounds, although not very efficiently.
fine_ointment_recipe.flavor: Better than the Simple Ointment, this medication can treat multiple wounds of medium severity

hearthbud_ointment_recipe.description: A magical, arcane fluid that will efficiently heal many types of wounds up to high severity.
hearthbud_ointment_recipe.flavor: The power of the Hearth is also the only known treatment to corrupted wounds

potion_healing_small_recipe.description: This small vial of potion will be carried by combatants and used when they're hurt, restoring some health.
potion_healing_small_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_healing_large_recipe.description: This large vial of potion will be carried by combatants and used when they're hurt, restoring a bunch of health.
potion_healing_large_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_healing_hearth_recipe.description: This magical vial of potion will be carried by combatants and used when they're hurt, restoring a lot of health.
potion_healing_hearth_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_anti_toxin_small_recipe.description: This small draught will be carried by combatants and used when they are affected by a toxin, protecting them from weak toxins for a while and restoring some health.
potion_anti_toxin_small_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_anti_toxin_large_recipe.description: This draught will be carried by combatants and used when they are affected by a toxin, protecting them from weak and moderate toxins for a while and restoring a bunch of health.
potion_anti_toxin_large_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_anti_toxin_strong_recipe.description: This large draught will be carried by combatants and used when they are affected by a toxin, protecting them from all toxins for a while but restore only a bit of health.
potion_anti_toxin_strong_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_antidote_small_recipe.description: This bit of antidote will be carried by combatants and used when fighting against venomous foes, protecting them from weak poisons for a while.
potion_antidote_small_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_antidote_large_recipe.description: This vial of antidote will be carried by combatants and used when fighting against venomous foes, protecting them from weak and medium poisons for a while.
potion_antidote_large_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_antidote_strong_recipe.description: This draught of antidote will be carried by combatants and used when fighting against venomous foes, protecting them from all poisons for a while.
potion_antidote_strong_recipe.flavor: A hearthling can only carry one potion

potion_last_stand_recipe.description: Used when very low on health, it will greatly boost their combat prowess... However it will incapacitate them when the effect expires. Be ready for a rescue!
potion_last_stand_recipe.flavor: A desperate measure for desperate times...

gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of pungent herbs and seasonings needed for beer brewing. This traditional recipe uses juniper berries.

rc_gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of pungent herbs and seasonings needed for beer brewing. Gruit is often made with wax plants in the desert.

na_gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of pungent herbs and seasonings needed for beer brewing. The northerners use pine cones for its flavor.

decorated_frostfeast_tree_recipe.description: Get your town ready for the holidays with this traditional and beautiful decorated tree.
decorated_frostfeast_tree_recipe.flavor: A symbol of hope, gratitude and warmth!

decorated_frostfeast_tree_gold_recipe.description: Prepare a special decorated Frostfeast tree with golden themes.

decorated_frostfeast_tree_silver_recipe.description: Prepare a special decorated Frostfeast tree with silver themes.
decorated_frostfeast_tree_silver_recipe.flavor: A symbol of hope, gratitude and warmth!

decorated_frostfeast_tree_snowy_recipe.description: Prepare a special decorated Frostfeast tree with snowy themes.
decorated_frostfeast_tree_snowy_recipe.flavor: A symbol of hope, gratitude and warmth!

wreath_recipe.description: A very appreciated decoration for the holidays.

wreath_large_recipe.description: For when you're feeling really festive.

herbalist_hood.description: A protective headgear for desert herbalists.

level_2_data.taming_local_flora_description: The Herbalist has acquired sufficient knowledge of the area to learn how to cultivate the local flora. By building an Exploration Garden, they are able to look for new seeds to be planted! They are also now skillful enough to use materials created by the other crafters, become a Cleric or follow a career as a Brewer.
level_2_data.collaborative_insight_description: The Herbalist is now skillful enough to use materials created by the other crafters and is also able to become a Cleric

level_3_data.unlock_quality_description: When inspiration strikes, the Herbalist may now craft an especially Fine quality of item. Planting and tending in planters also increases the chance of Fine quality harvests.
level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Herbalist is now able to tend planters, improving their contents. Their medical prowess also increases the effectiveness of healing items by 50%.

level_5_data.item_proficiency_2_description: The Herbalist's medical prowess increases the effectiveness of healing items by 100%.
level_5_data.unlock_quality_2_description: The Herbalist can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often. Planting and tending in planters also increases the chance of higher quality harvests.

level_6_data.power_medic_3_description: The Herbalist can now attend to up to 6 hearthlings at a time. They will also be able to improve the qualities of their plants faster.

herbalist_description.description: A performer of healing practices, the Herbalist can craft and use tonics, medications and potions but also work with plants, mushrooms and other goods.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Herbalist is able to craft medicine and use it on up to two injured hearthlings at a time.
level_1_data.perk_001_description: The Herbalist channels the spirits of the forest and gains natural regeneration, increasing their Willpower and Diligence. They are also proficient in gathering and handling herb planters.

herbalist_mortar_pewter.description: A fancy mortar set for increasing the Herbalist's speed and quality.

herbalist_bee_skep.description: A neat house for bees, handled by the herbalist. Won't produce during the winter.
herbalist_bee_skep.unripe_description: Not yet ready for harvesting, poor busy little bees!

herbalist_cauldron.description: Used for brewing & concocting potions. Requires lower grade fuel.

herbalist_bee_skep_empty.description: This skep is empty and requires Captive Bees to form a colony.

herbalist_metal_cauldron.description: Used for brewing more advanced potions. Requires any common fuel.

herbalist_bee_skep_regrowing.description: This bee skep needs a few days to regrow a productive colony.

herbalist_idol_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Herbalist

herbalist_idol.description: A small staff used for rituals and ceremonies.

herbalist_staff_bone_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Herbalist

herbalist_staff_bone.description: The power of Firnn provides healing and focus.

herbalist_exploration_garden.description: Used for discovering new types of plants for cultivation in herbalist planters.

herb.description: Prioritize finding seeds for a plant native to this biome. This process is faster and more reliable than searching for exotic seeds. Requires a level 2 Herbalist or Grower.

water.description: Prioritize finding a water crop native to this biome's water bodies. A faster and more reliable process than searching for exotic ones. Requires a level 3 Herbalist or Grower.

herb.description: Try to look for an exotic herb from anywhere in the world. A slower process that relies both on luck and dedication, sometimes finding only native seeds. Requires a level 4 Herbalist or Grower.

water.description: Search for an exotic water crop from anywhere in the world. A slower process that relies both on luck and dedication, sometimes finding only native plants. Requires a level 4 Herbalist or Grower.

expired.description: This garden is depleted and requires more fertilizer to be used again!

unlock_last_crop.bulletin_title: The [str(i18n_data.job_name)] has unlocked the last crop possible in this garden: [str(i18n_data.crop_name)]!

herbalist_exploration_garden_water.description: Used for discovering new types of water plants for cultivation in herbalist planters.

refrigerator_small_recipe.description: Preserves up to 16 items for a very long time, preventing them from spoiling.

refrigerator_recipe.description: Preserves up to 48 items for a very long time, preventing them from spoiling.
refrigerator_recipe.flavor: Nothing beats the taste of year-old bread

bronze_crossbow_recipe.description: A strong ranged weapon that is slow but efficient in cracking enemy armor.

steel_crossbow_recipe.description: Not fast but a strong, powerful mechanical weapon that can pierce through armor.

legendary_chainmail_recipe.description: Pieces of silver chain mail linked together for the Vanguard's Chain Mail.

legendary_mace_recipe.description: An impressive and powerful knight's weapon.
legendary_mace_recipe.flavor: Engineered to shatter any piece of armor

water_gate_recipe.description: Create a small six-way gate that can be toggled open or closed for controlled fluid flow.

water_pump_recipe.description: Make a pump that will take fluids from the placement level to be released on its upper shaft.
water_pump_recipe.flavor: You can stack up pumps to get water higher and higher!

water_pump_steel_recipe.description: Make a pump for transferring fluids. Steel Water Pumps can extend much longer pipes than a Copper Water Pump!
water_pump_steel_recipe.flavor: You can stack up pumps to get water higher and higher!

water_gate_greater_recipe.description: Build a larger and more resistant gate for controlling the flow of fluids.

axle_horizontal_recipe.description: Create a rotating shaft that can take mechanical power forward.

axle_vertical_recipe.description: Create a rotating shaft that can take mechanical power vertically.

axle_gear_box_recipe.description: Build a device that allows you to redirect mechanical power to any direction.
axle_gear_box_recipe.flavor: It can be placed in walls during building - like windows or doors.

bronze_portcullis_large_recipe.description: Useful for fortifying town entrypoints. This is a slightly larger alternative to the Bronze Portcullis.

portcullis_valor_large_recipe.description: For times when only the strongest door will do. This is a slightly larger alternative to the Castle Portcullis.

bronze_gear_recipe.flavor: Luckily it has teeth that do not require brushing

engineer_description.description: The Engineer is a master of creating contraptions and defenses, repairing facilities and designing mechanisms that can improve other professions.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Engineer can repair structures created by the Blacksmith other than their own.

level_3_data.perk_000_description:
The Engineer can place up to eight traps and four turrets.

Additionally, the Engineer can now repair structures created by the Mason, Carpenter and Potter as well.

level_4_data.perk_001_description: The Engineer is now able to repair anything that belongs to your town, regardless of who crafted it or where it came from!

rc_shepherds_crook_recipe.flavor: The herding of animals in the desert is a tradition coming for as long as the children of Rayya have been walking these dunes

na_shepherds_crook_recipe.flavor: Shepherds are highly praised in the north not only for the meat or bones but especially because of the furs and wool

herbalist_clay_staff_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling to an Herbalist, who creates healing tonics and bandages.
herbalist_clay_staff_recipe.flavor: Earthy idols have healing powers, they say

potter_mold_bench_recipe.description: For molding clay into useful building parts that do not require a more personal touch.
potter_mold_bench_recipe.flavor: 'We all came from the same mold. It is the clay we're made of that defines us.'

fire_bricks_recipe.description: Vitrified bricks resistant to the heat of advanced furnaces and ovens.

unfired_clay_recipe.description: Used in crafting recipes like urns, amphorae and other symmetrical clay objects.
unfired_clay_recipe.flavor: The wonders of the Pottery Wheel

molded_clay_recipe.description: Used by recipes for clay furniture or buildings parts like windows and doors.

unfired_porcelain_recipe.description: Required for creating all the beautiful and symmetrical porcelain objects like urns and jars.

molded_porcelain_recipe.description: Neccessary for crafting extravagant porcelain furniture and building parts like tall fences.

bone_clay_recipe.description: Required for creating porcelain and beautiful ornate ceramics.

bone_clay_x3_recipe.description: Required for creating porcelain and beautiful ornate ceramics.
bone_clay_x3_recipe.flavor: With the correct ingredients and skill, the potter has mastered a much more efficient way to produce bone clay

clay_animal_door_recipe.description: A large door for animal shelters, it can be closed by a shepherd. When closed, only hearthlings may go through!

clay_animal_door_small_recipe.description: A small door for animal shelters.
clay_animal_door_small_recipe.flavor: When placed on ground level, the two tiles of dirt underneath it must be dug out for it to work!

clay_comfy_bed_recipe.description: It has a lot less sand on the mattress.
clay_comfy_bed_recipe.flavor: For a good night of sleep...

clay_bed_crude_recipe.description: A proper place to pass out when exhausted.

clay_training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.
clay_training_dummy_recipe.flavor: Can be repaired before it's completely broken

clay_training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.
clay_training_target_recipe.flavor: Can be repaired before it's completely broken

clay_spear_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Footman.
clay_spear_recipe.flavor: Might break easily but ideally they won't use it for long... right?

decorative_coffee_pot_recipe.flavor: 'As the coffee is boiled and poured within, care not for the foam at the top nor the residue at the bottom. It is the tincture that must be like an ink which we write our destiny with.'

porcelain_fence_bar_double_recipe.description: Craft a double section of porcelain short wall.

porcelain_fence_bar_single_recipe.description: Craft a single section of porcelain short wall.

porcelain_fence_end_recipe.description: Craft a fencepost for a porcelain short wall.

porcelain_fence_gate_recipe.description: Craft a gate for a porcelain short wall.
porcelain_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: Grants access through tall walls by... magic!

porcelain_wall_lamp_recipe.description: A masterfully crafted lamp dangles on an elegant metal neck.
porcelain_wall_lamp_recipe.flavor: I know it doesn't look that sturdy but it won't break off. I promise.

porcelain_lamp_recipe.flavor: Has little legs for standing. Not running.

porcelain_bench_comfy_recipe.description: Makes for a comfortable living room.
porcelain_bench_comfy_recipe.flavor: Don't let any cats near it!

porcelain_bench_recipe.description: A spacious and exquisite piece of furniture.
porcelain_bench_recipe.flavor: Don't forget to hide the cushions when it rains!

porcelain_chair_comfy_recipe.description: Makes for a comfortable but tidy interior.

porcelain_chair_recipe.description: A simple yet elegant piece of furniture.
porcelain_chair_recipe.flavor: Can also be used as a foot stool

porcelain_comfy_bed_recipe.description: For those that want to look fancy even while asleep.

porcelain_dining_table_recipe.description: Craft a dining table to create a place for eating meals.
porcelain_dining_table_recipe.flavor: Tablecloth included for enhanced visibility of porcelain plates.

porcelain_display_cabinet_recipe.description: A cabinet to show off all the boring pottery that was made before porcelain!

porcelain_display_cupboard_recipe.description: Displays a nice collection of pottery.
porcelain_display_cupboard_recipe.flavor: Just don't nudge it too hard...

porcelain_dresser_recipe.description: Live in luxury with this beautiful piece of furniture.
porcelain_dresser_recipe.flavor: Who even needs to dress up with such a dresser?

porcelain_end_table_recipe.description: A little table to fit a decoration.
porcelain_end_table_recipe.flavor: Fits near your bed, sofa, chair... anywhere!

porcelain_floor_tile_recipe.description: Create a nice porcelain tiled floor for your hearthlings.

porcelain_jar_of_feathers_recipe.description: Gloriously giant feathers made of textiles.
porcelain_jar_of_feathers_recipe.flavor: No poyos were harmed in the making of this decoration.

porcelain_daisy_vase_recipe.description: The poetically perfect stand and vase are housing delicate daisies.

level_1_data.transform_perk_description: The Potter can, with patience and dedication, shape some clay blocks into nice artworks.

mason_description.description: The Mason is able to shape stone into different and useful tools, construction parts and decorations. They may also learn how to work with bones.

metal_bits_hard_recipe.description: Tinker an ingot of hard metal into multiple parts that are useful for other crafters.
metal_bits_hard_recipe.flavor: Hinges, supports, barrel loops, bolts, plates, knobs... Just name what you need!

metal_bits_soft_recipe.description: Tinker an ingot of soft metal into multiple parts that are useful for other crafters.
metal_bits_soft_recipe.flavor: Small tubes, buckles, buttons, handles, trinkets... The blacksmith will provide!

glory_market_stall_recipe.description: This exclusive market stall will allow your town to be visited by a special merchant providing unique (but disposable) turrets and traps that can be used without an engineer!
glory_market_stall_recipe.flavor: Unlocked by the 'Hearth of Glory' Town Bonus

fuel_holder_small_recipe.description: Craft a fancy holder that can store up to 4 Bundles O' Firewood.

copper_coffee_pot_recipe.description: Very sleek and lightweight, can keep a beverage hot for a good time!
copper_coffee_pot_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to make coffee

copper_weighing_scale_recipe.description: Very helpful for measuring the mass of things and looking smarter!
copper_weighing_scale_recipe.flavor: How can one be sure the weights weigh what they say they weigh?

gold_weighing_scale_recipe.description: A new level of sophistication for your business!

moka_coffee_pot_recipe.description: A special pot for extracting the deepest flavors of coffee, very traditional around the southern coast.
moka_coffee_pot_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to make coffee

pewter_teapot_recipe.description: A very refined and exquisite piece of decoration.
pewter_teapot_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to make tea

iron_teapot_recipe.description: Very sturdy and heavy but should warm its contents evenly and keep them hot for a while.
iron_teapot_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to make tea

pewter_pitcher_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to serve certain drinks

bronze_pitcher_recipe.description: A metal pitcher is a fancy decorative element.
bronze_pitcher_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to serve certain drinks

silver_pitcher_recipe.flavor: A Brewer can use these to serve certain drinks

iron_brazier_recipe.description: Create a fine piece that provides light and some warmth.

iron_brazier_tall_recipe.description: Craft a fancy piece of decoration that provides light and warmth.
iron_brazier_tall_recipe.flavor: Provides warmth to quite a large radius

cook_spoon_copper_recipe.description: Create a lighter and cleaner spoon that will improve the Cook's efficiency and the quality of their crafts.

herbalist_mortar_pestle_pewter_recipe.description: Craft a fancy metallic mortar and pestle to increase the Herbalist's crafting speed and quality output.

mason_chisel_iron_recipe.description: Craft a set of hammer and chisel out of iron to improve the Mason's crafting speed and work quality.
mason_chisel_iron_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve their repair efficiency!

potter_cutter_iron_recipe.description: Create an improved, sharper cutter for the Potter so they can craft faster and better.
potter_cutter_iron_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve their repair efficiency!

blacksmith_hammer_steel_recipe.description: Forge a new and stronger hammer for the Blacksmith, improving their crafting speed and work quality.
blacksmith_hammer_steel_recipe.flavor: The hammer is our most loyal companion, like a shield to a knight or the moon to the night. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

carpenter_saw_steel_recipe.description: Make an enhanced steel saw that will allow the Carpenter to be faster and better when crafting.
carpenter_saw_steel_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve their repair efficiency!

engineer_wrench_steel_recipe.description: Make an enhanced steel wrench that will allow the Engineer to be faster and better when crafting.
engineer_wrench_steel_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve their repair efficiency!

brewer_tumbler_copper_recipe.description: Make an enhanced copper tumbler that will allow the Brewer to be faster and better when crafting.

trapper_knife_steel_recipe.description: This sharp and light steel knife will allow the trapper to handle animals faster.
trapper_knife_steel_recipe.flavor: What do you mean with *handle* animals?

weaver_spindle_steel_recipe.description: Create a set of elegant, silver coated needles to improve the Weaver's crafting speed and work quality.
weaver_spindle_steel_recipe.flavor: This tool will also improve their repair efficiency!

farmer_hoe_iron_recipe.description: Craft a tool that Farmers can use to slightly improve their working efficiency.

worker_tools_iron_recipe.description: Craft a set of iron tools for workers.
worker_tools_iron_recipe.flavor: Slightly increases the odds of mining better quality resources and somewhat boosts their work speed when chopping, mining and building.

worker_tools_steel_recipe.description: Craft a set of steel tools for workers.
worker_tools_steel_recipe.flavor: Increases the odds of mining better quality resources and substantially boosts their work speed when chopping, mining and building.

gold_ingot_from_coins_recipe.description: Meld 100 gold coins together to form an ingot.

gold_coins_from_ingot_recipe.description: Melt a gold ingot to mint gold coins that can be used in trading!

gold_coins_from_flakes_recipe.description: Melt gold flakes into gold coins that can be used in trading!

blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.description: Required for refining certain materials like wood and coal.
blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.flavor: A strong fire requires the purest fuel. And that starts with hard work. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_crucible_recipe.description: Can be used for melting and working metals or creating alloys.
blacksmith_crucible_recipe.flavor: Fire and stone shall give you metal, but with metal and metal you shall... Well, get even more metal. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_forge_recipe.description: Used to heat and smelt ore into usable metal ingots.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.description: Improved and more efficient, this furnace is hot enough to smelt precious metals. Replaces the regular furnace.
blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.flavor: All that is gold does not glitter; but if it does, a good furnace will smelt it. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.description: This incredible anvil can keep the metal hot for the most intricate and powerful crafts. Replaces the regular anvil.
blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.flavor: Balance between heating and hammering is essential. Or just do both at once. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

charcoal_recipe.description: Heat wood in the absence of oxygen to acquire charcoal, a good grade fuel.
charcoal_recipe.flavor: Experts call it 'slow pyrolysis'. I call it BIG BONFIRE!

coke_recipe.description: Heat Lumps o' Coal without burning them to efficiently produce coke, a good grade fuel.
coke_recipe.flavor: Cook with coal or coke coal to cook with coke?

bulk_charcoal_recipe.description: Skill allows the Blacksmith to more efficiently burn wood, producing more charcoal.

bulk_coke_recipe.description: Mastery of the craft allows the Blacksmith to achieve greater efficiency in coking coal.

bulk_copper_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use copper ore more efficiently.

bronze_ingot_recipe.description: Two bars of solid bronze. A hard metal suitable for crafted goods.

copper_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of solid copper. A soft metal suitable for crafted goods.

gold_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of solid gold. A precious metal suitable for crafted goods.

iron_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of solid Iron. A hard metal suitable for crafted goods.

silver_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of solid silver. A precious metal suitable for crafted goods.

steel_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of solid steel. A hard metal suitable for crafted goods.

tin_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of solid tin. A soft metal suitable for crafted goods.

bulk_tin_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use tin ore more efficiently.

bulk_iron_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use iron ore more efficiently.

bulk_iron_ingot_recipe_2.description: With a hot enough furnace and a lot of skill, the Blacksmith is able to very efficiently extract meteoric iron from a fallen star.

starsteel_ingot_recipe.description: Steel, some bits of pure gold and a meteoric fragment. Keep it all molten in a crucible for long enough and a rare, strong metal will be formed.
starsteel_ingot_recipe.flavor: Incredibly hard and not so heavy!

copper_wall_lantern_recipe.description: A beautiful lantern. Place on buildings to provide light at night.

copper_garden_lantern_recipe.description: A small lantern that's placed on the ground. Suitable for lighting paths or small gardens.

iron_helmet_recipe.description: Even more protection for one's head.

iron_platemail_recipe.description: A full suit of iron designed for a new and promising knight.

steel_helm_recipe.description: Strong and not so heavy protection for one's head.

steel_chainmail_recipe.description: A very fancy and strong chain mail suit of armor for a Footman.

cleric_bronze_shield_recipe.description: Provides some protection for a melee cleric.
cleric_bronze_shield_recipe.flavor: But you might want your faith as your shield as well... Just in case!

cleric_iron_shield_recipe.description: Provides good protection for a melee cleric.

cleric_steel_shield_recipe.description: Provides great protection for a melee cleric.
cleric_steel_shield_recipe.flavor: The best defense for a holy warrior!

light_iron_shield_recipe.description: Not so heavy but also not so strong.

light_steel_shield_recipe.description: Perfect balance between protection and weight.
light_steel_shield_recipe.flavor: The finest defense for a Footman!

silver_shield_recipe.description: A very strong Knight's shield made with silver.

bronze_axe_recipe.description: A heavier alternative for a starting metal weapon. Can open wounds.

bronze_sword_recipe.description: Basic, but better than a sharpened stick. Can hamstring opponents.

bronze_short_spear_recipe.description: A reliable weapon for keeping others at bay. Can flank opponents.

iron_short_spear_recipe.description: A common but efficient weapon. Can flank opponents.
iron_short_spear_recipe.flavor: The hook is great for pulling troublemakers!

steel_short_spear_recipe.description: A favorite among watchmen and guards. Can flank opponents.

iron_archer_mail_recipe.description: A leather armor with large metal rings sewn to it. Includes a small buckler and provides some protection to archers.
iron_archer_mail_recipe.rc_description: Lightweight and comfortable chain mail gear. Includes a small buckler and provides some protection to archers.
iron_archer_mail_recipe.na_description: A simple chain mail shirt with a cloth coif and a kettle helm. Includes a small buckler and provides some protection to archers.
iron_archer_mail_recipe.flavor: For when the situation gets really dire...

iron_battle_axe_recipe.description: Extra large for when you need some extra punch. Can open wounds.
iron_battle_axe_recipe.flavor: 'Are these all of them?' shouted Rovnar 'They might as well make a line'

iron_sword_recipe.description: A strong and well balanced weapon. Can hamstring opponents.
iron_sword_recipe.flavor: 'I AM YOUR KING!' screamed Regnar Icevulf brandishing his sword.

steel_mace_recipe.description: A powerful and reliable weapon for a Knight.

iron_axe_recipe.description: A short and cheap but efficient weapon.

steel_axe_recipe.description: Very good for hacking and slashing.
steel_axe_recipe.flavor: '...and one hearthling after the other they all drew their axes above the shieldwall.' - The Valin Saga

bronze_hatchet_recipe.description: For parrying attacks and attempting counter-attacks. Puts enemies out of balance.

iron_hatchet_recipe.description: A sturdy small axe used for parrying and attacking. Puts enemies out of balance.

steel_dagger_recipe.description: A small and sharp weapon for both offense and defense. Puts enemies out of balance.
steel_dagger_recipe.flavor: 'There are few things as useful that you can conceal as easily' -O.A.E Guidelines

steel_lance_recipe.description: A long and strong Knight's polearm for harassing multiple enemies. Shakes their hearts!

silver_halberd_recipe.description: An intricate and powerful Knight's weapon. Shakes their hearts!

silver_short_sword_recipe.description: A reliable sidearm for an experienced Knight.
silver_short_sword_recipe.flavor: 'And so his blade shone under the sun for it was made not of steel but of the purest silver' - The Walks of Cid

silver_mace_recipe.description: Blunt. Strong. Unstoppable. Can break armor.

starsteel_long_sword_recipe.description: A powerful single-handed weapon that can turn the tide of battle!
starsteel_long_sword_recipe.flavor: 'The Sea of Stars is full of untold knowledge... and power!' - Astrologer Cygnus

bronze_scepter_recipe.description: A good weapon for the Cleric that goes into the breach.
bronze_scepter_recipe.flavor: Can be used alongside a light shield

silver_scepter_recipe.description: A reliable and blessed weapon for a Cleric, if they decide to go up close and personal.

gold_scepter_recipe.description: A very powerful and sacred Cleric's weapon, the Undead shall tremble upon seeing it!

phoenix_cleric_armor_recipe.description: A mythic piece of armor worn by the legendary Phoenix Empire's Palatine Guard.
phoenix_cleric_armor_recipe.flavor: The golden crest was likely a phoenix... But without reference, a golden poyo will have to do!

silver_mail_recipe.description: Become the real Knight in shiny armor.

legendary_buckle_recipe.description: A beautifully engraved set of buckles for the Elven King Hood.
legendary_buckle_recipe.flavor: Can also be used for an extremely expensive belt

legendary_mail_recipe.description: Chain armor akin to the ones from the Empire's royal vanguard.
legendary_mail_recipe.flavor: It is said the cape was their demise

blacksmith_workbench_recipe.description: Used by the Blacksmith to create most of their goods.

brass_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of cheap but durable metal as learned from the dwarves.
brass_plate_recipe.flavor: The trick is to melt anything alongside copper

pewter_candle_holder_recipe.description: A pewter carrying plate with candles.

candle_holder_pewter_wall_recipe.description: A pewter wall support for a candle.

candle_holder_double_pewter_wall_recipe.description: A pewter wall support for two candles.

candelabra_pewter_recipe.description: A decorated five-point pewter candle holder.
candelabra_pewter_recipe.flavor: Butler Belltower, in the library, with the candelabra!

candelabra_iron_recipe.description: A very beautiful five-point iron candle holder.

candlestick_recipe.description: Slowly burns throughout the entire season to keep alive the warmth of Frostfeast.

candle_holder_recipe.description: Keep it lit during the entire season to be reminded of Frostfeast's light!

light_circlet_recipe.description: A strong head protection that emits light and comes with a minor buff for Clerics.
light_circlet_recipe.flavor: The silver crown that bears the light of Frostfeast, brought upon the darkest night!

blacksmith_fuel_oven_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for refining materials through controlled heating.

blacksmith_crucible_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for smelting. Requires lower or good grade fuel.

blacksmith_forge_ghost.description: A stone oven for heating metal. Requires lower or good grade fuel.

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_ghost.description: An improved anvil for the Blacksmith. Requires at least good grade fuel.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_ghost.description: A more efficient oven for working metals. Requires at least good grade fuel.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith has started learning how to use a forge and heat a crucible. They will need some practice before they can work with iron and build an anvil!

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith is now skilled enough to build an anvil and forge heavier items made of bronze and iron.
level_2_data.perk_001_description: The Blacksmith has acquired enough knowledge on forges to start producing their own fuels and facilities.

level_4_data.ornate_perk_description: Experience with smelting has given the Blacksmith ideas on new and improved facilities that will allow them to work more efficiently and with more valuable materials.

blacksmith_description.description: The Blacksmith uses raw ores, fuels and strength to bend metals to their will, creating a wide range of goods like weapons, armor, decorations and useful tools.

mining_helmet.description: A protective iron hat that also includes a light source.

mining_helmet_iconic.description: Can be used by a Worker for additional efficiency. Also provides light.

worker_holiday_hat.description: A traditional hat for enjoying the holidays! Will protect from chilly weather.

winter_worker_outfit.description: A heavy wool coat, for chilly winter nights. Improves speed.

na_winter_worker_outfit.description: A heavy wool coat, for cold winter nights. Improves speed.

chilly_simple_worker_outfit.description: Wool cap and gloves. Protects from chilly weather but with no added benefits.

cold_simple_worker_outfit.description: A tepid leather outfit. Protects from cold weather but with no added benefits.

freezing_simple_worker_outfit.description: A warm, fuzzy cloak. Protects from freezing weather with no added benefits.

cold_worker_outfit.description: A high quality leather outfit. Protects from cold weather and improves speed!

na_freezing_worker_outfit.description: A masterfully made outfit. Protects from freezing weather and improves speed!

rc_winter_worker_outfit.description: A reinforced wool outfit. Protects from chilly weather and improves speed!

holiday_worker_outfit.description: A fuzzy and warm coat, excellent for partaking in seasonal celebrations.

cook_pottage_recipe.description: A handy cauldron that can be used by anyone - not just the Cook - to prepare pottage!
cook_pottage_recipe.flavor: The townsfolk will also need Broth to begin cooking!

cook_table_recipe.description: A good flat surface for kneading and preparing stuff.

cook_leavening_table_recipe.description: This large and powdered surface is the perfect resting place for doughs to rise!
cook_leavening_table_recipe.flavor: Many baking recipes require leavened doughs

cook_workbench_advanced_recipe.description: Replaces the Stone Cooking Pot and is needed for the finest meals. Requires lower or good grade fuel.

cook_oven_advanced_recipe.description: Replaces the Stone Oven and is needed for advanced roasts and desserts. Requires lower or good grade fuel.
cook_oven_advanced_recipe.flavor: Higher temperatures for a higher palate

pickles_recipe.description: Bold, spicy flavors. Can replace 'Any Vegetable' in many recipes.
pickles_recipe.flavor: Preserves are a good way to make raw foodstuffs last a lot longer than they usually would

jam_fruit_recipe.description: Sweet and smooth. Can replace 'Any Fruit' in many recipes.
jam_fruit_recipe.flavor: Preserves are a good way to make raw foodstuffs last a lot longer than they usually would

jam_lingonberry_recipe.description: A delicious northern specialty. Can replace 'Any Fruit' in many recipes.
jam_lingonberry_recipe.flavor: Preserves are a good way to make raw foodstuffs last a lot longer than they usually would

cereals_corn_recipe.description: Pour milk on top of delicious baked flakes of corn.
cereals_corn_recipe.flavor: 'Cereal first, milk afterwards. It is the natural order.' - Sir Edwin Butterfingers

nutty_poultry_recipe.description: Stirred and fried large poultry slices with spices and nuts.
nutty_poultry_recipe.flavor: Very popular among the hearthlings from the East!

cherry_tart_recipe.description: A delicious and fresh dessert for lazy afternoons.

autumn_tart_recipe.description: Enjoy the falling of the leaves while appreciating this refined dessert!

fruit_yogurt_recipe.description: Fermented, creamy milk sweetened with sugar and fruits.

ice_cream_recipe.description: A quite flavorful and extremely refreshing summer favorite. Careful, it melts in a couple of days!
ice_cream_recipe.flavor: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream!

pie_cherry_recipe.description: A tasty pie that is quite difficult to make.

pie_apple_recipe.description: Difficult to master, but results in a delicious dessert!

nut_pralines_recipe.description: Crunchy nuts baked with a delightful caramelized sugar crust.

nuts_basket_recipe.description: An assortment of edible nuts ready to be used in cooking.

huntsman_banquet_recipe.description: An exquisite cut of venison seasoned with fruity forest flavors.

cooked_nuts_recipe.description: Shaven and tenderly cooked edible seeds like pines and acorns.
