broth_recipe.description: A very nutritious and filling simmer, broth is either an ingredient or a meal on its own.
broth_recipe.flavor: Broth is needed to start pottage preparation with a Campfire Pot

condiment_recipe.description: Slice, dice & mix four bowls of a fine and flavorful relish to be used by the Cook as a Seasoning.
condiment_recipe.flavor: Cooking Oil or Mayonnaise are examples of bases. Savory vegetables are the strong or spicy ones, like Garlic or Heirbloom fruit

winter_soup_recipe.description: Hearty and sweet in equal measure, provides a nice and warm feeling!
winter_soup_recipe.flavor: Gotta use all the fruit before it's lost!

bone_marrow_recipe.description: Extremely nutritious roast made with animal bones.

boiled_shrooms_recipe.description: Boiling mushrooms will remove most of their impurities and improve their consistency.

shroom_omelette_recipe.description: A satisfying and tasty dish that is also easy to make.

roast_steak_recipe.description: The most prized and delicious cut of meat, slowly grilled on fire.

roast_fish_recipe.flavor: Straight from the sea! Or lake. Or the nearby stream...

roast_duck_recipe.description: A delicious and plump bird grilled with quality.

fruity_duck_recipe.description: The meat of a whole duck flavored with mushrooms and braised in sweet sauce.

fish_pot_pie_recipe.description: A delicious pie with a fish meat and mushroom filling.
fish_pot_pie_recipe.flavor: Better if made with all-'porpoise' flour

raw_rice_recipe.description: Delicious grains ready to be used in other recipes. Raw Rice can also be used as a vegetable.
raw_rice_recipe.flavor: Who knew grass could be so tasty?

corn_meal_recipe.description: Corn ground into a fine powder that can be used as a soft flour.

flour_recipe.description: Very commonly used for most kinds of baked goods. Wheat flour is a hard flour.

rice_flour_recipe.description: A formidable and versatile alternative for common flours, can be used as both a soft or hard flour.

nut_flour_recipe.description: Finely ground nuts. Can be used as a soft flour.

barley_flour_recipe.description: Ground barley seeds forming a rough, hard flour. Ideal for sourdoughs.

millet_flour_recipe.description: A fine, slightly silvery powder made from millet grains that can be used as a soft flour.

rye_flour_recipe.description: Flowy golden grains, almost like sand. Can be used as a hard flour.

dough_recipe.description: Mix and knead a malleable dough to be used on baking meals like bread.
dough_recipe.flavor: Watch it grow! Requires some leavening before it can be used

dough_flat_recipe.description: Knead and roll a flat dough with soft flour for unleavened breads.

dough_brown_recipe.description: Mix and knead a sticker, heavier dough out of flour and the whole grain.
dough_brown_recipe.flavor: Watch it grow! Requires some leavening before it can be used

dough_fluffy_recipe.description: Mix and knead a very malleable and lightweight dough with very thin rye flour.
dough_fluffy_recipe.flavor: Watch it grow! Requires some leavening before it can be used

dough_sour_recipe.description: Knead and prepare a rustic portion of barley dough to be naturally fermented.
dough_sour_recipe.flavor: Watch it grow! Requires some leavening before it can be used

dough_pie_recipe.description: Prepare and roll out a couple of pie crusts that will be baked into flaky, buttery pies!

dough_sweet_recipe.description: Prepare and knead an elastic and sweet dough for baking sugared goods.
dough_sweet_recipe.flavor: It is like cake-bread! Requires some leavening before it can be used

batter_recipe.description: Mix a delicious, sticky and creamy paste that can be used for coating baked goods.

batter_sweet_recipe.description: Prepare a sweet and wonderful mix that can be turned into things like CAKE!
batter_sweet_recipe.flavor: The cake is not a lie!

cooking_oil_recipe.description: Extract the oil from any oleaginous grains or herbs to be used as an ingredient or condiment base.
cooking_oil_recipe.flavor: Pumpkin seeds, Sunflowers, Corn or even Paddy are examples of oil sources

cooked_rice_recipe.description: Boiled to perfection and sticky enough.

dumpling_salmon_recipe.description: A little bread pocket with steamed salmon stuffed inside.
dumpling_salmon_recipe.flavor: A tasty delicacy of the Northern Alliance

fisherman_soup_recipe.description: A hearty and spicy soup made with carp that is quite filling.

catfish_tagine_recipe.description: Catfish meat and vegetables simmered in a clay pot.

lamb_tagine_recipe.description: Delicious bits of tender meat covered in bittersweet spices, dried dates and crunchy almonds.
lamb_tagine_recipe.flavor: Arguably the apex of Rayya's Children cuisine!

bug_meat_tagine_recipe.description: Chonky insects and veggies simmered in a clay pot.

sushi_recipe.description: A delicious specialty from hearthlings of a very distant land.
sushi_recipe.flavor: A recipe made popular by Rayya's Children caravans that crossed the Pal'Mum

sushi_vegetarian_recipe.description: A vegetarian alternative to an exotic dish.

sugar_loaf_recipe.description: Prepare a simple yet deliciously filling sugared bread loaf.
sugar_loaf_recipe.flavor: It will sprinkle sugar all over your clothes

panettone_recipe.description: Bake a large, tasty and sweet chunk of bread filled with dried fruits.
panettone_recipe.flavor: 'A festive meal for a festive time' -Irving Balduc

pasta_recipe.description: Prepare a tasty meal with long, rolled dough noodles and a hot sauce.
pasta_recipe.flavor: There are hundreds of pasta shapes from the fair glades of Darkmoor forest all the way to the Pal'Mum desert

seared_meat_veggies_recipe.description: Prepare a pleasant platter of buttered meat slices stirred with fresh veggies.

butter_cookies_recipe.description: Bake a bunch of small and tasty buttered delicacies.
butter_cookies_recipe.flavor: Cookies can make one's life better

buttered_bulbs_recipe.description: Stir a mix of mushrooms with butter and spices.

fish_fingers_recipe.description: Prepare and fry delicious and crunchy small cuts of fish.

poyo_nuggets_recipe.description: Slice, bread and fry tasty bits of poyo meat.

cheesecake_recipe.description: Bake a very soft and flavorful cheese cream and top it with delicious fruit jelly!
cheesecake_recipe.flavor: Cheese is great, cake is great, why not get them together?

peasant_salad_recipe.description: A basic combination of greens with some seasoning for taste.

veggie_roll_recipe.description: Ground meat and rice rolled in leafy greens and steamed until they're crispy!
veggie_roll_recipe.flavor: A traditional Pal'Mum delicacy that has earned the hearts of everyone!

fishwrap_recipe.description: Deliciously buttered fish fillets baked inside leafy veggies.
fishwrap_recipe.flavor: 'It's fish WRAP, not warp! You're not going anywhere with fish!' - Chef J.T. Kirkling

imperial_salad_recipe.description: An appetizing combination of cheese and greens.
imperial_salad_recipe.flavor: It is said that the old emperors of the Phoenix Empire loved eating veggies like this

flat_bread_recipe.description: Unleavened bread made from soft flour.
flat_bread_recipe.flavor: A Rayya's Children favorite for using up less grain than loafy breads

horsebread_recipe.description: A commoner's whole-grain loaf filled with minced veggies.
horsebread_recipe.flavor: A typical meal around The Ascendancy's countryside

barley_bun_recipe.description: Crispy crust, incredibly soft inside and with a buttery taste!
barley_bun_recipe.flavor: The pride of every Northern Alliance baker

crispbread_recipe.description: Somewhat short but fluffy and flavorful spiced bread.
crispbread_recipe.flavor: A favorite snack among the Mountain Folk

hardtack_recipe.description: They're hard and they're crunchy... But they'll keep people fed.
hardtack_recipe.flavor: Not a popular choice, but they take a very long time to spoil!

tortilla_recipe.description: Maleable and thin discs of deliciousness!
tortilla_recipe.flavor: Perhaps we should wrap them around other food?!

sourdough_bread_recipe.description: The taste of natural fermentation is palpable on this rustic bread.
sourdough_bread_recipe.flavor: Powdered with flour makes it extra rustic!

garlic_bread_recipe.description: Deliciously roasted with a savory touch and buttery texture.
garlic_bread_recipe.flavor: Everyone loves garlic bread! Garlic breath... Not so much

nutty_meatballs_recipe.description: Brings forth the most exquisite flavors.

northern_meatballs_recipe.description: A delicious combination of mashed sweet potatoes, lingonberry jam and well seasoned meatballs.
northern_meatballs_recipe.flavor: 'A very traditional meal present in most northern households' - Chef Ike H√§stbullar

nut_cake_recipe.description: Delicious and sweet, as cake should be.
nut_cake_recipe.flavor: Better appreciated with tea, close to your hearth, while it snows outside

honeybuns_recipe.description: Sweet and fluffy little buns made with honey and butter.

glazed_pork_ribs_recipe.description: Finely cut pork ribs, honey-glazed to perfection.

glazed_veggies_recipe.description: Stirred and fried vegetables with a crusty, sugared glazing.
glazed_veggies_recipe.flavor: Sweet and salty, all at once!

melted_poyo_recipe.description: A savory roasted poyo filled with veggies and covered in melted cheese.

egged_nut_pancakes_recipe.description: Delicious nut pancakes and poached eggs topped with sliced truffles.

hogs_bounty_recipe.description: A perfectly grilled piece of meat with scrambled large eggs and truffles.

truffled_risotto_recipe.description: A real treat from the southern lands, grated with cheese and seasoned to perfection.

legendary_ink_recipe.description: Special and gilded ink for illuminated manuscripts in 'The Walk of Cid'.
legendary_ink_recipe.flavor: It is a very... complicated mixture. Don't ask

thatch_pile_recipe.description: Store a large amount of thatching material for later use.

barley_pile_recipe.description: For when normal barley bales are just too small. Good for efficiently storing a large amount of barley

millet_pile_recipe.description: For when normal millet bales are just too small. Good for efficiently storing a large amount of millet

rye_pile_recipe.description: For when normal rye bales are just too small. Good for efficiently storing a large amount of rye

malted_grains_recipe.description: Toast some mixed, starchy grains. An ingredient necessary for brewing.
malted_grains_recipe.flavor: Malted Grains can also be milled for cooking oil

hearth_ambrosia_recipe.description: A divine dessert, deeply satisfying and fortifying at the same time.

seasonal_fruits_recipe.description: What a juicy and refreshing platter of fruits!
seasonal_fruits_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast meals must be placed down before consumed

ginger_cookies_recipe.description: Cute and tasty little gingerbread treats.
ginger_cookies_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast meals must be placed down before consumed

turkey_recipe.description: Hearty and flavorful! A very traditional meal for large groups.
turkey_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast meals must be placed down before consumed

ham_recipe.description: Very tender and succulent pork meat, seasoned with spices and fruits.
ham_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast meals must be placed down before consumed

veggie_stew_recipe.description: Warm and savory stock fortified with hearty veggies!

cook_mill_powered_ghost.description: Can be used by a Cook for milling. Requires mechanical power to work.

level_2_data.recipe_unlock_2_description: The Cook has learned to make slightly fancier recipes and can now build an oven for delicious baked goods and a leavening table to let their doughs rise - a process necessary for baking.

level_4_data.ornate_perk_description: The Cook has mastered the abilities necessary to create more diverse and specific foods, particularly specific rations for different animals.

level_6_data.mastery_description: From burning sauces to delighting crowds, a long journey has brought the Cook to the mastery of their craft. They now can try the most exotic and amazing recipes known to hearthlings.

cook_description.description: The art of cooking will provide a diverse menu of hearty or fortifying meals created with resources of many origins like vegetables, meat and foraged goods.

cook_workbench_pumpkin_ghost.description: Exotic! Can serve as a Metal Cooking Pot but only requires lower grade fuel.

cook_spoon_copper.description: Lighter and cleaner, this spoon will improve the Cook's efficiency and quality.

cook_workbench_ghost.description: Used for basic provisions and delicious recipes! Requires lower grade fuel.

cook_oven_ghost.description: Great for roasting things. Requires lower grade fuel.

cook_table_ghost.description: Used by the Cook for all sorts of kneading and preparing.

cook_oven_advanced.description: Reaching higher temperatures for higher palates. Requires lower or good grade fuel.

cook_workbench_advanced.description: Used by the finest Cooks for delicious meals. Requires lower or good grade fuel.

cook_leavening_table.description: Used by the Cook to let doughs rise.

veggie.description: Better than just broth... But could definitely be improved with a whole piece of meat!

meat.description: Getting there! Try some grain to make it thick and yummy!

leafy.description: It's great! Almost perfect! Now it just needs to be properly seasoned...

grain.description: It's pretty good! But can be even better with... A leafy veggie, maybe?

complete.description: A delicious stew prepared by the community. It's perfect!

broth.description: Only a bland stock for now... Could use some hearty veggies, maybe?

empty.description: Used by anyone to prepare pottage, a very communal meal!

iconic.description: Place it down before it can be used!

unlit.description: The campfire is fueled but the pottage requires Broth to be started.

wooden_animal_door_recipe.description: A large door for animal shelters, it can be closed by a shepherd. When closed, only hearthlings may go through!

wooden_animal_door_small_recipe.description: A small door for animal shelters.
wooden_animal_door_small_recipe.flavor: When placed on ground level, the two tiles of dirt underneath it must be dug out for it to work!

wooden_sign_tavern_recipe.description: A sign for a place where the night is long and merry.

long_bow_recipe.description: A longer cross-section makes it more efficient than an average bow.

crossbow_recipe.description: Not as reliable as a crossbow made with gears but still strong enough to pierce armor.

composite_bow_recipe.description: With a core made of bone and muscle fibers, the stretch allows for powerful arrows.
composite_bow_recipe.flavor: The Hunter and the Hunt as One

training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.
training_dummy_recipe.flavor: Can be repaired before it's completely broken

training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.
training_target_recipe.flavor: Can be repaired before it's completely broken

legendary_handle_recipe.description: The strong arm of the Ascendant Star.
legendary_handle_recipe.flavor: Long and ornate wooden handle strapped in high quality leather

ladder_recipe.description: Craft three pieces of ladder that can be placed as part of building blueprints.
ladder_recipe.flavor: Useful for reaching elevated cookie jars.

ladder_wide_recipe.description: A larger and prettier ladder for creating building blueprints.
ladder_wide_recipe.flavor: 'Chaos is not a pit. Chaos is a ladder' -Lord Petyr Belltower

bundle_of_firewood_recipe.description: Split that log into blocks for twice the fuel efficiency! Firewood is a common, lower grade fuel
bundle_of_firewood_recipe.flavor: 'Wait, so you are NOT supposed to put an ENTIRE log in the fire?' -Dumar Quath

splitting_block_recipe.description: Create a sturdy block for splitting logs.
splitting_block_recipe.flavor: Processing logs into firewood will double their fuel efficiency

comfy_bed_pet_recipe.description: Allows animals to have a more comfortable sleep.
comfy_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

ornate_bed_pet_recipe.description: Animals will have a wonderful time sleeping in this bed!
ornate_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

fuel_holder_large_wood_recipe.description: Build a reliable storage shed that will keep up to 18 Bundles O' Firewood ready to be used.

food_trough_wood_recipe.description: A trough for a Shepherd to serve food for animals in a pasture.
food_trough_wood_recipe.flavor: Shepherds will always try to keep troughs full

pet_food_bowl_wood_recipe.description: Hearthlings can put kibble in this wooden bowl for their pets to eat.
pet_food_bowl_wood_recipe.flavor: Hopefully they won't make much of a mess...

input_cask_wood_recipe.flavor: Can only hold certain fluids and dry goods

input_cask_wood_small_recipe.flavor: Can only hold certain fluids and dry goods

serving_keg_wood_recipe.description: A small serving container that the Brewer can fill with a drink.

output_tun_wood_recipe.description: Temporary storage for 32 items, tuns are able to hold different items as long as they're in the same category.
output_tun_wood_recipe.flavor: Used by crafters to store recently finished products

barrel_recipe.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.
barrel_recipe.flavor: Can hold a diverse range of fluids and dry goods

barrel_small_recipe.description: Stores up to 6 items of a certain kind.
barrel_small_recipe.flavor: Can hold a diverse range of fluids and dry goods

wooden_water_well_recipe.description: Assemble the materials for upgrading a simple well into a nice, better looking wooden well.
wooden_water_well_recipe.flavor: Requires a finished simple well. One can be dug by using the command inside the 'Place' menu!

water_well_roof_wood_recipe.description: Build a good-looking roof to spruce up your water well!

wooden_stool_recipe.flavor: A higher seat for lower purposes

counter_wood_corner_inner_recipe.description: An inner corner piece for your bar.

counter_wood_corner_outer_recipe.description: A corner piece for your bar.

counter_wood_mid_recipe.description: The main part of a wooden bar.
counter_wood_mid_recipe.flavor: An appropriate surface for nightly gossip

counter_wood_mid_small_recipe.description: Half the size of a regular midsection.
counter_wood_mid_small_recipe.flavor: An appropriate surface for nightly gossip

counter_wood_end_left_recipe.description: For properly finishing your bar if not against a wall.

counter_wood_end_right_recipe.description: For properly finishing your bar if not against a wall.
counter_wood_end_right_recipe.flavor: Make sure that the right end will end it right and not wrong

counter_wood_door_recipe.description: Allows hearthlings to traverse between both sides of the bar.

counter_shop_wood_corner_inner_recipe.description: An inner corner piece for your counter.

counter_shop_wood_corner_outer_recipe.description: A corner piece for your counter. Provides some priority storage for food, drinks and tonics.
counter_shop_wood_corner_outer_recipe.flavor: With a bolt of any cloth, can be transformed into a shop counter display for travelers and other players!

counter_shop_wood_mid_recipe.description: The main part of a wooden counter. Provides some priority storage for food, drinks and tonics.
counter_shop_wood_mid_recipe.flavor: With a bolt of any cloth, can be transformed into a shop counter display for travelers and other players!

counter_shop_wood_mid_small_recipe.description: Half the size of a regular midsection. Provides some priority storage for food, drinks and tonics.
counter_shop_wood_mid_small_recipe.flavor: With a bolt of any cloth, can be transformed into a shop counter display for travelers and other players!

counter_shop_wood_end_left_recipe.description: For properly finishing your counter if not against a wall.

counter_shop_wood_end_right_recipe.description: For properly finishing your counter if not against a wall.
counter_shop_wood_end_right_recipe.flavor: Make sure that the right end will end it right and not wrong

counter_shop_wood_desk_recipe.description: The forefront of any worthy establishment!
counter_shop_wood_desk_recipe.flavor: Counter desks will boost the value of all items being sold by counters and shelves (up to 12 blocks away) in a whopping 12%!

wood_market_stall_simple_recipe.description: This market stall can only be used by merchants of the first town level.
wood_market_stall_simple_recipe.flavor: Market stalls are used by merchants to set up their shops and are required to attract more than one merchant per day

blue_market_stall_recipe.description: This market stall can be used by merchants of up to the second town level.

wood_market_stall_fancy_recipe.description: This market stall can be used by all merchants and is needed by the wealthiest ones.

vitality_market_stall_recipe.description: This exclusive market stand will allow your town to be visited by a special merchant providing herb seeds that can be learned!
vitality_market_stall_recipe.flavor: Unlocked by the 'Banner of Vitality' Town Bonus

cheer_market_stall_recipe.description: This exclusive market stall will allow your town to be visited by a special merchant providing crop seeds that can be learned!
cheer_market_stall_recipe.flavor: Unlocked by the 'Hearth of Cheer' Town Bonus

comfy_bed_herbalist_recipe.description: Wounded or incapacitated hearthlings will prefer this bed, which can be placed closer to their medications and recovers them slightly faster.
comfy_bed_herbalist_recipe.flavor: Herbalist beds can't be personally owned

rc_bow_valor_recipe.flavor: A bow that demands skill of its wielder, but returns it in gales of arrows over their foes

window_box_brightbell_recipe.description: A decorative planter to be placed under window frames. Comes with Brightbells but a different herb can be chosen and planted by the Herbalist.

window_box_frostsnap_recipe.description: A decorative planter to be placed under window frames. Comes with Frostsnaps but a different herb can be chosen and planted by the Herbalist.

shepherds_crook_recipe.flavor: Can you tell me another story about The Shepherd?

wood_candle_holder_recipe.description: A simple wooden plate with candles.

candle_holder_wood_wall_recipe.description: A simple wooden wall support for a candle.

candle_holder_double_wood_wall_recipe.description: A simple wooden wall support for two candles.

candle_holder_ornate_wall_recipe.description: A fancy wall support for a candle.

candle_holder_double_ornate_wall_recipe.description: A fancy wall support for two candles.

present_small_recipe.description: Buy a delicate present for your town. Can be used as decoration or unwrapped.
present_small_recipe.flavor: Small presents contain two random items

present_recipe.description: Buy a beautiful present for your town. Can be used as decoration or unwrapped.
present_recipe.flavor: Presents contain up to four random items. One is guaranteed to be a special Frostfeast item!

present_large_recipe.description: Buy an amazing and big present for your town. Can be used as decoration or unwrapped.
present_large_recipe.flavor: Big presents contain up to six random items. Two are guaranteed to be special Frostfeast items!

candles_recipe.description: A nice and seasonal set of candles that can be placed on surfaces or hanging from the wall.
candles_recipe.flavor: 'The fire flickers on a winter's night, hope is renewed under Frostfeast's light'

wooden_door_wreath_recipe.description: A very warm and fancy way to welcome your neighbors.

dining_table_blue_recipe.description: Create some fancy tablecloth for a regular dining table!
dining_table_blue_recipe.flavor: Perfect for supporting food and gathering around in a cold night

dining_table_red_recipe.description: Create some fancy tablecloth for a regular dining table!
dining_table_red_recipe.flavor: Perfect for supporting food and gathering around in a cold night

dining_table_green_recipe.description: Create some fancy tablecloth for a regular dining table!
dining_table_green_recipe.flavor: Perfect for supporting food and gathering around in a cold night

dining_table_white_recipe.description: Create some fancy tablecloth for a regular dining table!
dining_table_white_recipe.flavor: Perfect for supporting food and gathering around in a cold night

end_table_blue_recipe.description: A nice and cozy small table with a pretty tablecloth!
end_table_blue_recipe.flavor: Really good for putting up the frostfeast tree...

end_table_red_recipe.description: A nice and cozy small table with a pretty tablecloth!
end_table_red_recipe.flavor: Really good for putting up the frostfeast tree...

end_table_green_recipe.description: A nice and cozy small table with a pretty tablecloth!
end_table_green_recipe.flavor: Really good for putting up the frostfeast tree...

end_table_white_recipe.description: A nice and cozy small table with a pretty tablecloth!
end_table_white_recipe.flavor: Really good for putting up the frostfeast tree...

level_1_data.transform_perk_description: The Carpenter is able to use their skills and their strong metal saw to carve certain wood objects like fallen tree trunks into furniture or other nice things!

level_5_data.ornate_perk_description: The Carpenter has enough skill to create valuable, intricate and extremely appealing objects by enhancing them with Gold Flakes

level_6_data.mastery_description: The Carpenter's mastery of their trade allows them to create all the possible goods and amazing ornate furniture one could imagine out of raw wood.

carpenter_description.description: The Carpenter can craft many goods like tools, construction parts, weapons and furniture from wood.

carpenter_saw_bone_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Carpenter.

carpenter_saw_bone.description: Tools of the trade for a Carpenter.

amberstone_bed_herbalist_recipe.description: Wounded or incapacitated hearthlings will prefer this bed, which can be placed closer to their medications and recovers them slightly faster.
amberstone_bed_herbalist_recipe.flavor: Herbalist beds can't be personally owned

amberstone_bed_pet_recipe.description: Allows animals to have a more comfortable sleep. Bunnies love this one, somehow...
amberstone_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

thatch_twine_bundle_recipe.description: Coil strains of dry grass together into a neat cordage that can be used as fiber.

thread_recipe.description: A refined product required for cloth and many other crafts. Must use fiber that can be spun into thread.

yarn_recipe.description: Spin animal wool into a versatile resource that can be used as both fiber or thread.
yarn_recipe.flavor: You might want to store these far away from kittens...

bolt_of_cloth_amberstone_recipe.description: Weave thin cords of fiber into a reliable and lightweight fabric much adored by the rabbit-folk.
bolt_of_cloth_amberstone_recipe.flavor: Made straight from fiber instead of thread!

fine_stuffing_recipe.description: Craft a couple of neat and useful wadding that can be used as a filling in several objects or pieces of clothing.

sunstroke_field_work_outfit_recipe.description: Simple and efficient. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_field_work_outfit_recipe.na_description: Simple and efficient. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.
sunstroke_field_work_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by workers and other civillians that work mostly outside, like Shepherds, Farmers or Trappers

sunstroke_crafter_outfit_recipe.description: A finely tailored hat. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_crafter_outfit_recipe.na_description: A finely tailored hat. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.
sunstroke_crafter_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by main civillian crafters that work inside, like Carpenters, Blacksmiths or Cooks

freezing_field_work_outfit_recipe.description: A warm, decorated hood. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_field_work_outfit_recipe.rc_description: A decorated hood. Protects from cold weather.
freezing_field_work_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by civillians that work mostly outside, like Shepherds, Farmers or Trappers

freezing_crafter_outfit_recipe.description: A fuzzy and ornate wool scarf. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_crafter_outfit_recipe.rc_description: An ornate wool scarf. Protects from cold weather.
freezing_crafter_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by main civillian crafters that work inside, like Carpenters, Blacksmiths or Cooks

freezing_combat_outfit_recipe.description: A thick cape made of multiple furs. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_combat_outfit_recipe.rc_description: A short cape made of fur. Protects from cold weather.
freezing_combat_outfit_recipe.flavor: This item can only be equipped by combat units, like Footmen, Archers or Clerics

chilly_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: Craft a Wool cap and gloves. Protects from chilly weather but with no added benefits.
chilly_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: A family favorite for autumn days

cold_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: Create a tepid leather outfit. Protects from cold weather but with no added benefits.

freezing_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: Sew a warm and fuzzy cloak. Protects from freezing weather but with no added benefits.
freezing_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: Bears can be found in wild caves or caught by very lucky trappers

cold_worker_outfit_recipe.description: A sturdy and tepid leather outfit of good quality. Protects from cold weather and improves speed.
cold_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: When winter arrives, look the part!

rc_winter_worker_outfit_recipe.description: A nice and thick wool outfit for protecting oneself from chilly weather. Also improves speed.
rc_winter_worker_outfit_recipe.flavor: It can be surprisingly cold in the desert

na_freezing_worker_outfit_recipe.description: The finest northern craftsmanship, a resistant and very warm outfit. Protects from freezing weather and improves speed.

backpack_cloth_recipe.description: Craft a very useful accessory that will allow Workers to be a bit more efficient at hauling.
backpack_cloth_recipe.flavor: Workers with backpacks won't be slowed down by carrying things and will pack/unpack faster

backpack_leather_recipe.description: Craft a very useful accessory that will allow Workers to be much more efficient at hauling.
backpack_leather_recipe.flavor: Workers with backpacks won't be slowed down by carrying things and will pack/unpack faster

sleeping_bag_recipe.description: Better than the ground but not really a homely bedding. Very portable, though!
sleeping_bag_recipe.flavor: A bed you can carry. Well, to be honest you can actually carry ANY bed...

simple_quiver_bolts_recipe.description: A quiver equippable by an archer. The bolts encased by it will slow down enemies.
simple_quiver_bolts_recipe.flavor: A bolt quiver can only be worn with crossbows

curtain_door_recipe.flavor: Can it even be called a door?

double_curtain_door_recipe.description: Sometimes a single curtain just won't cut it.

ornate_curtain_door_recipe.description: Absolutely the fanciest way to separate two rooms.
ornate_curtain_door_recipe.flavor: Might as well use it as a dress!

curtains_wide_recipe.description: For when the regular curtains are not enough.

curtains_tall_recipe.description: Sometimes a window needs a longer dress.

ornate_curtains_recipe.description: Craft a fancy and very elegant set of curtains.
ornate_curtains_recipe.flavor: Light has never been so beautifully blocked

ornate_curtains_wide_recipe.description: Create curtains for a very special household.

marble_curtains_recipe.description: Create a very regal set of long curtains.

marble_curtains_wide_recipe.description: Create a very regal set of long and wide curtains.

ornate_throw_rug_recipe.flavor: You will feel bad for stepping on it

ornate_banner_wall_recipe.description: Craft a beautiful ornament for a prosperous town.

legendary_hood_recipe.description: A beautiful hood worthy of the finest archer.
legendary_hood_recipe.flavor: No one can really read what is written on it. Looks cool, though.

legendary_cape_recipe.description: A majestic cape tailored for the Vanguard's Chain Mail.
legendary_cape_recipe.flavor: Capes like these were proudly worn by the Vanguard

porcelain_curtains_recipe.description: A large decoration that can cover an entire wall.
porcelain_curtains_recipe.flavor: Looks good with other porcelain furniture!

chitin_armor_recipe.flavor: Fares particularly well against external contaminants

chitin_helm_recipe.description: A good defense for one's head.
chitin_helm_recipe.flavor: Fares particularly well against external contaminants

chitin_shield_recipe.description: A somewhat sturdy shield made of bug chitin.

ornate_cleric_armor_recipe.description: Craft a sacred and more protective outfit for the Cleric. It also provides some bonuses.
ornate_cleric_armor_recipe.flavor: Your faith is your shield... but some leather will probably help

worker_holiday_hat_recipe.description: A traditional hat for enjoying the frostfeast holidays that will also protect from chilly weather.
worker_holiday_hat_recipe.flavor: The ACE team wishes you very happy holidays!

stocking_small_recipe.description: A fancy seasonal decoration to hang on walls or by the hearth.

stocking_recipe.description: An even bigger stocking for decorating your walls or hearth.
stocking_recipe.flavor: The more space you have, the more presents you get... right?

plushie_toy_deer_recipe.description: Craft an adorable plushie to decorate your home.
plushie_toy_deer_recipe.flavor: You may call it 'Rudolph' if you want

worker_holiday_outfit_recipe.description: A fuzzy and warm coat, excellent for partaking in seasonal celebrations.
worker_holiday_outfit_recipe.flavor: 'Look, the Frostfather has come to visit us!'

rug_gilded_blue_recipe.flavor: Some used to believe that a blue like this could only be milled from precious blue stone found deep within mountains far, far to the frozen north

rug_gilded_coral_recipe.flavor: It was rumored that earth from a long-dried seabed to the south was baked and ground to produce this lively red-orange

rug_gilded_red_recipe.flavor: The color is reminiscent of the flesh on the luscious, almost-purple berries grown in the foothills surrounding a faraway kingdom

rug_gilded_sage_recipe.flavor: Achieving a delicate green requires skill; this stain made from a pulp of potent herbs will rapidly turn anything sour

level_2_data.gear_crafting_description: The Weaver has acquired enough knowledge and abilities to create a Loom and create accessories, combat equipment and outfits that provide bonuses or enhancements.

level_3_data.extended_catalog_description: The Weaver has access to many materials and can come up with several new ways to sew, stitch and stretch textiles into wonderful things.

level_5_data.ornate_perk_description: The Weaver is now able to create decorations and other goods with outstanding appeal and beauty by using exotic resources.

level_6_data.mastery_description: The Weaver's mastery of their unique craft allows them to bend the roughest wool and the smoothest silk to their will, creating anything they desire.

weaver_description.description: The Weaver can turn hides into leather and fibers into cloth, working with them to create intricate goods, clothing, armor, useful accessories and decorations.

fish_trap.description: Provides fish meat and roe but can be set to capture the fish alive.
fish_trap.trap_tripped_description: The trap was tripped! It will soon be harvested by a Trapper...
fish_trap.conflicting_traps_description: Multiple traps share the same fishing area and will all have reduced efficiency.
fish_trap.low_water_description: There's not enough water in this area to catch much.
fish_trap.high_water_description: Deep water will allow this trap to catch the best fish around.
fish_trap.iconic_description: Used by the Trapper to catch fish. Can be accessed from above.
fish_trap.sprung_description: It caught something! It will soon be harvested by a Trapper...
fish_trap.empty_description: The trap was triggered but failed to get anything...

clamp_trap.description: Not so safely immobilizes its prey

level_1_data.perk_001_description: The Trapper is capable of placing and utilizing fish traps for providing your town with fish meat and, sometimes, fish roe.

level_3_data.trapper_level_3_description: Long practice helps the trapper salvage more from each animal.

level_6_data.trapper_level_6_description: The trapper can now use metal clamp traps to capture big game and also has a thing or two to teach the Engineer about setting traps.

trapper_description.description: The Trapper can arm snares to capture and (ahem) "harvest" wild critters for a reliable source of food, pelts and bones.

fish_trap_ghost.description: Must be built by the Trapper before it can be used.

shepherd_churn_recipe.description: A tool required by the Shepherd to stir, mix and churn different products like butter or cream.

shepherd_workbench_recipe.description: This tool can be used by the Shepherd for various things like preparing different types of animal feed.

shepherd_cheese_vat_recipe.description: The Shepherd can use this to make cheese by crafting curdling mixtures. It can also be used to make sour cream.
shepherd_cheese_vat_recipe.flavor: The longer it rests the more valuable it gets but you can harvest the cheese at any time during the maturation

curdling_mixture_recipe.description: A fermentation mixture of milk and some other additives. Within a cheese vat this can be turned into cheese!
curdling_mixture_recipe.flavor: Vinegar can be provided by the Brewer

butter_recipe.description: Churn a creamy and flavorful paste that is often used as a cooking ingredient.
butter_recipe.flavor: With bread it goes like bread and... Eh, nevermind

cream_recipe.description: Stir the milk to bring up its layers and skim the fatty, denser top layer. Used as a fine cooking ingredient.

mayonnaise_recipe.description: A tangy mixture of egg yolk, oils and acids that is rather appreciated as a sauce or cooking ingredient and condiment base.

pasture_bed_small_recipe.description: Small pasture animals will go to these during the night or bad weather, place them under shelter.
pasture_bed_small_recipe.flavor: Must be placed inside a pasture, can be placed on walls. Small animals include ducks, poyos and rabbits

pasture_bed_recipe.description: Large pasture animals will go to these during the night or bad weather, place them under shelter.
pasture_bed_recipe.flavor: Must be placed inside a pasture. Large animals include oinkers, sheep, ostriches and moo-moos

rabbit_feed_recipe.description: Selected foodstuffs for rabbits. Improves the quality of animal produce.

poyo_feed_recipe.description: Nicely milled food for poyos. Improves the quality of animal produce.

duck_feed_recipe.description: Favorite ingredients for ducks! Improves the quality of animal produce.

oinker_feed_recipe.description: A bit of anything, really. Improves the quality of animal produce.

sheep_feed_recipe.description: Tasty fibers for sheep. Improves the quality of animal produce.

fodder_recipe.description: Cheap and efficient for feeding animals, even if not exactly their favorite food...

ostrich_feed_recipe.description: A nutritious supplement for ostriches. Improves the quality of animal produce.

moomoo_feed_recipe.description: Tasty and hearty food appreciated by large ruminants. Improves the quality of animal produce.

wooden_sign_shepherd_recipe.description: A sign with the mark of the Shepherd, to be placed on buildings.

hearth_fodder_recipe.description: Animal fodder imbued with the essence of the Hearth.
hearth_fodder_recipe.flavor: Hearthbud Animal Fodder is appreciated by all animals and will greatly increase the quality of their products!

kibble_recipe.description: Bake simple, basic rations for hearthlings' pets. All will eat this kibble.
kibble_recipe.flavor: Not their favorite but will do the trick; The Shepherd can use the Cook's Oven for this recipe

kibble_fish_recipe.description: Bake savory, crunchy rations for hearthlings' pets. Exclusively vegetarian pets will not eat this kibble.
kibble_fish_recipe.flavor: Particularly tasty for kittens; The Shepherd can use the Cook's Oven for this recipe

kibble_meat_recipe.description: Bake hearty, proteic rations for hearthlings' pets. Exclusively vegetarian pets will not eat this kibble.
kibble_meat_recipe.flavor: More efficient than fish, but not as tasty; The Shepherd can use the Cook's Oven for this recipe

kibble_veggie_recipe.description: Bake delicious and healthy rations for hearthlings' pets. Exclusively carnivore pets will not eat this kibble.
kibble_veggie_recipe.flavor: The Shepherd can use the Cook's Oven for this recipe

kibble_hearth_recipe.description: Bake magically enhanced rations that will make hearthlings' pets extremely satisfied! All pets will eat this kibble.
kibble_hearth_recipe.flavor: ‚ù§ Our pets deserve all the love ‚ù§

simple_bed_pet_recipe.description: A slightly better place for hearthlings' pets to sleep.
simple_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

simple_bed_pet_2_recipe.description: A slightly better place for hearthlings' pets to sleep.
simple_bed_pet_2_recipe.flavor: Pets will always try to sleep on the bed that is closest to their owner's bed!

goat_recipe.description: A traditional Frostfeast decoration for humble abodes and peasant houses.

goat_small_recipe.description: A tiny version of the traditional Frostfeast Goat, made with a bit of thatching and string.
goat_small_recipe.flavor: Loved as a toy or as a decoration

goat_large_recipe.description: A big and very traditional decoration made with lots of dry straw and clay.

shepherd_cheese_vat_empty.description: Used by the Shepherd to make cheese. The longer it rests, the better!

shepherd_cheese_vat_filled.description: The milk is curdling and shall take some time before it can be drained and formed.

shepherd_cheese_vat_cream.description: The cream is fermenting and should be done in a day or so.

shepherd_cheese_vat_cream_sour.description: Foamy and soft... The cream is sour and ready to be used!

shepherd_cheese_vat_curdled.description: Curds have formed. Drain the leftover whey or harvest for Cottage Cheese.

shepherd_cheese_vat_cheese_fresh.description: Fresh cheese has formed! Harvest it or let it mature some more.

shepherd_cheese_vat_cheese_mild.description: Mild cheese has formed! Harvest it or let it mature even more for a lot of time.

shepherd_cheese_vat_cheese_aged.description: This cheese is quite mature, firm and flavorful! It is time to harvest this delicacy.

shepherd_hood.description: A wooly hood used by the shepherd.

level_1_data.small_animals_description: The shepherd has just started mastering the techniques of animal taming and can only tame small animals.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Shepherd has learned how to wander these lands and tame its animals. Now it's time to learn how to settle down - and work the land itself. See the promotion menu for details.

level_3_data.big_animals_description: The shepherd is now much more experienced with animals and can tame large animals.

level_5_data.exotic_animals_description: The shepherd has mastered all there is to know about domestic animals and can even handle exotic, magical creatures.

level_6_data.level_6_description: Complete mastery of the shepherd's trade allows them to form a stronger bond with any animal. The positive effects of compassion on animals will last longer and the negative effects of slaughtering will be shorter.

shepherd_description.description: Nature-loving loners, shepherds domesticate gentle animals to care for them, harvest their resources like wool or meat and even process some of them like milk or eggs.

shepherd_crook_corn.description: A crook that increases the Shepherd's Compassion and the happiness of the herd.

shepherd_churn.description: Used by the Shepherd to churn, stir and skim different products.

shepherd_workbench.description: Used by the Shepherd for assembling materials or milling feed.

shepherd_crook_clay_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Shepherd.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes up to 25% greater yield from each plant.
level_2_data.perk_001_description: The farmer can plant flowers to make a lovely garden! (They can grow decorative flowers.)
level_2_data.perk_002_description: Exposure to fresh food has given the farmer ideas about cooked food, and too much time with crops and plants has made the farmer contemplate the possibilities of caring for more exciting and interactive beings. See the promotion menu for details.
level_2_data.perk_002_description_2: Too much time with crops and plants has made the farmer contemplate the possibilities of caring for more exciting and interactive beings. See the promotion menu for details.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The farmer can use fertilizer on crops to potentially increase their quality.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes up to 50% greater yield from each plant.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes up to 100% more yield from each plant.
level_6_data.perk_001_description: The farmer's masterful skills can now occasionally cause a crop to grow much larger and become a mega crop. These rare giant plants will provide extra resources or unique rewards.

farmer_description.description: Farmers till fields, sow seeds and harvest crops, taming the land to provide a consistent supply of food, ingredients for cooking, fibers and more.

farmer_mega_watermelon_hat.description: Can be used by Farmers for a small Speed gain and keeping their head refreshed.

freezing_crafter_outfit.description: An ornate wool scarf. Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_crafter_outfit.rc_description: An ornate wool scarf. Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from cold weather.

sunstroke_crafter_outfit.description: Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_crafter_outfit.na_description: Can only be worn by crafters. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.

na_sunstroke_crafter_outfit.description: Can only be worn by crafters. Protects from sunstrokes.

freezing_combat_outfit.description: Heavy cover of pelts. Can only be worn by fighters. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_combat_outfit.rc_description: Heavy cover of pelts. Can only be worn by fighters. Protects from cold weather.

freezing_field_work_outfit.description: Warm. Can only be worn by field workers. Protects from freezing weather.
freezing_field_work_outfit.rc_description: Warm. Can only be worn by field workers. Protects from cold weather.

sunstroke_field_work_outfit.description: A hat for workers and field workers. Protects from hot weather and sunstrokes.
sunstroke_field_work_outfit.na_description: A hat for workers and field workers. Protects the wearer from sunstrokes.

na_sunstroke_field_work_outfit.description: A hat for workers and field workers. Protects from sunstrokes.

wooden_sign_brewer_recipe.description: A sign with the mark of the Brewer, to be placed on buildings.
wooden_sign_brewer_recipe.flavor: The hexagram is one of the oldest and most traditional brewing symbols

brewer_workbench_recipe.description: Used by the Brewer for crafting simple drinks and ingredients.

brewer_kettle_recipe.description: Used by the Brewer for mashing, heating and boiling brews.
brewer_kettle_recipe.flavor: This is where the magic happens

brewer_fermenting_vat_recipe.description: The Brewer can use this to make either ale or beer using different types of wort.
brewer_fermenting_vat_recipe.flavor: Ale & Beer makes hearthlings happy and only slightly tipsy

brewer_drying_bed_recipe.description: The Brewer may use this frame to let certain products dry before they can be used.
brewer_drying_bed_recipe.flavor: Both Tea & Coffee require drying during their production

brewer_wine_cask_recipe.description: Using this vessel, the Brewer is able to ferment different wines from fruit must.
brewer_wine_cask_recipe.flavor: Wines are both valuable commodities and exquisite beverages

brewer_treading_vat_recipe.description: The Brewer can use this vat to trample over fruits, crushing them and starting their fermentation.
brewer_treading_vat_recipe.flavor: Treading vats are used to make must which is then fermented into wine

brewer_distillery_recipe.description: The Brewer can use this to create exquisite prepared drinks.
brewer_distillery_recipe.flavor: Distilled drinks tend to be very strong

brewer_fermenting_carboy_recipe.description: The Brewer can use this to make mead or fruity mead with unfermented mead and vinegar with finished mead.
brewer_fermenting_carboy_recipe.flavor: Mead is appreciated by many but will make hearthlings tipsy

gruit_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Herbalist's lab for this recipe!

malted_grains_recipe.description: Toast some grains until they're perfectly golden. An ingredient for brewing but can also be milled for cooking oil.
malted_grains_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's oven for this recipe!

malted_wheat_recipe.description: Toast some wheat grains until they're perfectly golden. An ingredient necessary for brewing White Beer.
malted_wheat_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's brick oven for this recipe!

malted_barley_recipe.description: Toast some barley grains until they're perfectly bronze. An ingredient necessary for brewing common Beer.
malted_barley_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's brick oven for this recipe!

malted_millet_recipe.description: Toast some millet kernels until they're perfectly brown. An ingredient necessary for brewing Opaque Beer.
malted_millet_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's brick oven for this recipe!

malted_rye_recipe.description: Toast some rye grains until they're perfectly brassy. An ingredient necessary for brewing Pale Ale.
malted_rye_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's brick oven for this recipe!

coffee_sorted_recipe.description: Sort out only the best and perfectly ripe cherries from a bunch of baskets and get them ready to be dried!
coffee_sorted_recipe.flavor: Coffee Cherries are dried on a drying bed

coffee_roasted_recipe.description: Coffee Beans are perfectly roasted when they reach a deep, dark brown color and become slightly brittle.
coffee_roasted_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's oven for this recipe!

coffee_ground_recipe.description: After grinding this coffee will be ready to be brewed into delicious and energetic beverages!
coffee_ground_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's mill grinder for this recipe!

tea_leaves_steamed_recipe.description: Let the vapors cleanse these leaves so that they can be properly dried into green or black tea leaves.
tea_leaves_steamed_recipe.flavor: Tea leaves are dried on a drying bed

ground_tea_green_recipe.description: Delicately ground tea leaves, this ingredient is required for all the green tea recipes.
ground_tea_green_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's mill grinder for this recipe!

ground_tea_black_recipe.description: Exhales a smell that can't be mistaken with anything else. Required by all the black tea recipes.
ground_tea_black_recipe.flavor: The Brewer can use the Cook's mill grinder for this recipe!

wort_ale_recipe.description: An extract of mashed malted grains and herbs. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into ale!
wort_ale_recipe.flavor: Pure malt wort can also be further distilled into other drinks

wort_ale_pale_recipe.description: Boiled malted rye with juniper berries. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into pale ale!
wort_ale_pale_recipe.flavor: This refined northern recipe makes ale that are as appreciated as the best beers

wort_beer_white_recipe.description: A lightweight and bitter mixture of malted wheat and gruit. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into white beer!
wort_beer_white_recipe.flavor: White Beer has a very unique quality and appreciated flavor, providing some nutrition

wort_beer_recipe.description: A bitter and strong mash of grains and gruit. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into beer!
wort_beer_recipe.flavor: Beers are ready quicker than common Ale and makes hearthlings slightly happier

wort_beer_opaque_recipe.description: A thicker, stronger mixture of millet malt and sugary fruits. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into beer!
wort_beer_opaque_recipe.flavor: Opaque Beer is a very traditional beverage towards the east with a lot of nutrition to it

unfermented_vinegar_brew_recipe.description: Prepare any beer or ale to be fermented again. Within a Fermentation Vat it can be turned into one jug of vinegar.

unfermented_vinegar_mead_recipe.description: Prepare any mead to be fermented again. Within a Fermentation Carboy it can be turned into two jugs of vinegar.

unfermented_vinegar_wine_recipe.description: Prepare any wine to be fermented again. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into three jugs of vinegar.
unfermented_vinegar_wine_recipe.flavor: Wine is most efficient vinegar ingredient

unfermented_vinegar_juice_recipe.description: Prepare an appropriate fruit juice to be fermented. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into one jug of vinegar.
unfermented_vinegar_juice_recipe.flavor: Juice is the least efficient vinegar ingredient - but also the cheapest!

must_berry_recipe.description: Crushed berries with skins and juice. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into berry wine!

must_cherry_recipe.description: A fragrant mash of cherry juice and skins. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into cherry wine!

must_prickly_pear_recipe.description: A surprisingly sweet and tasty mash. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into prickly pear wine!
must_prickly_pear_recipe.flavor: You might want to keep your shoes on for these...

must_apple_recipe.description: Squishy, solid bits of apples and juice. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into cider!

must_date_recipe.description: Sweet and sticky mash of crushed date fruits. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into date wine!

must_pear_recipe.description: A juicy and sweet puree of pears. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into perry!

must_plum_recipe.description: Flavorful juice and floating bits of plums. Within a Wine Cask it can be turned into plum wine!

spirit_recipe.description: A distilled, moderately strong alcoholic beverage from grains.

spirit_sugar_recipe.description: A special, very sweet and strong distilled beverage from malt and sugarbells.

spirit_northern_recipe.description: A unique and appreciated brew from the Northern Alliance that uses sweet potatoes instead of grain.

spirit_fruit_recipe.description: A distilled, moderately strong alcoholic beverage from fruits.
spirit_fruit_recipe.flavor: Fruity and sweet, a festival favorite!

liqueur_almond_recipe.description: A very refined and traditional Rayya's Children recipe for a luxury beverage.
liqueur_almond_recipe.flavor: Particularly good after a great meal

liquor_recipe.description: A complex, flavorful and quite strong alcoholic beverage from fermented wort.
liquor_recipe.flavor: A very fancy drink for a very fancy town

tea_recipe.description: A fragrant and warm beverage very appreciated by many! Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_pine_recipe.description: Smells good and tastes better, a real forest treasure. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_pine_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_green_recipe.description: Deep and soft all at once, a beverage for the mind. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_green_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_black_recipe.description: The unique and unmistakable fragrance will enlight all the senses. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_black_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_desert_recipe.description: A unique recipe to the children of Rayya, a flowery black tea from Pal'Mum. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_desert_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_amberstone_recipe.description: A traditional recipe from the clan, delighting palates for centuries. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_amberstone_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

tea_fancy_recipe.description: The elegant and heartwarming flavor of dried daisies and green tea. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
tea_fancy_recipe.flavor: Prepared tea must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

coffee_recipe.description: A filtered, warm and energizing beverage held dear to many late-night workers! Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
coffee_recipe.flavor: Prepared coffee must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

coffee_milk_recipe.description: The deep flavor of coffee perfectly balanced with the softness of milk. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
coffee_milk_recipe.flavor: Prepared coffee must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

coffee_bold_recipe.description: A much stronger and deeper preparing of coffee using a special pot to steam it through the grains. Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
coffee_bold_recipe.flavor: Prepared coffee must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

coffee_lavish_recipe.description: A refined, sweet and flavorful recipe with all the elegance that coffee lovers deserve! Provides multiple bonuses to hearthlings.
coffee_lavish_recipe.flavor: Prepared coffee must be placed somewhere in order to be consumed

juice_berry_recipe.description: Create a fruity beverage from wild berries.

juice_cherry_recipe.description: A sour, flavorful recipe that uses wild cherries.

juice_prickly_pear_recipe.description: A peculiar beverage made with prickly pears.
juice_prickly_pear_recipe.flavor: Make sure that no spine will go with the juice...

juice_carrot_recipe.description: A nutritious and refreshing drink recipe that uses fruits and carrots.

juice_apple_recipe.description: Sweet, red apples turned into a refreshing beverage.

juice_date_recipe.description: Sweet like caramel and with an exotice flavor. This is a refreshing drink.

juice_pear_recipe.description: Not so sweet and not so sour, a perfect match. Definitely refreshing!

juice_plum_recipe.description: Sweet with an acidic spark. It's a quite refreshing juice.

juice_golden_gourd_recipe.description: Not the best flavor, but a traditional refreshment in the desert - also quite efficient.
juice_golden_gourd_recipe.flavor: A unique recipe from the Rayya's Children

juice_sweet_potato_recipe.description: Hearty and with a mild taste - can definitely keep you up and healthy as it also includes some food nutrition.
juice_sweet_potato_recipe.flavor: A unique recipe from the Northern Alliance

sage_water_recipe.description: Slightly sweet with a hint of spices, this refreshing drink can also help with focus and concentration.
sage_water_recipe.flavor: A unique recipe from the Ascendancy

juice_watermelon_recipe.description: Deliciously refreshing juice straight from hearty, ripe watermelons.

juice_heirbloom_recipe.description: A tasty juice with the peculiar, strong taste of heirbloom fruits.

almond_milk_recipe.description: Almond Milk is a flavorful yet thinner alternative for dairy milk. Can be drank raw or used as 'Any Milk' in recipes!
almond_milk_recipe.flavor: Dates are a great sweetener for almond milk

clarea_water_recipe.description: Simply spiced honey water, first boiled and then cooled down. Refreshing and reinvigorating!

smoothie_recipe.description: The fruity flavors go perfectly with the creamy milk in this refreshing and sweet beverage.

unfermented_mead_recipe.description: A mixture of water, honey and yeast. Within a Carboy it can be turned into mead!
unfermented_mead_recipe.flavor: Take rainwater kept for years, and mix a sextarius of it with a pound of honey -'On Rural Affairs', early Phoenix Empire writings

unfermented_mead_fruit_recipe.description: Like mead, but spiced up with some flavorful fruits. Within a Carboy it can be turned into fruity mead!

spirit_hearth_recipe.description: A delicious and magical beverage. Will empower hearthlings but also make them a little tipsy.
spirit_hearth_recipe.flavor: It's hard to tell the magical effects from the... other effects

wine_apple_serving_pitcher_recipe.description: Provides 14 goblets of cider. It needs to be placed down before being used.
wine_apple_serving_pitcher_recipe.flavor: Pitchers prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

wine_date_serving_pitcher_recipe.description: Provides 14 goblets of date wine. It needs to be placed down before being used.
wine_date_serving_pitcher_recipe.flavor: Pitchers prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

mead_serving_pitcher_recipe.flavor: Pitchers prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

mead_fruit_serving_pitcher_recipe.description: Provides 10 goblets of fruity mead. It needs to be placed down before being used.

beer_opaque_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 16 tankards of opaque beer. It needs to be placed down before being used.
beer_opaque_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

beer_opaque_gourd_recipe.description: Provides 18 tankards of beer. It needs to be placed down before being used.
beer_opaque_gourd_recipe.flavor: The traditional way to serve this beverage. Requires a really large golden gourd!

ale_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 16 tankards of ale. It needs to be placed down before being used.
ale_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

ale_pale_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 16 tankards of pale ale. It needs to be placed down before being used.
ale_pale_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

spirit_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 24 cups of malt spirit. It needs to be placed down before being used.
spirit_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

spirit_fruit_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 24 cups of fruit spirit. It needs to be placed down before being used.
spirit_fruit_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

spirit_sugar_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 24 cups of sugar bomb. It needs to be placed down before being used.
spirit_sugar_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

spirit_hearth_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 24 cups of hearthbud spirit. It needs to be placed down before being used.
spirit_hearth_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

liquor_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 24 cups of liquor. It needs to be placed down before being used.
liquor_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

beer_buttered_serving_keg_recipe.description: A special brew of the Ascendancy. Sweet, flavorful and with little alcohol content.
beer_buttered_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Requires placement before it can be used

ale_table_recipe.description: A simple brew with very little alcohol content and quite a bunch of nutritional content. Ideal for thirsty workers!

liqueur_almond_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 28 cups the special Rayya's Children brew. It needs to be placed down before being used.
liqueur_almond_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

spirit_northern_serving_keg_recipe.description: Provides 28 cups of the special Northern Alliance's brew. It needs to be placed down before being used.
spirit_northern_serving_keg_recipe.flavor: Tapped drinks prevent waste, thus dispensing more servings

egg_milk_punch_recipe.description: A creamy and sweet beverage mixed with some very flavorful spirits.
egg_milk_punch_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast beverages must be placed down before consumed

mulled_wine_recipe.description: Heated, sweet wine with spices and fruits. A winter favorite!
mulled_wine_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast beverages must be placed down before consumed

hot_coco_recipe.description: Warm, sweet and deliciously tasty! A seasonal beverage from exotic lands...
hot_coco_recipe.flavor: Frostfeast beverages must be placed down before consumed

brewer_tumbler_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Brewer

brewer_tumbler.description: One of the most essential tools for a Brewer.

brewer_description.description: A master of beverages, the Brewer will provide your town with delicious and enhancing drinks using many different tools and traditional techniques.

level_6_data.title: Brewmaster
level_6_data.mastery_description: Waving the tumbler like a magician with their wand, the Brewer is capable of coming up with the best brews, fermenting the highest quality drinks and preparing the best beverages anyone can imagine, marking their name on the history of brewing.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: With no more than a table and a small press, the Brewer can prepare very simple drinks like juices or tap serving kegs and pitchers.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Brewer learns the art of vinification and is able to tread on simple fruits for their must and set them to ferment in brand new wine casks.

level_3_data.perk_000_description:
When inspiration strikes, the Brewer can prepare drinks of Fine quality.

Additionally, by utilizing new tools like a large kettle for heating and a ceramic fermentation carboy, the horizons of the Brewer are expanded with some new options like tea or mead, a delicious alcoholic drink made from honey.

level_4_data.perk_000_description:
The Brewer is now capable of building large fermentation vats for working larger quantitites of brews!

From malting grain to boiling wort, they can start producing Ale.
level_4_data.perk_001_description: The Brewer is now a master of simpler recipes, being able to create the best juices, teas, and wines.

level_5_data.perk_001_description: When inspiration strikes, the Brewer can prepare drinks of Excellent quality. These drinks are more valuable and generally better!
level_5_data.perk_000_description: Ideas having been brewing in their head, and the Brewer can now use heating and pressure to their advantage with a distillery that is able to create strong spirits and other refined beverages.

brewer_workbench.description: Used by the Brewer for crafting simple drinks and ingredients.

brewer_distillery.description: For crafting complex beverages and mixtures. Requires lower grade fuel.

brewer_fermenting_vat_empty.description: Used by the Brewer for fermenting ale and beer.

brewer_fermenting_vat_beer.description: The beer is ready! It can now be filtered and collected!

brewer_fermenting_vat_wort_beer.description: The bitter and flavorful wort is fermenting. Soon it shall become beer!

brewer_fermenting_carboy_empty.description: A ceramic vessel used by the Brewer for producing mead or vinegar.

brewer_fermenting_carboy_mead.description: The mead is ready and can now be racked into jugs!

copper_wall_lantern_ghost.description: Produces a cold, soft light from the moonbells.

old_wood_log.description: A log. Made of wood, really old wood.

brightbell.description: A common, sweet flower. Useful as a healing herb.

goat.description: A traditional Frostfeast decoration for humble abodes and peasant houses.

goat_small.description: A tiny goat made with dry fibers. Beloved as a seasonal toy or decoration.

goat_large.description: So pretty, so... flammable. Try not to burn it before Frostfeast's night...

present_golem.description: Suspiciously magic. Bounces around every now and then...

light_string_horizontal.description: A string of joy powered by the Hearth!

light_string_horizontal_short.description: Perfect for decorating in the winter!

light_string_vertical.description: Can be hanged from edges for great effect!

light_string_vertical_short.description: A cascade of happiness for the end of the year!

mistletoe.description: A beloved seasonal decoration. Kiss and don't tell!

hearth_wolf.description: Proof that your crafters learned the land and created worthy goods

wooden_sign_brewer.description: A sign with the mark of the Brewer

wooden_sign_shepherd.description: A sign with the mark of the Shepherd

pewter_teapot.description: Refined. Elegant. All the untarnished values of society.

stone_teapot.description: Here to prove that tea is a brittle-ish thing.

iron_teapot.description: Careful when moving it around... It's quite heavy!

bronze_pitcher.description: Sleek and smooth, will keep your beverages cool.

silver_pitcher.description: So reflective that you'll make funny faces!

firepit_marble.description: Will bring warmth to your fancy household.

marble_bird_bath.description: It's like a tiny swimming pool.

marble_curtains.description: Ensure the privacy of your estate.

marble_fountain.description: Your garden will never be the same anymore.

marble_garden_lantern.description: No path goes downhill when lit by this one.

marlbe_wall_lantern.description: As if having marble everywhere else wasn't enough.

porcelain_coffee_pot.description: Beautiful and ornate, perfect for a high quality beverage.

copper_coffee_pot.description: Easy to clean and keeps the beverage warm!

moka_coffee_pot.description: A unique and special pot for extracting the boldest flavors from the roast.

copper_weighing_scale.description: Makes you look a lot smarter!

dragon_shrine.description: A monument forged with dragon fire itself to celebrate this unique bond!

iconic.description: Place it somewhere to attract dragon friends... And their enemies!

radiant_shrine.description: An intricate device honoring the radiant sun that first shed light onto the world.

static_component_info.description:
A complex and yet beautifully made armillary sphere moves with elegance and perfection. In its scenter, a magical essence of some sort radiates warm, comforting light. The light that has created our world, this world we love to inhabit!

This shrine is our very heartwarm 'Thank you' to the original members of Radiant Entertainment, creators of Stonehearth!
