candle_holder_double_pewter_wall.description: Illuminating suspicious corridors since time imemmorial.

candelabra_pewter.description: A strong light solution for your dinner room!

quaint_farm.description: Farmers working golden fields of grain in a sunny day. A very bucolic scene.

wombat.description: Its fluffiness inspired the art school known as plushinism. It only eats greens.

monkey.description: It's a sacred monkey! This little fellow eats only vegetables.

panda.description: Cute bear from east beyond Pal'Mum. It prefers vegetables but can eat anything.

duck.description: It will honk everywhere, your new best friend. It eats a little bit of everything.

oinker_mini.description: Oink! It eats a little bit of everything.

dragon_young_copper.description: Not a whelp anymore! Is it... still growing?

dragon_juvenile_copper.description: So heavy yet agile! It's still growing - will it ever stop?

dragon_mature_copper.description: It's stronger, faster and can even fight! Is it still growing, though?

dragon_copper.description: A strong friend and protector. Glorious!

dragon_copper_egg_fertilized_ghost.description: So mysterious! It should be placed somewhere damp and rusty...

dragon_fire_egg_fertilized_ghost.description: So mysterious! It should be placed somewhere that is very warm...

dragon_ice_egg_fertilized_ghost.description: So mysterious! It should be placed somewhere dark and cold...

dragon_nature_egg_fertilized_ghost.description: So mysterious! It should be placed somewhere safe and wild...

dragon_fire.description: Smaller than most dragons but agile and fierce with strong attacks!

dragon_ice.description: A bulky and tough dragon! Able to resist most blows and attacks!

dragon_nature.description: Agile and smart, this dragon can poison enemies and break armor with acid!

dragon_juvenile_fire.description: It's growing so fast! Soon it will be breathing fire...

dragon_juvenile_ice.description: It won't stop growing! Belly rubs are getting kinda cold...

dragon_juvenile_nature.description: Look how it grows! Soon it will be a strong supporter!

dragon_mature_fire.description: Will still grow a bit but already a fearsome opponent!

dragon_mature_ice.description: Not fully grown but can pack a punch or two... Or hundreds!

dragon_mature_nature.description: Still learning how to control their acid, not fully developed!

dragon_young_fire.description: Not a whelp anymore! One day...

dragon_young_ice.description: Just a child but already so tough!

dragon_young_nature.description: A baby dragon that burps... acid. Be careful!

cabbageling.description: It's a living cabbage! It apparently doesn't need food! (It IS food, kind of...)
cabbageling.iconic_description: Place it on the ground and... See what happens?!

nest.description: I'm sure they wouldn't mind if an egg or two are missing... Right?

rabbit_young.description: So little and cute! Will be a fine rabbit one day.

deer_young.description: A young animal in need of love and care.

moomoo.unripe_description: This animal has no milk at the moment.
moomoo.description: A big ruminant that loves eating grass and provides milk!

wild_moomoo.description: A strong and wild ruminant, an older relative of the gentler moo-moo.

beehive.description: Careful, it is still active! Honey can be harvested but the bees will be lost.

beehive_dead.description: There are no bees here anymore... Harvest if for what's left of the resources!

egg.description: Are you sure it isn't a swan egg?

nest.description: Duck eggs are very nutritious. Just saying.

oinker.description: Smelly fellows that love sniffling 'em truffles! Oh, and the bacon...

oinker_young.description: It's a tiny oinker! Oink, oink!

cherry_basket.description: Sweet or sour, a tasty fruit for any hour.

cherry_serving.description: A cherry is always on top, even when there's nothing below.

cooked_nuts.description: A basket of delicious and warm edible nuts.

cherry_tart.description: A simple yet tasty baked dessert made with cherries.

huntsman_banquet.description: A perfectly roasted venison prepared with a bittersweet woodland sauce.

nutty_poultry.description: A hot mix of poultry cuts and sliced nuts.

pie_cherry.description: Hard to make but quite easy to eat!

nut_pralines.description: An exotic and satisfyingly crispy bunch of sweetened nuts.

broth.description: Very nutritious but not really exciting. Required to start pottage preparation!

bone_marrow.description: Extremely nutritious but definitely not satisfying.

chanterelle_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

desert_truffle_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

bolete_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

winter_morel_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

boiled_shrooms.description: A simple yet satisfying boiling of diverse mushrooms.

shroom_omelette.description: Slightly more satisfying than your regular omelette.

steak.description: A high quality piece of raw prime meat.

rotten.description: Once magnificent, now stinky... Has no use anymore.

roast_steak.description: A very fine and premium piece of roasted meat.

rotten.description: It stinks even more than before.

fish_roe_basket.description: Edible fish eggs, tiny and shiny!

fish_big_roe_basket.description: Smaller eggs from bigger and sturdier fish are a very valuable delicacy.

sushi.description: A delicious specialty from hearthlings of a very distant land.

paddy_basket.description: Unmilled grass seeds. Grind into raw rice or versatile flour.

raw_rice.description: Delicious grains ready to be used in cooking or as any vegetable.

rice_flour.description: A formidable alternative for both hard or soft flours.

fish_carp_meat.description: Carp can be very tasty if taken from clear water.

fish_catfish_meat.description: Catfish has a particular, earthen flavor.

fish_salmon_meat.description: Salmon is a very coveted and tasty fish!

fish_trout_meat.description: Trout has a tender, sweet flavor.

sushi_vegetarian.description: A vegetarian alternative to an exotic dish.

highland_trout.description: An exquisite meal from mountainous regions.

fisherman_soup.description: A hearty and spicy soup traditional to the Ascendancy.

fish_pot_pie.description: A delicious pie with a fish and mushroom filling.

dumpling_salmon.description: A little bread pocket with steamed salmon stuffed inside.

bug_meat_tagine.description: Chonky insects and veggies simmered in a clay pot.

catfish_tagine.description: Catfish and vegetables simmered in a clay pot.

sweet_tooth_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

parasol_basket.description: This mushroom is slightly toxic when raw and can only be used in cooking.

dough_sweet.description: Sweet Dough is the base for many delicacies like sweet loaf

unleavened.description: Will rise into a Portion of Sweet Dough if left on a Leavening Table!

batter_sweet.description: Sweet Batter is a holy creation that can provide us CAKE.

dough.description: Dough is a base ingredient for several baked goods like bread.

unleavened.description: Will rise into a Portion of Dough if left on a Leavening Table!

batter.description: Batter can be used as a base for many dishes like dumplings

panettone.description: A very traditional and festive fluffy bread filled with dried fruits.

sugar_loaf_serving.description: Sprinkles sugar all over your clothes.

sugar_loaf.description: A tasty and sweetened bread loaf with tons of sprinkled sugar!

golden_egg.description: It's a golden egg! It's worth billions of gold coins! Probably, right?

pasta.description: Tasty noodles covered with a hot, flavorful tomato sauce.

ostrich_feed_ground.description: Very nutritious and loved by large birds.

corn_meal.description: Corn ground into a fine powder. Can be used as soft flour.

flour.description: The most popular type of flour, perfect for making bread or pastry.

kibble.description: Simple, less efficient food for pets. A kibble bowl can be used for serving.

kibble_veggie.description: Vegetarian food made exclusively for pets. A kibble bowl can be used for serving.

kibble_fish.description: Carnivore food made exclusively for pets. A kibble bowl can be used for serving.

megacrop_ostrich_feed.description: Yum! This juicy giant heirbloom fruit would make a delicious meal for ostriches!

megacrop_ostrich_feed_ground.description: Tasty slices of a mega heirbloom fruit. This meal will last a good while!

megacrop_moomoo_feed.description: Chunky and hearty slices of sweet potato that can be given to moo-moos!

megacrop_moomoo_feed_ground.description: Ready to be munched. This meal will last a good while!

megacrop_poyo_feed.description: Wow! These can be used by the Shepherd as feed for poyos!

megacrop_poyo_feed_ground.description: Ground and delicious mega rice, poyos love it! This meal will last a good while!

megacrop_rabbit_feed.description: Huge and vitalizing carrots that would definitely be appreciated by rabbits.

megacrop_rabbit_feed_ground.description: Cut and ready for the delight of all bunnies. This meal will last a good while!

megacrop_sheep_feed.description: So golden and shiny! Can be used as a lovely feed for sheep.

megacrop_sheep_feed_ground.description: Sheep must love this. This meal will last a good while!

moomoo_feed_ground.description: Tasty and hearty food appreciated by large ruminants.

cheese_fresh.description: Soft, moist and delicious! This cheese will go bad after some time if not eaten.

cheese_mild.description: A nice texture and a bold flavor. This cheese lasts a good time before going bad.

cheese_aged.description: Firm, strong, and full of flavor! This cheese won't go bad.

curdling_mixture.description: Milk and some other things. The Cook needs to pour it inside a cheese vat!

cheese_cottage.description: Salty and sour curds with a peculiar taste. Usable as a condiment base.

butter.description: A creamy and flavorful paste churned from milk and used as an ingredient.

bog_butter.description: A sophisticated type of butter preserved in peat bogs for a long time.

whey_butter.description: A by-product of cheese making, whey butter has less fat and is saltier.

cream.description: Almost sweet and soft layer of fat skimmed from milk.

cream_sour.description: Fermented cream. Has a strong taste and can be used as a condiment base!

fruit_yogurt.description: Creamy, fermented milk sweetened with sugar and fruits.

cereals_corn.description: Delicious, crispy flakes of corn soaked in milk.

butter_cookies.description: A portion of small and tasty buttered delicacies.

buttered_bulbs.description: A nice mix of mushrooms stirred with butter and spices.

cheesecake.description: Not really cheese nor cake but as delicious as both.

imperial_salad.description: An appetizing combination of cheese and greens as old as the Phoenix Empire.

melted_poyo.description: A savory roasted poyo filled with veggies and covered in cheese.

seared_meat_veggies.description: A pleasant portion of sliced meat sealed with butter and stirred with fresh veggies.

cooking_oil.description: Extracted from vegetables. Usable as cooking grease or condiment base.

fish_fingers.description: Delicious and crunchy deep fried small cuts of fish.

poyo_nuggets.description: Sliced, breaded and deep fried bits of poyo meat.

nuts_basket.description: An assortment of edible nuts ready to be used in cooking.

hazelnut_basket.description: Nutritious, tasty nuts. Can be eaten raw, pressed for oil or used in cooking.

almond_basket.description: Tender and hearty nuts. Can be eaten raw, pressed for oil or used in cooking.

chestnut_basket.description: A delicious, popular nut. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking.

walnut_basket.description: A bold-flavored nut. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking.

nut_flour.description: Finely ground nuts. Can be used as a soft flour.

nut_cake.description: Delicious and sweet, as cake should be.

nutty_meatballs.description: Brings forth the most exquisite flavors.

nutty_meatballs_serving.description: Do you ever wonder where meatballs come from?

honey_wild.description: Sweet, with an earthen flavor. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking.

honey.description: Fruity, flowered honey. Delicious! Eat it raw or use in cooking.

honeybuns_serving.description: Let me guess... Someone stole your sweetroll!

glazed_pork_ribs.description: Finely cut pork ribs, honey-glazed to perfection.

glazed_veggies.description: Stirred and fried vegetables with a crusty, sugared glazing.

hearth_fodder.description: Animal fodder imbued with the essence of the Hearth.

hearth_fodder_ground.description: Delicious, attractive and will greatly increase the quality of animal products!

hearth_ambrosia.description: A divine dessert, deeply satisfying and fortifying at the same time.

ham.description: Very tender and succulent pork meat, seasoned with spices and fruits.

ham_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

ginger_cookies_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

ginger_cookies.description: Cute and tasty little gingerbread treats.

ginger_cookies_serving.description: "Don't eat me! Don't eat me!" said no gingerbread man, ever.

seasonal_fruits_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

seasonal_fruits.description: What a juicy and refreshing platter of fruits!

turkey_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

turkey.description: Hearty and flavorful! A very traditional meal for large groups.

apple_basket.description: Sweet, flavorful apples! Can be eaten raw, used in cooking or offered by a witch.

date_basket.description: Fresh, ripe desert dates. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking and brewing.

pear_basket.description: Delicious fruits. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking and brewing.

plum_basket.description: Tender, soft small fruits. Can be eaten raw or used in cooking and brewing.

vinegar.description: Smells strong and tastes very acid. Useful for cooking and even for certain medicine.

unfermented_vinegar_brew.description: A Brewer can use this to make vinegar within a fermentation vat.

unfermented_vinegar_mead.description: A Brewer can use this to make vinegar within a fermentation carboy.

unfermented_vinegar_wine.description: A Brewer can use this to make vinegar within a wine cask.

unfermented_vinegar_juice.description: A Brewer can use this to make vinegar within a wine cask.

duck_meat.description: It tastes like poyo, but more spicy and exotic.

fruity_duck.description: An extremely refined and elaborate dish!

duck_meat_rotten.description: Eww! It's sad to waste food...

egg_duck.description: A plumpy and tasty cooking ingredient.

duck_feed_ground.description: They go all quack over it!

megacrop_duck_feed.description: Oh! Such a huge, sweet and juicy watermelon will be a treat for ducks!

megacrop_duck_feed_ground.description: The ducks love it! This meal will last a good while!

rare_truffle_basket.description: Delicious and extremely flavorful black truffles dug up by an oinker!

megacrop_oinker_feed.description: A drove of oinkers would have a blast with this big pumpkin half!

megacrop_oinker_feed_ground.description: Tender and chonky bits of pumpkin for oinkers. This meal will last a good while!

kibble_hearth.description: Magical and highly efficient food for pets. A kibble bowl can be used for serving.

egged_nut_pancakes.description: Nut pancakes, poached eggs and sliced truffles.

hogs_bounty.description: A grilled piece of meat with scrambled eggs and truffles.

truffled_risotto.description: Cooked rice grated with cheese and seasoned to perfection.

truffled_risotto_serving.description: The taste of cheese and truffles together is simply divine.

mayonnaise.description: A creamy and tangy sauce. Eat it raw or use it in cooking or as a condiment base!

mayonnaise_serving.description: Eek! Ugh! Gah! Meh! Hmm... Tasty!

ice_cream.description: Sweet, flavorful and extremely refreshing! Perfect for a sunny day.

ice_cream_decay.display_name: It's melting! Better eat it fast!

kibble_meat.description: Carnivore food made exclusively for pets. A kibble bowl can be used for serving.

autumn_tart.description: A delicious seasonal delicacy with plums and hazelnuts.

lamb_tagine.description: A fancy and exquisite shepherd meal with dried dates and almonds.

pie_apple.description: An instant classic with everyone's favorite fruit!

winter_soup.description: A desirable, tasty and warm meal for the end of the year.

winter_soup_serving.description: Warm, hearty and sweet - all at once!

barley_flour.description: A hard flour, delicious for rustic baking.

rye_flour.description: A hard flour that is great for yummy, dense doughs.

millet_flour.description: A flour excellent for soft, light and fibrous breads.

dough_pie.description: A crunchy, spread open dough ready to be filled and baked!

coffee_basket.description: Tasty but meager fruits, much better when dried for coffee beans!

coffee_serving.description: Not so bad but goes in one bite!

condiment.description: A fine relish made to complement savoury dishes. Can be used as a seasoning.

garlic_basket.description: Sharp flavored bulbs ready to be eaten or used in cooking as a savory vegetable.

heirbloom_basket.description: Its stalks are an Amberstone delicacy but the fruit serves as a savory vegetable.

dough_brown.description: This whole-grain dough is great for rich and fibrous baked goods.

unleavened.description: Will rise into a Portion of Brown Dough if left on a Leavening Table!

dough_flat.description: This flattened dough is excellent for preparing unleavened breads.

dough_fluffy.description: An extremely soft and light dough, perfect for some baking recipes.

unleavened.description: Will rise into a Portion of Fluffy Dough if left on a Leavening Table!

dough_sour.description: A more rustic and naturally fermented dough made from barley grain.

unleavened.description: Will rise into a Portion of Sourdough if left on a Leavening Table!

unleavened_doughs.rising_2_description: Hmmmm! This dough is rising nicely!

garlic_bread.description: Roasted with a savory touch and a buttery texture.

barley_bun.description: A soft bread with a crispy crust.

brown_loaf.description: An ordinary whole-grain piece of bread.

crispbread.description: A flattened and fluffy spiced bread.

hardtack.description: A meager meal... But lasts a very long time!

horsebread.description: A farmer's bread with minced veggies in it.

sourdough_bread.description: A very rustic and crunchy bread with a soft and light filling.

tortilla.description: A maleable, thin and tasty bread with tiny corn flakes!

jam_fruit.description: A yummy spread made with juicy fruits! Can replace "Any Fruit" in many recipes.

pickles.description: Spicy and carefully preserved veggies. Can replace "Any vegetable" in many recipes.

jam_lingonberry.description: Unique northern flavors! Can replace "Any Fruit" in many recipes.

rotten_preserve.description: At least the jar itself can be saved, I guess?

megacrop_fodder.description: A very healthy and delicious feed that can be given to any animal!

megacrop_fodder_ground.description: Crunchy, bright green leaves! Delicious for all animals!

beet_greens_basket.description: Nutritious and crunchy beetroot leaves. Useful as leafy greens.

beetroot_basket.description: A strong and highly nutritious veggie. Useful as a hearty vegetable.

cabbage_basket.description: Don't forget to check for babies! Useful as leafy greens.

lettuce_basket.description: Shiny and healthy leaves! Useful as leafy greens.

turnip_greens_basket.description: These actually turned up pretty good. Useful as leafy greens.

fishwrap.description: Buttered fish baked in tasty leaves!

peasant_salad_serving.description: Could use some olive oil and salt...

veggie_roll.description: Steamed to perfection with ground meat and rice inside.

veggie_roll_serving.description: It's like eating a plant cigar!

cucumber_basket.description: A veggie that can be used both as a hearty veggie or leafy greens if sliced.

lingonberry_basket.description: Tasty berries! Too few to be used as 'Any Fruit' but enough for jam or be eaten!

amazing_corn_basket.description: Super nutritious corn. Useful as a hearty vegetable or grain.

corn_basket.description: Sweet and crunchy. Useful as a hearty vegetable or grain.

golden_gourd_basket.description: Edible when raw, barely. Better as a hearty vegetable!

pumpkin_basket.description: Plump and delicious! Useful as a hearty vegetable.

sweet_potato_basket.description: A strong northern tuber. Useful as a hearty vegetable.

northern_meatballs.description: A very traditional northern meal, present in most households!

northern_meatballs_serving.description: Mashed sweet potatoes, meatballs and lingonberry jam! Very nice!

pasture_grass.description: Tall grass can be grazed on by animals or harvested for thatching.

overgrown_pasture_grass.description: Overgrown grass can be grazed on by animals or harvested for thatching.

short_pasture_grass.description: Short grass can be grazed on by animals but isn't long enough for thatching.

sprouting_pasture_grass.description: Grass has just started germinating here, not yet as efficient for grazing.

daisies.description: A delicate flowering cover that spreads over time. Harvest them for herbs.

water_spring.description: A constant and natural source of fresh water. It can be removed.

water_hole.description: This big fissure will suck away all the water that gets to it. It can be removed.

meteor_block.description: A gift from the sky! What wonders here lie?

marble_block.description: Provides Hunks o' Marble when mined.

feldspar_block.description: Provides Hunks o' Feldspar and sometimes Ball Clay when mined.

coal_block.description: Provides Lumps o' Coal and Hunks o' Hard Coal when mined.

copper_block.description: Provides Copper Ore, sometimes Feldspar and rarely Marble when mined.

gold_block.description: Provides Gold Ore and some Feldspar when mined.

iron_block.description: Provides Iron Ore, sometimes Feldspar and rarely Marble when mined.

tin_block.description: Provides Tin Ore, sometimes Feldspar and rarely Marble when mined.

silver_block.description: Provides Silver Ore and some Marble when mined.

winter_morel_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

oinker_hole.description: A snouty pig has dug into the ground here... Did they find anything?

bear.description: It seems quite angry... and big!
