liqueur_almond.description: Very refined, a truly luxurious drink that will make hearthlings a bit tipsy.

serving_keg_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

spirit_northern.description: The unique and strong flavors of the sweet potatoes make a stout alcoholic drink.

serving_keg_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_berry.description: Simple, yet sweet and relaxing drink. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_apple.description: An appreciated wine made from apples. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_cherry.description: An exotic, slightly sour flavor for a wine. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_date.description: Amazingly sweet and with a smooth finish. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_pear.description: A popular drink from colder climates. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_plum.description: A sweet and velvety fruit made into wine. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

wine_prickly_pear.description: It doesn't have any pointy bits anymore! Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

serving_pitcher_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

serving_pitcher.display_name: Serving Pitcher of Prickly Pear Wine

tea_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

fresh.description: Fresh and velvety leaves full of potential. Must be steamed and dried.

green.description: A timeless tradition. Used by the brewer for making green tea.

black.description: Stronger and more flavorful! Used by the brewer for making black tea.

steamed.description: These leaves are ready to be placed on a drying bed.

ground_tea_green.description: Delicately ground leaves. Ready to be used by a brewer.

ground_tea_black.description: Exhales a smell that can't be mistaken. Ready to be used by a brewer.

tea_pine.description: Smells good, tastes better and has gentle healing powers from the forest.

tea_pine_serving.description: Hmmm... The flavors of the woods...

tea.description: A fragrant and warm beverage. Very appreciated by many!

tea_fancy.description: The elegant and heartwarming flavor of dried daisies and fruits.

tea_fancy_serving.description: A civilized drink for a civilized age.

tea_desert.description: A unique recipe to the children of Rayya, a flower tea from Pal'Mum.

tea_amberstone.description: A traditional recipe from the clan, delighting palates for centuries.

tea_green.description: A very traditional and ancient preparation that soothes the mind.

tea_black.description: An exclusive beverage made with time, tradition and skill.

sorted.description: These cherries are ready to be placed on a drying bed.

green.description: Fresh out of their dried husks and ready to be roasted!

roasted.description: Precisely roasted to a perfect dark brown. Needs grinding before brewing!

ground.description: The aroma is irresistible! This coffee is ready to be brewed.

coffee_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

coffee.description: A crafter-favorite for late night working! Warm and energizing!

coffee_milk.description: Deep coffee note perfectly balanced with soft, sweet milk.

coffee_bold.description: Hits like a punch, this one is bound to keep anyone awake for a good while!

coffee_lavish.description: Piping hot with delicious cream and the flavors of the finest roast!

ale_table.description: A simple and barely fermented grain brew for a casual afternoon drink.

wort_beer_opaque.description: Boiled millet malt and sugary dates ready for fermentation. The Brewer needs it to make opaque beer.

wort_beer_white.description: There's an uniqueness to how light wheat malt is. The Brewer needs it to make white beer.

wort_ale_pale.description: The softness of rye and the smell of juniper berries. The Brewer needs it to make pale ale.

ale_pale.description: A spicy variant of ale. Makes hearthlings happy but also a little tipsy!

beer_opaque.description: A dense and sweet brew. Makes hearthlings happy but also a little tipsy!

beer_white.description: A delicious beer made out of wheat. Makes hearthlings happy but also a little tipsy!

thorulf.description: A former Explorer of the Library

smith.description: Prestigious blacksmith from the southern lands

astrologer.description: An observer of the night sky

archeologist.description: Famous archeologist, explorer and tomb raider.

cook.description: The itinerant cooking matriarch of the desert

tomtee.description: A helpful goblin working for the Frostfather

dom_vandon.description: Great merchant and intrepid caravaneer bringing goods from the far east.

sark_blackhammer.description: One of the most famous smiths from the capital, here to sell his fine goods.

thoto.description: Awww, so cute! Wait... Is that liquor?

bruno_the_fisher.description: A master angler here to sell some of his best catches.

naryal_iskender.description: Representing the Iskender Trading Company's store in our town!

fernand_the_great.description: A famous blacksmith selling some of his best wares in our town.

knight_hadrian.description: Famous professor of the best Chilvary School this side of the Pal'mum.

artificer_wrynn.description: A skilled dwarven artificer in town to share some of their secrets... For a price!

edgar_planckton.description: A senior merchant visiting with his very traditional and sought of portals.

gwaeldon_the_scout.description: An elven scout, part of a foraging caravan, ready to sell us some wares.

jonar_hillcrown.description: A very rich dwarf from a very rich dwarf clan, here to get richer.

mario_the_miner.description: Some dwarves say that he's so strong he can break blocks with his head!

novgnar_silverfist.description: Acclaimed northern hero and blacksmith, visiting our town to sell his crafts.

vert_greene.description: A master of herbalism, healing and the natural arts. Ready to trade.

volf_hart.description: Acclaimed chef, very experienced with wild game meats, here with his best foods.

sonia_cottonpurse.description: The first Amberstone merchant to travel to the surface in decades!

thali_pandora.description: Accomplished blacksmith of the Pal'mum, here to sell her crafts.

farmer_gem.description: The radiant farmer Gem, here to sell some of her best farm products!

buttercup_poppies.description: Famous gardener and exterior designer, here with her most ornamental wares!

faylinn_the_scout.description: An elven scout, part of a foraging caravan, ready to sell us some wares.

jo_boxen.description: A prestigious hoarder and trader of containers and bins of all kinds.

kita_the_bonecarver.description: A very skilled bonecarver in town to sell her lovely goods.

goblin.description: A trophy from defeating goblins... Must have some value!

red_kiln.description: A trophy from defeating servants of the warchief... Must have a good value!

titan.description: A trophy from corrupted, abyssal beings... Must have an excellent value!

undead.description: A trophy from defeating the undead... Must have quite some value!

forest.description: A trophy from defeating minions of the wilds... Must have a bit of value!

dragon_cult.description: A trophy from defeating the sinister followers of the dragon cult...

ancient_armor_fragment.description: Some would call this junk... But it's clearly a treasure!

summon_stone_vein_feldspar_ghost.description: Grows into a vein of feldspar stone.

summon_stone_vein_marble_ghost.description: Grows into a vein of marble stone.

npc_merchant.description: A merchant visiting your town to buy and sell goods.
npc_merchant.shop_name_description: Here to trade on behalf of [str(self.stonehearth:unit_info.description_data.shop_name)].

craftsdwarf_party.description: An industrious folk will never let go of their most prized advancements on embarkment and the Artificer is definitely the top of craftsdwarvenship.
craftsdwarf_party.tooltip: Gets you started early with the most advanced crafts.

kingdom.quote: Nature, balance and mighty shall always be the one and only struggle.
kingdom.long_description: The strong and stalwart folk of the mountains have thrived under a democratic monarchy and isolation for ages. Now they set out to face a new world of powers and technologies that might bring good or woe...
kingdom.post_selection_description: , reclusive dwarves on the brink of change.

grower_description.description: Growers will tend to plants and fungi alike, caring for underground or surface farms, crafting with herbs and looking after the wounded.

grower_trowel_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower

grower_trowel_equipped.description: Can be used by a Grower for their crafts and to tend plant and fungus alike.

grower_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Grower for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_ghost.description: Used by the Grower to create cultivars, fungal colonies and prepare plants.

grower_workbench_recipe.description: Required for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_recipe.description: Can be used to create cultivars and unlock new seeds or spores, fungal colonies and prepare plants.
grower_terrarium_recipe.flavor: Place cultivars anywhere on the world and wait for them to develop into usable forms!

gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of pungent herbs and seasonings needed for brewing beer. Birch catkins are often used in the highlands.

oleander_seeds_2_recipe.description: Trade or gift it to allow other cultures to cultivate oleander flowers!
oleander_seeds_2_recipe.flavor: This farming crop is already known to your growers by default

artificer_staff_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer

artificer_staff_equipped.description: An advanced device that can channel both the powers of the Hearth and of machines.

sweet_varanus_recipe.description: A highly traditional dwarven meal made with varanus meat and local cherries.

highland_trout_recipe.description: An exquisite meal favorite among the mountain folk.
highland_trout_recipe.flavor: Be sure to cut off the trout's head

brass_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of cheap but durable metal for furniture and construction.
brass_plate_recipe.flavor: The trick is to melt anything alongside copper

steel_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of strong and valuable metal for ornate furniture and construction.

artificer_staff_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer.
artificer_staff_recipe.flavor: 'And from twisted fires and earthly energies, Brovik whispered life into metal' Artificer Compendium I

brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.description: A brass plaque with the mark of the Blacksmith to be placed on walls.
brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: Specializing in heavy, pointy, dense things!

grower_trowel_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower.

brass_training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.

brass_training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.

mf_camp_standard_ghost.description: A sign of home for all of the mountain folk!

mf_town_banner_balance_ghost.description: For some it is between the old ways and the new that the mountain folk will find glory!

mf_town_banner_balance_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Balance, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_might_ghost.description: It is the belief of many of the mountain folk that only through fire and industry there is progress.

mf_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: Many of the mountain folk will always follow the old ways.

mf_town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its blessing.

sweet_varanus.description: An exotic specialty of the dwarven cuisine.

sweet_varanus_serving.description: A delicious and traditional meat dish.

no_crop.description: Just a planter full of potential.

brightbell.description: A homely, common flower from the woodlands. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown and will provide healing herbs when harvested.

cactus_flower.description: Small and highly adapted desert plants with a delicate flower. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown and will provide healing herbs when harvested.

frostsnap.description: A tiny mountain flower that is chill to the touch. Needs a few days to be fully grown and will provide soothing herbs when harvested.

violet.description: A pretty and valuable northern blossom. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown and will provide soothing herbs when harvested.

cactus_tulip_blue.description: An exotic and colorful desert tulip. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide soothing herbs when harvested.

cactus_tulip_red.description: An exotic and colorful desert tulip. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide healing herbs when harvested.

cactus_tulip_yellow.description: An exotic and colorful desert tulip. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide mild herbs when harvested.

snow_poppy.description: A typical and toxic small northern flower. Needs a few days to be fully grown and will provide noxious herbs when harvested.

daisy.description: A simple and adorable flower. Needs a bunch of days to be fully grown and will provide mild herbs when harvested.

foxlily.description: A rare and valuable flower that resembles a furry tail. Needs a bunch of days to be fully grown and will provide peculiar herbs when harvested.

highland_vine.description: A thick and resistant ivy that spreads to all directions. Needs a bunch of days to be fully grown and will provide robust or pungent herbs and sometimes fiber when harvested.

marblesprout.description: A curious bloom from the highlands, can be dried into marble stone. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide noxious herbs when harvested.

moonbell.description: A glowy and pale highland bloom. Needs a few days to be fully grown and will provide peculiar herbs when harvested.

sunflower.description: A bright and joyful flower loved by all. Needs a bunch of days to be fully grown and will provide peculiar and also oily herbs when harvested.

silkweed.description: A fibrous and resilient weed quite common in bogs. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown and will provide robust or pungent herbs and sometimes fiber when harvested.

earthbud.description: A mysterious bloom that condenses Hearth magic. Needs a long time to be fully grown and will provide Hearth essence and peculiar or zesty herbs over time or when harvested.

sugarbell.description: A hearty vegetable that glows with sweetness. Needs a bunch of days to be fully grown and will provide resources to be refined into sugar.

wax_plant_green.description: A chunky, cute desert plant. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide mild or pungent herbs when harvested.

wax_plant_purple.description: A chunky, cute desert plant. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide mild or zesty herbs when harvested.

poppy.description: A common sight among the rolling hills of the highlands. Needs a few days to be fully grown and will provide noxious herbs when harvested.

rose.description: A beautiful layered flower. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown and will provide healing herbs when harvested.

dill.description: A delicious seasoning traditional to the highlanders. Grows very quickly and will provide soothing or zesty herbs when harvested.

chives.description: Flavorful favorite of the northern cooks. Grows very quickly and will provide healing or zesty herbs when harvested.

bog_myrtle.description: A small and velvety bush that grows by the wetlands. Needs a few days to be fully grown and will provide mild or pungent herbs when harvested.

nightshade.description: A highly poisonous and mesmerizingly beautiful blossom. Needs some days to be fully grown and will provide noxious herbs when harvested.

daylily.description: A happy and delicate summer flower. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown and will provide mild herbs when harvested.

oleander.description: Bushy and slightly toxic flowers common in warmer climates. Needs a few days to be fully grown and will provide noxious herbs when harvested.

parsley.description: A tasty seasoning that can grow on most climates. Grows very quickly and will provide robust or zesty herbs when harvested.

sage.description: Fresh with a pinch of mint, popular across the woodlands. Grows very quickly and will provide mild or zesty herbs when harvested.

water_lily_pad.description: Neat and leafy water plants. Takes a long time to be fully grown. Provides robust or pungent herbs and sometimes leeches when harvested.

water_lily_pink.description: Pleasant and valuable water flowers. Takes a long time to be fully grown. Provides peculiar herbs and sometimes robust or pungent ones or leeches.

water_lily_purple.description: Pleasant and valuable water flowers. Takes a long time to be fully grown. Provides peculiar herbs and sometimes robust or pungent ones or leeches.

water_lily_white.description: Pleasant and valuable water flowers. Takes a long time to be fully grown. Provides soothing herbs and sometimes robust or pungent ones or leeches.

water_lily_yellow.description: Pleasant and valuable water flowers. Takes a long time to be fully grown. Provides robust herbs and sometimes robust or pungent ones or leeches.

algae_brown.description: An useful water weed. Takes some days to be fully grown. Provides brown algae and sometimes leeches when harvested.

algae_green.description: An useful water weed. Takes some days to be fully grown. Provides green algae and sometimes leeches when harvested.

algae_red.description: An useful water weed. Takes some days to be fully grown. Provides red algae and sometimes leeches when harvested.

oak_sapling.description: A sturdy and large temperate forest tree. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

pine_sapling.description: A tall and neatly shaped temperate forest evergreen tree. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

juniper_sapling.description: Sleek and strong temperate forest evergreen tree. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

cactus_sapling.description: A hearty, large desert plant capable of being used as a wood source. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

acacia_sapling.description: Rigid and reliable desert tree with sprawling branches. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

almond_sapling.description: A nut-bearing tree from more arid regions. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

hazelnut_sapling.description: A nut-bearing tree common in the highlands. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

chestnut_sapling.description: A nut-bearing temperate forest tree. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

walnut_sapling.description: A common nut-bearing tree from the northern regions. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

arctic_juniper_sapling.description: Sleek evergreen tree well adapted to the coldest areas. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

arctic_pine_sapling.description: Strong, tall and resilient evergreen tree from the north. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

birch_sapling.description: A beautiful tree with a remarkable bark. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

highland_pine_sapling.description: Incredibly strong and tall evergreen tree found in the highlands. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

parana_pine_sapling.description: This nut-bearing evergreen tree is a recognizable sight from distant lands. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

willow_sapling.description: Traditionally found near marshes or lowlands. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

yew_sapling.description: A thick and sturdy evergreen tree from the highlands. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

bolete.description: Soft and tasty forest mushrooms. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown.

chanterelle.description: Buttery and flavorful highland fungi. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown.

sweet_tooth.description: Delicious mushrooms commonly found almost everywhere. Grows very quickly.

parasol.description: Tender mushrooms but toxic when raw, commonly found almost everywhere. Grows very quickly.

winter_morel.description: A true arctic delicacy, able to grow on the snow. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown.

desert_truffle.description: A rare and spicy desert mushroom. Needs a couple of days to be fully grown.

glowshroom.description: A small mushroom with a peculiar glow, almost magical! Needs a day or two to grow.

pear_sapling.description: A fruit-bearing tree that survives colder climates. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

plum_sapling.description: A fruit-bearing tree that thrives on milder climates. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

date_sapling.description: An exotic fruit-bearing palm from arid lands. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

apple_sapling.description: A common fruit-bearing woodland tree. Needs some days before it has grown enough to be replanted somewhere else.

lingonberry_bush.description: A small, pretty bush. Needs several days to be fully grown and will provide fruits when harvested.

active.title: Merchants & Stalls

info.num_merchants_none: No merchants have noticed our town yet... Maybe if we increase our wealth?
info.num_merchants_one: Each morning, at most 1 merchant will visit your town.
info.num_merchants_max: Each morning, up to [str(num_merchants)] merchants will visit your town.
info.num_merchants_limited: Each morning, up to [str(num_merchants)] merchants would visit your town if not limited by your market stalls ([str(num_stalls)]).
info.num_merchants_exact: Each morning, up to [str(num_merchants)] merchants will visit your town.
info.num_merchants_range: Each morning, up to [str(num_merchants)] merchants will visit your town.
info.num_merchants_description: Increasing your town's worth and the amount that you buy from and sell to merchants will increase the number of merchants likely to visit your town each day. Make sure you have market stalls for them to set up at, or at most only one will bother visiting.

stalls.tier1_description:
Can be occupied by Town Level 1 merchants.
Required to attract more than one Town Level 1 merchant.
stalls.tier2_description:
Can be occupied by Town Level 1 and 2 merchants.
Required to attract more than one Town Level 2 merchant.
stalls.tier3_description:
Can be occupied by all Town Level merchants.
Required to attract more than one Town Level 3 merchant.

active.shop: Show shop to buy and sell goods.

general_goods.description: Traveling merchants and resellers with no clear specialization.
general_goods.selling: Useful assortments of things like ingredients, building parts, consumables, tools
general_goods.buying: Their needs are as varied as their products, and difficult to predict

resources.description: Merchants from quarries, lumber yards, mines and other labor camps.
resources.selling: Wood logs, stone hunks, clay mounds, ores, simple fuels
resources.buying: Containers, prepared food, refined goods and sometimes tools

wilderness.description: Merchants from remote areas, distant settlements and isolated fishing villages.
wilderness.selling: Herbs, mushrooms, meat, pelts, fish and herbalism goods like tonics
wilderness.buying: Backpacks, clothing, medicine and sometimes protection

agriculture.description: Merchants from prosperous pastures, farming villages and ranches.
agriculture.selling: Vegetables, fruits, eggs, domestic animal products and pets
agriculture.buying: Farming and worker tools, fertilizer and sometimes herbs

building.description: Merchants from expanding towns specialized in construction and basic crafts.
building.selling: Wood, clay and stone furniture, lights, decorations and building parts
building.buying: Raw resources, textiles, refined goods and sometimes baked goods

defense.description: Merchants from encamped armies, strong border settlements and military academies.
defense.selling: Weapons, armor, medicine and other defensive assets
defense.buying: Refined metals, fuels, pelts and sometimes other refined goods

artisan.description: Merchants from capitals and rich cities where highly skilled crafters thrive.
artisan.selling: Metalworking goods, work tools, textiles and refined materials
artisan.buying: Raw ores, fiber, prepared drinks and sometimes fancy furniture

provisions.description: Merchants from busy and bustling towns full of taverns, breweries and restaurants.
provisions.selling: Simple and prepared food, simple and prepared drinks
provisions.buying: Raw foods, dairy products, ingredients and sometimes decorations

exotic_goods.description: Merchants hailing from distant lands, other kingdoms and unseen places.
exotic_goods.selling: Goods from other cultures or styles, rarities and sometimes even the unnatural
exotic_goods.buying: All kinds of goods or resources that seem common to us but are probably exotic to them

preferences.title: Preferences

category_list_titles.name: Category
category_list_titles.encourage_description: Encouraging a category of merchants makes it significantly more likely that merchants from that category will visit your town.
category_list_titles.enable_description: Enabling a category of merchants makes it so merchants from that category will have a normal chance of visiting your town.
category_list_titles.disable_description: Disabling a category of merchants makes it so merchants from that category will NOT visit your town.

preferences.enables_disables: You may Disable up to [str(max_disables)] categories and Encourage up to [str(max_encourages)] categories.
preferences.enables_disables_description: Disabling a category will prevent regular merchants of that category from visiting your town. Encouraging a category will significantly increase the chance that regular merchants of that category will visit your town. When your town's level increases, so will the number of categories you can Disable or Encourage.
preferences.no_exclusive_stalls: Exclusive merchants will only visit your town if you have certain exclusive market stalls placed. These generally require high level crafters or specific town upgrade choices to acquire.

health_tooltips.dying_description:
If I'm not rescued soon, I will die!
[str(value)]% guts remaining
health_tooltips.recuperating_description:
I'm slowly recuperating...
[str(value)]% of the way to stable
health_tooltips.wounded_description:
I need treatment for my wounds!
Maximum health is only [str(value)]% of its normal
health_tooltips.hurt_description:
I may be hurt, but I'm still standing!
[str(value)]% health remaining

entities.tooltip_crop_unlocked: You have already unlocked this crop.
entities.tooltip_wanted_item_higher: Merchant will pay [str(factor)]% more for these!
entities.tooltip_wanted_item_higher_quantity: Merchant will pay [str(factor)]% more for [str(quantity)] of these!
entities.tooltip_wanted_item_lower: Merchant will pay [str(factor)]% less for these!
entities.tooltip_wanted_item_lower_quantity: Merchant will pay [str(factor)]% less for [str(quantity)] of these!
entities.tooltip_unwanted_item: Merchant already sells these and will pay [str(factor)]% less for them!

attach_to_connector.tip_title: Click on a connector to attach this item
attach_to_connector.tip_description: This item must be placed on a mechanical connector, like a gearbox, axle, or powered mill

mercantile_view.description: View information on your town's commercial attractiveness, visiting merchants and other things important to trading.

town_menu.description:
A set of tools for managing the most important aspects of your town and people.

The number is your current population!

build_well.description: Order the creation of a simple water well for hearthlings to have access to clean water
build_well.tip_title: Click to dig a well at that location
build_well.tip_description: Make sure hearthlings can access the side with the rope attached. Locations closer to water will require less digging

build_fence.tip_title: Click and drag to place fence foundations
build_fence.tip_description: If i18n(stonehearth:ui.shell.settings.gameplay_tab.building_auto_queue_crafters) is enabled, your crafters will automatically queue recipes for all craftable foundations

shepherd.description: Crafts the feed and livestock resources.

brewer.description: Provides the town with beverages and joy.

harvest_and_replant.description: Gather trees, plants, and stones from the surface of the land, replanting when possible
harvest_and_replant.tip_title: Click and drag to harvest resources
harvest_and_replant.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_move.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to move, then click new locations for each of them as prompted
box_move.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_undeploy.description: Undeploy these items and return them to a stockpile
box_undeploy.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to undeploy
box_undeploy.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_cancel_placement.description: Cancel placement or building of the ghost forms of items
box_cancel_placement.tip_title: Click and drag to select the ghost items to cancel
box_cancel_placement.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own (you'll still need to instruct your hearthlings to harvest them)
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to enable auto-harvesting
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to disable auto-harvesting
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_forage.description: Look for natural resources in this area
box_forage.tip_title: Click and drag to mark the area to search
box_forage.tip_description:
Minimum search area is 20 x 20
Higher wilderness will provide better results
Right click to exit this mode

box_hunt.tip_title: Click and drag to mark them
box_hunt.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

create_farm.description: Create a zone that allows you to grow different things from the ground!
create_farm.tip_description: Right click to exit. Rotate with [str(left_binding)] and [str(right_binding)] keys

create_field_farm.description: Place a farm on grass or dirt that can grow conventional crops.
create_field_farm.required_ability_text: Your town has not yet unlocked this farm type.

create_field_underfarm.description: Place a farm on dirt or rock that can grow low-light crops like mushrooms.
create_field_underfarm.required_ability_text: Your town has not yet unlocked this farm type.

create_field_orchard.description: Place a farm on grass or dirt that can grow trees that bear nuts or fruits.
create_field_orchard.required_ability_text: Your town has not yet unlocked this farm type.

create_field_treefarm.description: Place a farm on grass or dirt that can grow larger trees.
create_field_treefarm.required_ability_text: Your town has not yet unlocked this farm type.

create_field_bush_farm.description: Place a farm on grass or dirt that can grow ornamental and fruit-bearing shrubs.
create_field_bush_farm.required_ability_text: Your town has not yet unlocked this farm type.

create_field_decorative_flowers.description: Place a farm on grass or dirt that can grow beautiful flowers. These can NOT be harvested.
create_field_decorative_flowers.required_ability_text: Your town has not yet unlocked this farm type.

heatmap.name: heatmaps
heatmap.title: Terrain Heatmaps
heatmap.description: Useful view modes that will give you insights on different aspects of the map

ore.description: Detect ore several layers beneath the surface: areas appear brighter where ore is abundant or close to the surface.

wilderness.description: See where the world is wilder (or tamer).

show_workshop.search_title_description: Include the titles of the crafting recipes (which generally includes the crafted items' names) in the search filter.
show_workshop.search_description_description: Include the descriptions of the crafted items in the search filter.
show_workshop.search_ingredients_description: Include the names of ingredients in the search filter.
show_workshop.search_title_and_description_description: Include the titles of crafting recipes and the descriptions of crafted items in the search filter.
show_workshop.search_title_and_ingredients_description: Include the titles of crafting recipes and the names of ingredients in the search filter.
show_workshop.search_description_and_ingredients_descr: Include the descriptions of crafted items and the names of ingredients in the search filter.
show_workshop.search_all_description: Include the recipe titles, crafted item descriptions, and names of ingredients in the search filter.

category_crafter.title: Toggle Category Crafting
category_crafter.enable_description: Enable crafting of this category for [str(name)] (level [str(level)]).
category_crafter.disable_description: Disable crafting of this category for [str(name)] (level [str(level)]).

craft_button.title: Craft
craft_button.description:
Add this order to the end of the list. Hold [Shift] to insert at the top of the list.

Right-click any item in the workshop to queue up making 1 of it (or hold [Ctrl] to queue up maintaining 1 of it).

quality_preference.title: Ingredient Quality Preference
quality_preference.description: Choose whether crafters should prefer high or low quality ingredients for this order. The default can be changed in Gameplay Settings.

fertilizer_settings.title: Fertilizer
fertilizer_settings.specific_description: Select a fertilizer below to only use that specific fertilizer.

season.property_description: This crop prefers the [str(i18n_data.season)] season and will grow more slowly outside of preferred seasons.
season.in_season: This crop is currently in season, so will grow at a normal rate.
season.out_of_season: This crop is currently out of season and will grow more slowly.
season.no_season_description: This crop does not have any preferred seasons and will grow normally throughout the year.

growth_time.shortest: This crop matures very quickly ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.very_short: This crop matures quickly ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.short: This crop slightly faster than average ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.fair: This crop matures at an average rate ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.long: This crop takes slightly longer to mature ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.very_long: This crop takes a long time to mature ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.longest: This crop takes a very long time to mature ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.shorter: Environmental factors make this crop grow [str(i18n_data.growth_time_percent)] faster than normal!
growth_time.normal: Environmental factors make this crop grow at a normal rate.
growth_time.longer: Environmental factors make this crop grow [str(i18n_data.growth_time_percent)] slower than normal!
growth_time.too_long: This crop is growing immeasurably slowly due to environmental factors!
growth_time.stopped: This crop's growth is currently stopped.

water_affinity.range: This crop will grow a little faster than normal with [str(i18n_data.min_water_level)] - [str(i18n_data.max_water_level)] water, through its general environment or irrigation within its blue outlined region.
water_affinity.min_only: This crop will grow a little faster with at least [str(i18n_data.min_water_level)] water, through its general environment or irrigation within its blue outlined region.
water_affinity.current_level: This crop currently has [str(i18n_data.current_water_level)] water through its general environment and irrigation within its blue outlined region.

light_affinity.range: This crop will grow a little faster than normal with [str(i18n_data.min_light_level)] - [str(i18n_data.max_light_level)] daytime sunlight.
light_affinity.min_only: This crop will grow a little faster with at least [str(i18n_data.min_light_level)] daytime sunlight.
light_affinity.current_level: This crop currently experiences [str(i18n_data.current_light_level)] daytime sunlight. This considers both shade and current weather state.

flooded.requires: This crop must have water covering it to grow.
flooded.prefers: This crop grows more quickly when water is covering it and slower when it isn't.
flooded.prefers_not: This crop grows more slowly when water or snow is covering it.

fertilized.current_amount: [str(i18n_data.num_fertilized)] / [str(i18n_data.num_crops)] crops in this field are currently fertilized.

farm.enable_harvest_description: If enabled, farmers will harvest this farm when possible.

underfarm.substrate_description: You need a layer of organic material to plant undercrops.

default_storage.tooltip: Quest rewards and traded goods will be directly placed in designated default storage if possible

filter_presets.preset_with_invalid_description:
[str(good_count)] selected material filters
[str(bad_count)] inapplicable material filters

save_mode.description: Specify preset name here and press Enter or click the 'Save Preset' button to save; All/None filters cannot be saved

load_mode.description: Type here to filter presets by name

show_load.title: Load Preset...
show_load.description: Select from a default or custom preset for your storage filter

show_save.title: Save Preset...
show_save.description: Specify a name for the preset then press Enter or click the 'Save Preset' button to save; All/None filters cannot be saved

fuel_level.label: Fuel Level:
fuel_level.tooltip:
[str(num_total)] Total Available Uses:
  • [str(num_residual)] from residual fuel
  • [str(num_potential)] from fuel items in storage

pasture.maintain_animals_description: Automatically slaughter any animals beyond this number.
pasture.harvest_animals_renewable_description: Harvest renewable resources from these animals, like wool or eggs.
pasture.harvest_grass_description: Automatically harvest any grass that grows in the pasture.
pasture.collect_strays_description: Periodically collect any stray animals that wander out of this pasture and return them to it.
pasture.ostrich_pasture_description: These exotic birds produce delicious large eggs and can be slaughtered for large poultry, jerky, feathers and bone
pasture.sheep_pasture_description: Sheep produce wool and, seldom, some milk. Slaughtering sheep will produce raw mutton, jerky, and bone
pasture.moomoo_pasture_description: Moo-moos eat a lot but will produce nice amounts of milk. Slaughtering them yields pelts, steak, jerky and bone
pasture.rabbit_pasture_description: Rabbits reproduce quickly and can be slaughtered for jerky, pelts and sometimes bone
pasture.poyo_pasture_description: Poyos lay eggs, a fine cooking ingredient. Slaughtering poyo will yield meat and, often, feathers and bone
pasture.duck_pasture_description: Ducks lay eggs, but require more space and time than poyos. Slaughtering duck will yield meat and, often, feathers and bone
pasture.oinker_pasture_description: Oinkers eat well and occasionally dig up truffles, a valuable cooking ingredient. They yield pelts, bone, and good amounts of pork and jerky

herbalist_planter.help: Herbalists can plant, tend to, and harvest various types of resources in this planter.
herbalist_planter.harvest_crop_description: If enabled, whenever the resource is fully grown, the herbalist or grower will harvest it. Disabling this can be useful when a plus sign (+) is displayed next to the amount harvested - it means this planter will also provide resources over time without having to harvest and wait for it to grow again.
herbalist_planter.harvest_plant_description: If enabled, when harvesting, the herbalist or grower will uproot the grown crop for it to be planted elsewhere. Very useful for decoration and gardening!

quality.quality-1: This crop is of normal quality and will most likely produce normal quality products.
quality.quality-2: This crop is of Fine quality and has a chance of producing higher quality products.
quality.quality-3: This crop is of Excellent quality and has a higher chance of producing higher quality products.
quality.quality-4: This crop is of Masterwork quality and has a very high chance of producing higher quality products.

patrol_banners.move_banner_up_description: Move the selected banner up in the patrol order.
patrol_banners.move_banner_down_description: Move the selected banner down in the patrol order.
patrol_banners.create_banner_description: Create a new banner for this party, at the end of the order or immediately after the currently selected banner.
patrol_banners.clear_banners_description: Remove all banners for this party. To remove the selected banner, use the command on the selected entity window.

periodic_interaction.enabled_description: Whether hearthlings should try to interact with this object.
periodic_interaction.select_mode_description: Choose how hearthlings should try to interact with this object.

max_healable_health.tooltip_description: If their health drops below [str(max_health)], it can't be healed above it until they receive medical treatment.

show_promotion_tree.tooltip_description: Click to promote this hearthling to a different job.

toggle_component_info.tooltip_description: Click to show or hide extra information about this entity.

lock_title.title: Click to Lock Title
lock_title.description: Lock this entity's title from automatic or manual changes.

unlock_title.title: Click to Unlock Title
unlock_title.description: Unlock this entity's title so it can be manually changed and, if specified in ACE gameplay settings, automatically changed.

crafter.description: Civillian jobs that are able to create items out of raw materials and resources. Carpenter or Blacksmith, for example.

combat.description: Military jobs that are able to follow orders and engage in combat to defend the town! Footmen or Archers, for example.

field_work.description: Civillian jobs that will specialize in specifc, diverse activities outside of the main crafting chains. Farmers or Shepherds, for example.

drink.high: This drink provides [str(servings)] highly satisfying servings
drink.average: This drink provides [str(servings)] somewhat satisfying servings
drink.low: This drink provides [str(servings)] mildly satiating servings

food.high: This food provides [str(servings)] very filling meals
food.average: This food provides [str(servings)] quite filling meals

attack_with_all_parties.description: Attack the selected entity with all combat parties.

attack_with_party_1.description: Attack the selected entity with combat party 1.

attack_with_party_2.description: Attack the selected entity with combat party 2.

attack_with_party_3.description: Attack the selected entity with combat party 3.

attack_with_party_4.description: Attack the selected entity with combat party 4.

cancel_attack.description: Cancel all attacks targeting the selected entity.

job_toggle.toggledOn: The Job activity for this unit or party is currently on; click to toggle it off.
job_toggle.toggledOff: The Job activity for this unit or party is currently off; click to toggle it on.
job_toggle.toggledSome: The Job activity for some of this party is on, and for some it is off; click to toggle it on for all.

new_title.title: [str(i18n_data.entity.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)] has achieved a new Title!
new_title.message:
[str(i18n_data.new_title.description)]

Title Renown:

üèÜ [str(i18n_data.new_title.renown)]

Doesn't that title have a nice ring to it? You can select which title one of your citizens is using by right-clicking their name in their character sheet or the selected unit window.
new_title.item_message:
[str(i18n_data.new_title.description)]

Title Renown:

üèÜ [str(i18n_data.new_title.renown)]

Doesn't that title have a nice ring to it? You can select which title this item is using by right-clicking its name in the selected unit window.

You might also consider giving [str(i18n_data.entity.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)] a fancier name to go along with their new title by left-clicking its name in the selected unit window.

generic.fully_cached: These items are fully cached for this quest.
generic.num_cached: How many items are currently cached in dedicated quest item storage.

first.title: Your first merchant!
first.message:
Your town was attractive enough to trigger the interest of a traveling merchant!

Going forward, word will spread about this settlement and others will come, but your crafters will need to provide them with market stands and stalls fit for their needs!

The wealthier your town becomes, the more merchants are drawn to it. Moreover, every Town Upgrade will entice richer merchants: better goods and bigger piles of gold!

Finally, advertisement is key! Not just hosting but actually trading with the merchants will boost your commercial attractiveness even more. A happy merchant will surely tell their friends about it!

shop.wanted_items: Offering special rates for these items:

persistence.crafter_description: All the way from [str(town_name)], wares crafted in the workshop of [str(crafter_name)]!

building_status.build_button_description: Hold [Shift] to insert craft orders at the top of the queue when Auto Queue Crafting For Building is enabled.

cost_list.missing_crafter_description: You lack an appropriate crafter of the required level to craft this item:
cost_list.missing_recipe_description: None of your citizens have even heard of how to craft this item!

save_mode.description: Specify preset name here and press Enter or click the 'Save Fence Preset' button to save

load_mode.description: Type here to filter presets by name

segment_enabled.title: Segment Enabled
segment_enabled.description: Click to disable this segment. Right-click to remove this segment

segment_disabled.title: Segment Disabled
segment_disabled.description: Click to enable this segment. Right-click to remove this segment

show_load.title: Fence Presets
show_load.description: Select from a default or custom preset for your fence

show_save.title: Save Fence Preset
show_save.description: Specify a preset name then press Enter or click the 'Save Fence Preset' button to save

sections.ace_team_2_endnote_1: ...and everyone from this amazing community, always playing and enjoying ACE,
sections.ace_team_2_endnote_2: like B4NTO, Tilyene, Modding Daimyo, Doris, Kasarov, Solean, sdark, destroder, FR Magister,
sections.ace_team_2_endnote_3: illythekitty, lexali, Paldorfien, evendel, Ultranova, Ceraziel, Ainz and many others! Thank you!
sections.ace_soundtrack_endnote: Listen to more and support their work @ https://patreon.com/gwriterstudio

backup_i18n_language.name: Backup Localization Language
backup_i18n_language.description: If set to a language other than your primary localization language, strings that fail to localize will be re-attempted in this backup localization language. May require a UI refresh (F5) to take effect.
backup_i18n_language.none_description: Don't use a backup localization language.

gameplayTab.load_paused_description: When loading a saved game, start it paused instead of immediately resuming at the previous speed. This can help with performance issues and crashes when loading large games.
gameplayTab.limit_network_data_description: Limit the frequency of some transfers of data from server to client(s). This can help with performance issues in multiplayer games.
gameplayTab.building_grid_size_description: Hold the Shift key while placing a building template to snap placement to a square horizontal grid of this size.
gameplayTab.auto_craft_recipe_dependencies_descripti: When crafting an item, crafters will check the inventory to see if there are sufficient ingredients to use. If not, they will queue up orders for enough ingredients to fulfill the original order.
gameplayTab.auto_craft_killed_items_description: When an item you own is killed ‚Äî like a door, a training dummy, or a siege weapon ‚Äî queue a craft order for a new one.
gameplayTab.auto_queue_medicine_description: When a hearthling receives a wound or a negative condition that can be treated with a specific item, queue a craft order for that item unless your town already has it.
gameplayTab.default_craft_order_prefer_high_quality_: When crafting an item, crafters who have achieved the Journeyman's Knowledge perk will prefer crafting with high-quality ingredients. Uncheck to always prefer low-quality ingredients.
gameplayTab.default_craft_search_checks_description: When looking at the workshop view, default to filtering recipes by text in these properties.
gameplayTab.show_unreachable_ingredients_notificatio: Show an alert when a crafter cannot reach ingredients for their recipe.WARNING:This may cause a lot of alerts!
gameplayTab.show_food_unfindable_notification_descri: Get an alert whenever a hearthling times out when trying to find food. Regardless of this setting, you'll still get notifications when people are starving.WARNING:Since this alert is based on a timeout, the search might still succeed shortly after triggering and then send an alert anyway, especially if performance is already compromised. For this reason, you might want to keep it disabled.
gameplayTab.use_quest_storage_description: When a returning trader or other quest requires giving items or materials, create a dedicated storage for those items near your town banner so they don't get used elsewhere.
gameplayTab.auto_enable_quest_storage_description: When a returning trader or other quest creates quest storage, automatically enable that storage to securely cache requested items.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_enabled_description: When a renewable resource you own becomes harvestable, automatically issue a harvest command on that resource.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_tree_stumps_description: When trees are cut down, harvestable stumps remain. Enabling this option will automatically queue stumps to be harvested.
gameplayTab.auto_remove_mining_zone_ladders_descript: When a mining zone is completed or destroyed, queue up removal of any automatically created ladders.
gameplayTab.default_to_worst_fertilizer_description: When farmers fertilize crops, they use the best fertilizer available unless directed to use a specific type. Select this to have them use the worst available instead.
gameplayTab.default_fertilizer_description: When creating a new farm, set its fertilizer preference to this.
gameplayTab.default_pasture_collect_strays: Default Collect Strays for New Pastures
gameplayTab.default_pasture_collect_strays_descripti: When creating a new pasture, set whether shepherds should collect strays and herd them back to that pasture to this.
gameplayTab.show_farm_water_regions_description: In grid view, show an outline of the region a farm will look for water if its crop will benefit from it.
gameplayTab.show_connector_regions_description: In grid view, show where entities implementing the [stonehearth_ace:connection] component can connect to other such entities.
gameplayTab.show_new_title_notification_description: When one of your citizens (or other items) achieves a title, display an in-game notification about it.
gameplayTab.auto_select_new_titles_description: Allow the titles of your citizens (or other items) to be automatically assigned and changed according to the criteria below.

title_selection_criteria.description: Choose which criteria will be used for determining the titles of your citizens (or other items) if the setting above is ticked.
title_selection_criteria.highest_renown_description: The title with the highest Renown value will be the one displayed.
title_selection_criteria.latest_description: The title that was the latest to be acquired will be the one displayed.

gameplayTab.issue_party_commands_when_job_disabled_d: Even if a hearthling with a combat job has their job disabled, issue combat party commands to them.
gameplayTab.terrain_slice_buildings_description: In Terrain Slice mode, don't render entities supported by visible, non-terrain entities.
gameplayTab.highlight_entire_vine_on_select_descript: When you select a vine, highlight all vines that are part of the same growth.
gameplayTab.disable_weather_effect_rendering_descrip: Removes weather effects that follow the camera, like rain or snow. This is purely visual and will not affect weather bonuses, penalties or gameplay features. Might help with game performance. Requires a new weather or a save reload to take effect.
gameplayTab.water_signal_update_frequency_descriptio: Only update water signals this many ticks of the water system. Increase this value to improve performance with lots of flowing water.
gameplayTab.show_processing_meter_description: Show the processing meter, useful for understanding performance issues, in the lower right of the screen, to the left of the game speed buttons.
gameplayTab.show_component_info_description: Show a clickable info button on the selected unit window when the selected entity has additional detailed info.
gameplayTab.show_job_toggle_button_description: Show a clickable button on the selected unit window for toggling the job work order status of the selected hearthling or combat party.
gameplayTab.show_selected_workshop_crafting_descript: In the Workshop UI, indicate which items are craftable by the selected workshop. If a crafter is selected, indicate items craftable without a workshop.

soundtrack_override.name: Game Soundtrack Override
soundtrack_override.description: Change the mood of your game by overriding the default (kingdom-based) musical tracks with a thematic or modded list!
soundtrack_override.none_description: Standard kingdom music. Don't use an override.
soundtrack_override.frostfeast_description: It's that time of the year again! Get in the mood for helping Tomtee and decorating your town with some merry songs!

gameplayTab.auto_save_max_files_description: When Auto Save and Auto Save Unique Files are enabled, start overwriting older auto-saves after this limit is reached.WARNING:The next time you save after setting this to a lower number, many older auto-saves may be deleted.
gameplayTab.auto_save_interval_description: When Auto Save is enabled in the Save dialog, automatically save at this frequency.
gameplayTab.auto_save_unique_files_description: When auto-saving, create a separate save with the date and time.WARNING:Frequent auto-saving requires a lot of storage space!
gameplayTab.show_debugtools_on_load_description: Show the Debug UI by default. It can be hidden or shown again by using the 'show_debug_ui' (true/false) console command. This setting only applies if the DebugTools mod is active.

normal.description: Adventure forth in a world fraught with danger! The most balanced and intended experience, your town will be subject to increasingly challenging invasions and perils.

peaceful.description: A sandbox! Freely build your town without any invasions. You may look for a fight in the wilds or through special events, if you decide to. Wounds and other effects have a meager impact on health.

gentle.description: Enemies are as challenging as in Normal - but with a slower pace. Progression and events have longer intervals between each other. Wounds and such have a lesser impact on health.
gentle.post_selection_text: an intriguing place to start anew.

hard.description: Enemies will be stronger and the progression of challenges will be quicker and less merciful. Always be on your guard! Wounds and other effects can be very dangerous - or even lethal!

select_roster.invalid_traits_description: One or more citizens in this roster have one or more traits that can't be loaded for the active kingdom.
select_roster.delete_roster_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected starting roster?
select_roster.save_roster_confirm_message: Choose a name for your starting roster so it's easy to load on future expeditions.

bullet_points.000: The value itself represents a bonus percentage added over every experience gain.

constants.ingot_resource_name: [Modder: removed in ACE; Use 'ingot' resource constant instead!]

equipment_piece.description: Can be equipped by certain hearthlings.

evolve.description: Will transform into something else over time.

growing.description: Has multiple growth stages, with a growth rate affected by nearby water (or lack thereof) and rainy weather.

renewable_resource_node.description: Can be harvested repeatedly, requiring some time between each harvest in order to renew.

resource_node.description: Can only be harvested once and is then destroyed.

stacks.description: When used in crafting or trading, the entire item will be consumed. Otherwise, only a single stack is consumed at a time, until the last stack is consumed and the item is destroyed.

aquatic_object.description: Responds to the presence of water (or lack thereof).

fence.description: Limited tile-able item that will automatically connect to others within two units.

mechanical.description: Can be used in building connected systems to transfer mechanical power.
mechanical.produces: This mechanical device is currently producing [str(produces)] / [str(def_produces)] power.
mechanical.consumes: This mechanical device is currently consuming [str(consumes)] / [str(def_consumes)] power.
mechanical.resistance: This mechanical device is causing [str(resistance)] / [str(def_resistance)] resistance.
mechanical.power_percentage: This mechanical device's network is currently operating at [str(power_percentage)] % efficiency.

pile.description: Contains resources that can be harvested after placing it on the ground.
pile.item_list_header: This pile currently contains the following [str(item_count)] items:

tile.description: Tile-able item that will automatically connect adjacently and update its model.

titles.description: This entity can be given a title that will show up after their name. Right-click their name in the selected unit window or their character sheet (if they have one) to select a different title.
titles.all_earned_titles:
Total Renown: üèÜ [str(renown)]
The following titles have been earned:
titles.unattained: This is the next rank that hasn't yet been attained.

transform.description: Will transform into something else when a specific command or action is performed on it.
transform.entry_list_header: Current selection options will result in this entity eventually transforming into:

vine.description: Grows by spreading, but each one will only grow a few times. May be climbable.

water_pump.description: When enabled, pumps water from its bottom and out its top.

cheese.description: This cheese is starting to... Smell cheesy. Better eat it soon.

curdling.description: It's getting bad, better pour it in a cheese vat soon!

shipwreck_crate.description: Harvest it for loot; it contains treasure! Or does it?

shipwreck_chest.description: Harvest it for loot, whoever lost it won't mind... Right?

decay_1.description: It's starting to go bad, should probably drink it soon.

keg.description: Has been around for a long while and is a bit stale already.

decay_brewing_ingredient.description: It will spoil in some days, needs to be prepared soon!

base_elf_npc.description: A visitor from the deepest woods.

chromatic_fire_buff.description: Set aflame! Taking fire damage every 5 minutes for 20 minutes
